1076070.plot: For years psychedelics were forced into the shadows in a de facto prohibition. But today we're learning just how much they can help heal modern ills.

1076098.title: AMC Slander: The Movie
1076098.plot: In a brand new title from ReyGGTV productions, comes a tale of a person named Rey who must travel far and wide in order to unban the s word

1076129.title: The Neverending Party
1076129.plot: A look-back at popular French movie "La Boum" (The Party).

1076141.title: Autobio-Pamphlet
1076141.plot: A fast-paced comedy, Aatmapamphlet tells the twin story of a childhood love and that of momentous social change in 1990s India. Bold, moving, and insightful, this directorial debut places friendship over political factions and love above everything else.

1076142.title: Almamula
1076142.plot: Fleeing homophobic attacks, Nino moves to a rural house amidst a forest haunted by Almamula, a monster that takes those who commit carnal sins. In a world of whispers, unspoken desires and prayers, Nino’s curiosity and impulses rise to the surface.

1076146.title: The Hitman
1076146.plot: The master Hitman "Red" is informed of a lucrative bounty that he cannot miss. But after suffering a fatal injury, he will need to adapt to complete the mission.

1076151.title: Bellator 290: Bader vs. Fedor 2
1076151.plot: Ryan Bader vs. Fedor Emelianenko (Heavyweight)  Johnny Eblen vs. Anatoly Tokov (Middleweight)  Sabah Homasi vs. Brennan Ward (Welterweight)

1076152.title: Mind Games - The Experiment
1076152.plot: Can exercise sharpen the brightest minds? In this ground-breaking experiment, four world-class gamers, competing in eSports, Chess, Mahjong and Memory Games, put this to the test.

1076156.title: Ibiza Blue
1076156.plot: August 2020. The lives of three young professionals intersect in the post-pandemic lock-down Ibiza where they will try to overcome their personal tragedies, rediscover themselves and move on.

1076158.title: Rendezvous with Dehus
1076158.plot: From cradle to grave. A travelogue in the vein of the early super 8 films by Derek Jarman and Mark Jenkin, and the rambling grimoires of Ithell Colquhoun, retracing the primal journey of the early Holocene mystics of the Guernsey bailiwick.

1076159.title: 2 Hours of Daylight
1076159.plot: A man going about his day is stalked by a shadowy figure he cannot escape. This experinamental film by Dante Spraggins and Javier Burgos tells the represtaive tale that one cannot escape the things they try to run from, and must confront them face to face.

1076161.title: Delegation
1076161.plot: A school trip to Shoah memorials confronts young Israelis with a part of their identity and simultaneously with emotions and dynamics among themselves. A living appropriation of the past anchored in the present.

1076163.title: Hito
1076163.plot: Between nuclear reactors and military curfews, 14-year-old Jani lives in a dystopian world oppressively devoid of empathy. Together, she and her slippery new friend Kiefer the talking catfish gear up to strike a surreal blow for freedom.

1076164.title: Hummingbirds
1076164.plot: In Texas, on the Mexican border, best friends Silvia and Beba dance through long summer nights. Stuck in the immigration process in a politically divided America, home seems fragile. But their bond is not. The half-light is a space for poetry and dreams.

1076165.title: When a Rocket Sits on the Launch Pad
1076165.plot: At the basketball camp, 15-year-old Fang talks about her dreams. But life never stops, it moves too fast. Her phone fell into water. There are too many stairs to climb. The adults seem to decide her future. And the rocket keeps being launched every month.

1076167.title: Madden
1076167.plot: To Madeleine, the muddy road to the nearby town in front of her family’s farm seems like a threshold to another world. A mystical coming-of-age story in which the teenager experiences glimpses of the unknown as feelings of longing and loyalty collide.

1076168.title: Magma
1076168.plot: Overwhelmed by her father’s sudden disability, Esra becomes entangled in a web of lies. Only once the emotions smouldering inside the nine-year-old finally rush to the surface, can she begin coming to terms with her new reality.

1076170.title: Scènes de ménages, ça se corse

1076172.title: She – Hero
1076172.plot: Romy is a brave little girl. She has a budgie called Mimi and Mimi got lost. Romy’s determination to find her budgie brings her out into the ancient woods, where she meets all sorts of everyday characters, each with their own story. She’ll not only make new friends along the way, but mainly she enjoys her adventure.

1076173.title: Catching Birds
1076173.plot: When Theo awakens her sense of desire, Anouk, the only girl on the wrestling team, starts seeing the sparring sessions in a different light. A quietly intimate film, in which relationships between bodies, gazes and feelings are negotiated anew.

1076181.title: Xiaohui and His Cows
1076181.plot: Far away from his parents, Xiaohui lives with his grandfather in the mountains. When a calf is to be sold, the witty nine-year-old does everything in his power to prevent the separation of mother and child. A soulful cry for love in capitalist times.

1076183.title: Now.Here
1076183.plot: Wenhui believes he was born to be a goalkeeper, even though nobody remembers how he first got into football. The odds of saving a penalty are against him, but he knows that when confusing events happen, there is comfort in the structure of the game.

1076184.title: Osoronga
1076184.plot: Osoronga, a new movie from Ibrahim Chatta...featuring Funmi Amosun and others He ran because he had no other choice. He feared what would happen if he dared to stop. There was no time to think. There was hardly any time for him to breathe. On his broken ankle, he ran. With his bruised arms, he ran. With his bleeding sides, he ran because he knew today was the day he was meant to die.

1076218.title: The Weight of Leve Leve
1076218.plot: A film about a paradise through the eyes of those who live there. From the weight of Leve Leve to the sour of Doce Doce.

1076219.title: Isolated
1076219.plot: The 23-year-old, lonely and shy Dávid finds himself in the crossfire of questions and lectures at a family lunch because he does not have a girlfriend. The situation is further complicated by the fact that his beloved brother tell, that he proposed his partner. Mom cheers, dad runs to the booze, Dávid stares in front of him on the sofa. Our protagonist is looking for a solution in online dating. But can cure his loneliness, that the little mouse is pretending to be a lion?

1076241.title: Salmon
1076241.plot: The young chef August has big dreams and gets the chance in a recognized Michelin kitchen. He is tested professionally and mentally by the kitchen's harsh, uncompromising and eccentric head chef, but at the same time has towering expectations of himself. It creates a cavalcade of problems and lies over the course of an evening.

1076248.title: Dig & mig & mælkevejen
1076248.plot: At the reception for Klara's new collection of poems, the main character of the evening is eager to celebrate with her friend Simone. But Simone is more reluctant. She doesn't want to get drunk and rejects Klara's initiatives to party like they once did. Longing for the twoness they had in the past, Klara makes a drastic decision. But the night ends with a fateful accident.

1076250.title: National Geographic Investigates - Invaders: Colombia's Hippos
1076250.plot: Hippos are invading Colombia, thanks to Escobar, and the government must act.

1076251.title: National Geographic Investigates - Battle for Alaska's Oil
1076251.plot: The battle for oil in Alaska’s Arctic Refuge has waged for decades. We explore the history of oil in the region and the impacts of climate change.

1076255.title: National Geographic Investigates: Great Lakes Wreckage
1076255.plot: For decades, countless ships have been lost to the Great Lakes. Thanks to modern technology, their stories are finally being dragged from the depths.

1076259.title: Invicta FC 51: Tennant vs. Bernardo
1076259.plot: Invicta FC 51: Tennant vs. Bernardo was a mixed martial arts event headlined by Taneisha Tennant defending her bantamweight championship against Talita Bernardo. The co-main event will see Kristina Williams and Ketlen Souza face off for the vacant flyweight championship. The night before the event, the fight between Tanya Nijjar and Sayury Canon was removed from the card after Nijar missed weight. Serena DeJesus came in at 137.3 pounds, 1.3 pounds over the limit and was fined 25% of her purse which went to Rubin.

1076261.title: Black Travel Across America
1076261.plot: Travel Consultant, Martinique Lewis, embarks on a journey to visit historically listed Green Book locations and modern black travel destinations.

1076270.title: Alhamour H.A
1076270.plot: A security guard who quickly rises to the top and makes billions, where he and his partners convince people into suspicious investments with the promise of doubling their money in no time.

1076274.title: Die Verteidigerin - Der Gesang des Raben

1076291.title: Operation Storm
1076291.plot: Follow the story of the people who were expelled from Krajina in 1995 and the suffering of the Serb people in Croatia.

1076302.title: The Pushers
1076302.plot: It is late at night in the city. A middle-aged woman hears garage doors opening. A young girl Saulė returns to her mother’s house frightened. The mother sees her daughter standing soaked from the rain, so she tries to find out why she suddenly came back. After a few unsuccessful mother’s attempts to start a conversation, the daughter admits that her ex-boyfriend is stalking her. Watching her being upset the mother gets the idea to take revenge on the boyfriend.

1076326.title: Crecer
1076326.plot: Markel is a young kid tucked in his past. On his his mother's anniversary, he decides to escape to the unknown forest, fleeing from the fear that his father figure provokes in him. On this journey, Markel will be forced to face his worst fears as he begins his growth rite.

1076327.title: Partner in Crime
1076327.plot: The intriguing game theory concept of the Prisoner’s Dilemma is explored in this ambitious short film, shot entirely in St Andrews and directed by St Andrews student Gabrielle Torreborre with a team of students and professionals.

1076334.title: Elicit
1076334.plot: About the isolation and loneliness of the person with dementia, and the person caring for the person with the illness.

1076336.title: The Right to Read
1076336.plot: The Right to Read shares the stories of an activist, a teacher, and two American families who fight to provide our youngest generation with the most foundational indicator of life-long success: the ability to read.

1076352.title: The Puppet
1076352.plot: An unusual commute to the office of a mysterious company.

1076364.title: Dug Days: Carl’s Date
1076364.plot: Carl Fredricksen reluctantly agrees to go on a date with a lady friend—but admittedly has no idea how dating works these days. Ever the helpful friend, Dug steps in to calm Carl’s pre-date jitters and offer some tried-and-true tips for making friends—if you’re a dog.

1076366.title: Willow: Behind the Magic
1076366.plot: Featuring the breakout stars from the series and returning legends, this documentary takes viewers behind the scenes for an in-depth look at the making of the hit original series.

1076376.title: Denial
1076376.plot: 2 teaspoons of baking powder, 4 cups of butter, 1 cup of milk, 3 teaspoons of trust and 1/2 drop of affection.

1076384.title: Justice
1076384.plot: Exploring the epic battle to confirm Brett Kavanaugh.

1076443.title: j-hope IN THE BOX
1076443.plot: For 200 days, the daily life of artist j-hope is captured. From his production of solo album "Jack in the Box" and listening party, this documentary follows him all the way to his debut on the stage of "Lollapalooza."

1076493.title: HIT
1076493.plot: Katrina, a naive young woman, travels to the home of Phil, her mentor/father figure, to kill him before he can divulge incriminating information to the police. However, Katrina hesitates to pull the trigger before Phil notices her, resulting in an existential confrontation that forces Phil to come to terms with his own death and Katrina to take responsibility for her actions and confront the faults in her worldview.

1076495.title: WORSHIP AND TRIBUTE: NICKY AUSTIN FOREVER
1076495.plot: A tribute to the late Nicky Austin held on Twitch to raise funds for his funeral, made up of curated music and visuals from Nicky's close ones, culminating to a extravagant 3 hour performance.

1076526.title: Innocent Vengeance
1076526.plot: About the revenge of people who saw their families killed in plain sight.

1076527.title: KT-800
1076527.plot: Mehnersmoos are one of Germany‘s most important music act. In this documentary we see that carrying a whole nation of music nerds is not as easy as it seems.

1076528.title: Jai Kali Kalkattawali
1076528.plot: A coveted idol of Goddess Kali, worth crores, gets stolen from a temple on the outskirts of Kolkata. While several parties, and the police, are looking for the idol, will it end up in the right place?

1076540.title: William Tell - INO
1076540.plot: A freedom fighter in Austrian-occupied Switzerland. An oppressive Habsburg governor. The most famous Swiss apple. And a love story that crosses national divides.  Rossini’s thrilling epic, his final masterpiece with the world’s most famous overture, is his most ambitious, forward-looking and vocally challenging opera. Having become the rallying cry of the 1830 revolution in France, Rossini’s final opera is nothing short of revolutionary itself. Retelling the legend of the Swiss folk hero based on Schiller’s play, William Tell is a grandiose ode to freedom. Staged for the first time in Ireland since 1875, this production is conducted by Fergus Sheil and directed by Julien Chavaz who takes a mythological approach. For him, ‘the story is not just about a remote Swiss community facing Austrian invaders. It is the story of a society that suddenly has to face a threat to its model of civilisation.’

1076547.title: Gad Elmaleh : D'ailleurs
1076547.plot: After Sans tambour and an international tour with Oh My Gad! performed in English in more than fifteen countries, Gad Elmaleh is back with a new one-man show, D'ailleurs. An intimate and jubilant show! For nearly two years, the comedian has crisscrossed France with this sixth show mixing stand-up and characters, free of the desire to please. An unfiltered return, eagerly awaited by his audience, to be discovered in this recording at the Dôme de Paris. Gad Elmaleh confides on his daily life, his American adventure, his relationship with his parents, his sons and his former girlfriends.

1076601.title: Luccas Neto in: Summer Camp 4
1076601.plot: Luccas and Gi prepare for the biggest competition the Roxteen gang has ever faced. When they lose their sponsor, they will have to come up with the most outlandish ideas and participate in a gymkhana full of music and adventure to reach the Final Challenge.

1076605.title: Cazadora
1076605.plot: Psychological thriller where the character's strength, submerged in the landscape's majesty, leads us through a tense, bleak and chilling path.

1076606.title: Christine and The Queens - Redcar les adorables étoiles

1076620.title: Addy Kleijngeld – accordeonvirtuoos
1076620.plot: Addy Kleijngeld was a musical genius. But also a well-known producer and the discoverer of Hein Simons and the Scorpions from England. The documentary shows images of old Helmond, his father's café Limburgia and the AK accordion orchestra he founded, for which he always came to rehearsals. Addy Kleijngeld was born on December 29, 1922 in Helmond and died of cardiac arrest at the age of only 54.

1076621.title: Niels Bohr - Verdens bedste menneske
1076621.plot: The Danish documentary 'Niels Bohr: The World's Best Man' is about the world-renowned Danish physicist Niels Bohr. Here we delve into his life, work and the legacy he has created. Niels Bohr is known for making fundamental contributions to the understanding of atomic structure and quantum theory, and the film draws a portrait of a man who in the 20th century probably left the biggest mark on the world.

1076628.title: The Echoes of the Universe – The Music of Kaija Saariaho
1076628.plot: The Echoes of the Universe – The Music of Kaija Saariaho follows the completion and performances of Saariaho’s works in different parts of the world, but also highlights the mutual cooperation of her family.

1076631.title: Under Construction
1076631.plot: Markku built a house for his family with his own bare hands like a strong man is supposed to do. He worked hard from dawn to dusk, so that his seven children would have a roof above their heads. Unfortunately, the task ended up being too hard and Markku burnt out. One day, he left his family and disappeared abroad.  The filmmaker travels to his childhood home to face his father, who he never got to know properly. Together they build a steel gate in front of the unfinished house, and try to create a relationship between each other.

1076650.title: Stars Fell Again
1076650.plot: Bryce is ready to propose to Madison while they visit her family for Christmas. However, the spontaneous wedding of Madison's sister Harper throws Bryce's perfect proposal plans into a tailspin.

1076656.title: Uri Geller's Secret Treasures
1076656.plot: An extraordinary look at the life of Uri Geller, the man famous for bending spoons and reading minds, told through exclusive interviews with the man himself.

1076657.title: The Wife and Her House Husband
1076657.plot: As Cassie and Matthew come to the end of a divorce, a letter from their past selves surfaces suggesting guidance in the "event of separation". They agree to do the first thing on the list, only to find themselves drawn back together.

1076682.title: Sarla One Crore
1076682.plot: During the recession caused by the world pandemic Corona, Bhikaji was hit by the financial crisis. To overcome it and make some easy cash he bets his money on cards but ends up losing his wife.

1076692.title: Poundcake
1076692.plot: There’s a madman loose in New York City. Late at night, he stalks the streets looking for straight white men to punish. When he finds them, he kills them in unspeakable ways.

1076694.title: Voyage
1076694.plot: The moment between nothing and everything.

1076712.title: Queen City Blues
1076712.plot: Three friends search for a missing man in Manchester, New Hampshire

1076718.title: ARES 11
1076718.plot: ARES 11 was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, January 20, 2023 at the Dôme de Paris in Paris, France.

1076726.title: Tedious Days and Nights
1076726.plot: Poet Zen Dekuan returns to his birhtplace.

1076768.title: The Key
1076768.plot: An Israeli family's equilibrium gradually disintegrates as a mysterious sound is heard every evening at the door of their apartment.

1076770.title: One Hit Wonders
1076770.plot: 12-year-old Barbara dreams of meeting her idol Venus, a one hit wonder from the 80s who has gone missing. When a mysterious person moves to her neighborhood, Barbara sees an opportunity to finally solve the mystery of Venus.

1076773.title: The Tortured and the Hare
1076773.plot: Four people are living their normal lives when they are mysteriously transported to a strange basement. When they try to find a way out, things take a turn.

1076783.title: Alexa Boulton: Cinema
1076783.plot: Alexa Boulton interviews the students and teachers of Kelvin High School to uncover the possibilities for the future of cinema

1076804.title: 18 Days
1076804.plot: Filmmaker Proteek Basu heads back to India for the first time in 5 years, charting his 18 day trip as he reconnects with his family and makes up for lost time.

1076868.title: Enaldinho and the Mystery of the Lagoon
1076868.plot: Enaldinho and his gang go out to have fun in a paradisiacal park. The class takes advantage of everything the place has to offer until strange things start to happen. Some people mysteriously disappear during the night and, when they reappear, they are different. They seem to be totally out of vital energy!  Enaldinho leaves to try to find out who or what is doing this... He then discovers that the victims are being taken to a mysterious cave and there has their energy drained, turning everyone into Zombies... Who is behind all this is  "Zap", a frightening alien who needs people's energy to be the fuel of a destructive weapon that can enslave the entire planet. Enaldinho and his friends need to prevent "Zap" from realizing his plan and saving the world from this dark force.

1076879.title: Fleetwood Peaks
1076879.plot: The worlds of Twin Peaks and Fleetwood Mac collide in this mind-bending mashup film. Enter a dreamy nexus where the beautiful vocals of Stevie Nicks synchronise with the warm synthesisers of Angelo Badalamenti’s iconic TV score; their visual styles overlapping to create a chaotic, psychedelic medley.

1076882.title: Blood Crime
1076882.plot: Concepció, a novice, is held prisoner in a remote monastery after exiling from Mallorca to Barcelona during the Spanish Civil War. She is supported and protected by the Mother Abbess, but the arrival of a Bishop that adores God as a tool to feast a monster inside him turns her world upside down. Confused, Concepció strives for reconnecting with her land through her music, but she’s caged by evil.

1076884.title: Earworm
1076884.plot: Adult Swim presents a rip roaring film about two knuckleheads facing off against a gnarly tape cassette dwelling worm that really wants inside their ear holes.

1076887.title: Time
1076887.plot: A man is subject to the repercussions of tampering with time.

1076888.title: The Terrasite
1076888.plot: Loser Italian World War I pilot, Giuseppe Mozzarella Prosciutto, must save Earth from a planet-eating claymation alien creature.

1076890.title: Sombra
1076890.plot: The vertiginous escape of a little boy mistreated by society in a dystopian world very similar to the ours.

1076892.title: Concentrate
1076892.plot: PRESSURIZED ORANGE JUICE VEINS. A reticent child stomachs normalized environmental pressures as they live under their caregiver’s domain.

1076893.title: ZX
1076893.plot: Hero ZX brings colour and life to the world, but fighting the evil competitors drains their power, and their quest for the throne ultimately ends in defeat. The story of the ZX Spectrum, the world's first colour computer, told through its iconic animation and music styles.

1076909.title: Good Times
1076909.plot: A staggering and quietly uncanny collection of fragmented reminiscences of past times we yearn for but don’t fully understand, and the realization that those memories of “simpler” moments in our lives come from a selection of elusive and disconnected images with a sea of blank space in between that we’ll never be able to developed.

1076912.title: Chubai. Speaking Again
1076912.plot: A theatrical documentary about Hrytsko Chubai, a genius of Ukrainian poetry, a connoisseur of literature, art and music and the brightest representative of Lviv underground culture of late 60s early 70s.

1076922.title: A89 Bordeaux-Lyon: Défis de la transeuropéenne

1076955.title: A Sunday Affair
1076955.plot: Two best friends, Uche and Toyin, fall in love with Sunday, a charming, yet flawed eligible bachelor. A love triangle ensues with the women unaware that they are dating the same man.

1076980.title: Wrestle Kingdom 17 In Yokohama Arena - NJPW x NOAH
1076980.plot: NEW JAPAN AND NOAH RETURN TO YOKOHAMA ARENA FOR THE SEQUEL OF THEIR WRESTLE KINGDOM RIVALRY FROM 2022. LIJ AND KONGO SQUARE OFF IN A BEST OF FIVE SINGLES SERIES WHILE OKADA AND KIYOMIYA IMPLODE.

1076996.title: Dominoes
1076996.plot: Four women start to face problems in their lives one after the other, with things getting increasingly worse with time. As they start to confront their problems head-on, their lives start to turn for the better and they discover their true selves.

1077007.title: Data Management
1077007.plot: A string of strange occurrences prompt a dedicated office worker to investigate the nature of his self contained reality

1077027.title: The Present Green
1077027.plot: A horror fantasy short film about a presence that lurks within suburbia, interlinked with nature and residing on the periphery.

1077052.title: Perfect Dark
1077052.plot: A woman's last moments before she is consumed by a darkness.

1077073.title: Raggedy Anne
1077073.plot: "Raggedy Anne" follows the story of a young girl, Anne, who loves to play with her Raggedy Ann doll along with her brother, Andy. When Anne grows up, she copes with his recent death through songwriting.

1077076.title: NJPW Wrestle Kingdom 17 Night 2
1077076.plot: Wrestle Kingdom 17 was a two-day professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event co-produced by the New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) and Pro Wrestling Noah (Noah) promotions. The first day of the event took place on January 4, 2023, at the Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan, with the second day of the event taking place on January 21, 2023, at the Yokohama Arena in Yokohama, Japan. It is the 32nd January 4 Tokyo Dome Show and the 17th promoted under the Wrestle Kingdom name. The event was held in honor of the company's founder Antonio Inoki, who died on October 1, 2022.

1077115.title: The apple and the ghost
1077115.plot: A boy is scared because he thinks his house is haunted but he's also very hungry

1077123.title: Hemet is Heaven
1077123.plot: An aspiring filmmaker embarks on a journey to document the hidden gems of their hometown, Hemet, California, but soon realizes the challenges of independent filmmaking as they navigate through two years of obstacles and perseverance.

1077133.title: The Apple and the ghost
1077133.plot: A boy is scared because he thinks his house is haunted but he also incredible hungry

1077135.title: The Heron Man
1077135.plot: Musician James Edwin Lane explores his personal battle with agoraphobia through the creation of a new genre: the folkloric film ballad. Working with non-professional actors in the mythic landscape of his native county Durham, James builds a film narrative around his original composition, The Heron Man.

1077208.title: Unish20
1077208.plot: Two people from two poles. One is the complete opposite of the other. Not nineteen-twenty; This is like a difference of nineteen-forty-nine. But what happens when two people with different tastes and preferences come under the same roof? Love are like a jigsaw puzzle. Torn pieces, one does not match the size of the other. But the whole picture is made by combining those pieces sitting side by side. The difference is their match! Separation is the birth of their love!

1077216.title: fromis_9 concert ＜LOVE FROM.＞ IN JAPAN
1077216.plot: fromis_9's LOVE FROM. IN JAPAN concert that took place in Tachikawa Stage Garden on 2022 October 7th.

1077236.title: Look up and see joy
1077236.plot: The film focuses on hot topics such as midlife crisis, family responsibilities, care for the elderly, and children's education. The younger brother; the grandson uses the metaverse technology to reunite the grandfather and the late grandmother; the naive and rich second generation undergoes destiny transformation in the countryside, and finds the value of life through friendship.

1077254.title: The Fall of Cannonsville
1077254.plot: Throughout the 1950s and into the 1960s the communities of Cannonsville, Granton, Rock Rift, Rock Royal, Johnny Brook and Beerston, NY were destroyed to make way for the Cannonsville Reservoir. The reservoir would serve as the last piece of New York City’s growing water infrastructure in a battle of upstate versus downstate. 60 years after vacating or moving their homes, former residents gather at their annual town reunion to reflect and reminisce on their memories and the collective trauma that they share.

1077273.title: Mot i brøstet – 30th Anniversary
1077273.plot: A 30th anniversary special celebrating the Norwegian sitcom Mot i brøstet. Actors Nils Vogt, Sven Nordin and Hilde Lyrån share their memories.

1077280.title: Die Hart
1077280.plot: Follows a fictionalized version of Kevin Hart, as he tries to become an action movie star. He attends a school run by Ron Wilcox, where he attempts to learn the ropes on how to become one of the industry's most coveted action stars.

1077299.title: Martyr or Murderer
1077299.plot: A sequel to Maid in Malacañang. The film explores the assassination of Ninoy Aquino on August 21, 1983, three years before the events of Maid in Malacañang, and how the Marcoses were accused of as those responsible for killing him.

1077301.title: una notte
1077301.plot: A collective act of caring over the course of one night.

1077321.title: Drunken Fist
1077321.plot: In the last years of the Qing Dynasty, Su Qier, the ten tigers of Guangdong, fought a decisive battle between the Ax Gang and the gangsters, and finally founded a school to spread martial arts.

1077328.title: Fuks 2
1077328.plot: Maciek is a bright and savvy 20-year-old, although he has to borrow money and a car for a date from his dad. His father, on his eighteenth birthday, set off an explosive device, stole a car, contributed to the wrecking of two police cars and deceived for big money a shady businessman. At the same time, he won the heart of a beautiful woman. So he set the bar high, and it will soon become clear whether his son has inherited his bravado and propensity for dangerous intrigue. All this will happen through a date that will connect him with two unpredictable women and draw him into a game at stake - big money and even bigger love.

1077342.title: A Última Vez Que Ouvi Deus Chorar

1077346.title: Le Dogsitter (Maintenant que je suis un fantôme)

1077386.title: The i-Word
1077386.plot: How wannabe influencers Ella and Sam set out to become social media's favourite interabled couple.  After stalking Sam on all his socials, Ella plucks up the courage to speak to Sam at the South Wales Accessibility Trailblazer Awards.

1077410.title: Zindagi Shatranj Hai
1077410.plot: A couple gets married, but the wife refuses to accept the man as her husband. Meanwhile, murders are being committed in the city. Is the couple safe? Maybe or Maybe not!

1077433.title: Wendigo
1077433.plot: Arash Salah steals a recording from the PDF archives concerning the whereabouts of his late cousin, Sara Salah, and what may have led up to her disappearance. What stays in the dark, probably has a reason.

1077444.title: LFA 151: Delano vs. Santos
1077444.plot: LFA 151: Delano vs. Santos was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Saturday, January 28, 2023 at the Ginásio do Polvilho in Cajamar, São Paulo, Brazil.

1077452.title: KSW 78
1077452.plot: KSW 78 was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Saturday, January 21, 2023 at the Netto Arena in Szczecin, Poland.

1077458.title: 2 Hearts 2 Secrets
1077458.plot: College baseball player Jax meets Daisy, an infectiously energetic radio host at her university. Starstruck, the two fall in love, but each harbors a secret. Will their secrets keep them together or pull them apart?

1077546.title: Castles in the Sky
1077546.plot: Filmmaker and professor Pearl Gluck’s provocative latest dramatic short film centers on Malke, a Holocaust survivor and sex-ed teacher who has been leading a secret life for decades: performing slam poetry on the Lower East Side. Castles in the Sky features commanding performances from actor Lynn Cohen, who died in 2020, and poet Venus Thrash, who died in 2021.

1077552.title: Wolf Garden
1077552.plot: A man who has gone into isolated hiding is haunted by visions of the woman he loves and a mysterious creature in the nearby woods.

1077559.title: Midnight Passenger
1077559.plot: Ani has ordered an Uber to get home at midnight. After realizing the driver is taking her somewhere else, she must run for her life.

1077578.title: Northeast Love Brother 2: Can't Stop Loving You
1077578.plot: This film tells the story of a love affair that takes place in the Northeast in the early 1990s. Xu Tie, a young and exuberant private minibus driver, falls in love with Lisa Chen, a dancer from a wealthy family, but because of the disparity in reality, their relationship is strongly opposed by Lisa's mother. In order to make money, Xu Tie agrees to help his boss, Erjao, with his deliveries and is put in danger.

1077580.title: Shackleton's Cabin
1077580.plot: On 5 January 1922, world-famous Antarctic explorer Ernest Shackleton died of a heart attack in his cabin aboard The Quest during his final expedition to the South Pole. Moored in Norway, The Quest was broken apart. However, one of the dockers had the foresight to remove Shackleton’s cabin. He took it home and it served as his family’s garden shed for three generations.  Nearly 100 years after Shackleton’s death, the cabin has been donated to a museum in the explorer’s hometown, where master craftsman and Shackleton enthusiast Sven Habermann painstakingly restores it to its former glory. With only one surviving photograph of the cabin’s interior, Sven goes to extreme lengths to retrace every detail, from the wood to the original wallpaper used. Shackleton’s Cabin follows Sven as he rebuilds the cabin and explores the life and final days of his hero.

1077637.title: In·spi·ra·tion
1077637.plot: What is artistic inspiration? Is it the same for all of us? 'in·spi·ra·tion' follows three Isle of Man artists as they create a piece of work and explore what inspiration means to them.

1077642.title: Mira niño
1077642.plot: Susi is frustrated that her son has dropped out of his studies to work where she works, in the factory. Afraid that her boss will take him on full time, she does everything she can to make sure he doesn't follow her path.

1077647.title: in water
1077647.plot: A young man who previously focused on acting suddenly decides to test his creativity, setting out to direct a short film with his own money. Together with two former classmates he arrives on a large island known for its rocks and wind. Not sure what he wants to shoot, the young man goes out wandering here and there with the other two for the entire day. Then on the coast he sees a woman picking up trash on her own, and impressed by her volunteer effort, he has a short conversation with her. Finally, thanks to that meeting he is able to create a story…

1077648.title: Más de La Ruta, el documental

1077660.title: Feux
1077660.plot: Karun, a stray dog, fights to survive in a chaotic environment ravaged by drought.

1077661.title: The Adults
1077661.plot: The treasure hunt deep within as individuals and as a family is an admirable trio whose interpretation is as nuanced as it is poignant.

1077670.title: Limbo
1077670.plot: Simon Baker stars as Travis Hurley, a detective who arrives in a small Australian outback city to research a twenty-year-old unsolved homicide of a neighborhood Aboriginal lady. Forming bonds with the sufferer's fractured household, Travis unravels a collection of arduous truths, highlighting the complexities of loss and injustice skilled by First Nations Australians.

1077675.title: The Klezmer Project
1077675.plot: A frustrated Jewish wedding cameraman falls in love with a klezmer clarinettist. To spend time with her, he fabricates a documentary project that takes him on a journey in search of the lost klezmer melodies safeguarded by the Romani of Eastern Europe.

1077676.title: In the Blind Spot
1077676.plot: A German film team is shooting a documentary in northeastern Turkey. In a remote Kurdish village, they witness an elderly women performing a recurring ritual to keep the memory of her missing son alive. The Kurdish translator of the German crew is also the nanny of Melek, a 7–year–old turkish girl. Her father, Zafer, works for a sinister organization and is caught between loyalty to them and and fear for his family's well being when his daughter appears to be haunted by a mysterious force. The fateful encounter of these people developes a destructive power. IN THE BLIND SPOT unravels a complex net of conspiracy, paranoia and generational trauma.

1077678.title: The Cage is Looking for a Bird
1077678.plot: Yakha is 17 and loves roaming about the fields with her friend Madina. Her home is a village in Chechnya where she lives with her mother and little brother. She is self-composed by nature and knows what she wants, but is also open to life – which begins to take shape in the form of certain cultural and social concepts. Madina wants to get married; Yakha’s older sister wants a divorce. Her mother is against it – after all, she herself managed to persevere. Together they visit the grave of their father who died in the second Chechen war.

1077680.title: The Walls of Bergamo
1077680.plot: In the first few months of 2020, huge swathes of Northern Italy were hit by a new virus. The town of Bergamo and its province was to become the epicentre of this pandemic.

1077683.title: Orlando, My Political Biography
1077683.plot: Virginia Woolf’s “Orlando” tells the story of a young man who grows up to become a 36-year-old woman. Almost a century after its publication, Paul B. Preciado speaks to Virginia Woolf to tell her that her fictional character has become a reality. The transition of Orlando’s body now lies at the root of all non-binary bodies and there are Orlandos all over the world. Through the authentic voices of other young bodies undergoing metamorphosis, Preciado retraces the stages of his personal transformation through a poetic journey in which life, writing, theory and image merge freely in the search for truth. Every Orlando, he says, is a transgender person who is risking his, her or their life on a daily basis as they find themselves forced to confront government laws, history and psychiatry, as well as traditional notions of the family and the power of multinational pharmaceutical companies.

1077684.title: Samsara
1077684.plot: Samsara is the Buddhist cycle of death and reincarnation. From the temples of Laos, alongside with teenage monks, we will accompany a soul in its transit from one body to another through the bardo. The words of the "Tibetan Book of the Dead" will be our guide to avoid getting lost in the afterlife. A luminous and sonorous journey that will lead us to reincarnate on the beaches of Zanzibar, where groups of women work in seaweed farms.

1077685.title: Eastern Front
1077685.plot: On February 24, 2022, Yevhen, together with his friends, volunteered to join the first aid squad on the front line. They provided life-saving support and evacuation of the wounded. This film reveals the experiences of these young men for six months full of drama, despair, fear, hatred, bitterness, love, and, most importantly, faith in victory.

1077686.title: Living Bad
1077686.plot: A hotel by the northern shore of Portugal welcomes its guests over the weekend. A man is torn between being present for his wife and the space that his mother takes up between the two of them. A mother encourages her daughter’s marriage to enable her own love affair with her son-in-law. Another mother lives through her daughter, preventing her from making her own decisions. Three families at the end of their cycles of acceptance.

1077709.title: Xander De Rycke: Dit Terzijde
1077709.plot: A small and intimate comedy special by Xander De Rycke, performed between Christmas and New Years Eve 2022 at De Centrale, Ghent.

1077716.title: Bradman and Tendulkar
1077716.plot: Two of cricket's greatest players, sporting icons from different corners of the world. This documentary compares their early lives, stellar careers and dreams, uncovering striking similarities and never-before-shared details.

1077731.title: Mandela
1077731.plot: It's 1960. Young activist, Nelson Mandela, rallies the people of South Africa to protest against the racial segregation of apartheid. In 1962 he is arrested and sentenced to life in prison, where he will spend the next 27 years, taken from his wife and children, as the fight for freedom sweeps his country. Infused with the rhythms of South Africa, this soaring new musical tells the extraordinary story of a man who changed the course of modern history—the sacrifices he made as a husband and father, and the global movement that inspired him and his comrades to keep fighting.

1077734.title: When You Look Beneath the Skin
1077734.plot: A collection of six contemporary stories exploring hidden passions, unspoken feelings and what it means to find yourself in the eyes of another.

1077748.title: My Worst Enemy
1077748.plot: Mojtaba, Hamzeh, Zar are among other individuals who have been thrown into prison and ideologically interrogated in Iran. In this documentary, the director wants them to interrogate him as agents of the Islamic Republic might. He would like the real torturer in Iran to see himself through the film as if in a mirror. The violent experience of putting themselves in the torturer's head confronts them with their own limits and the ambivalence of the project itself.

1077770.title: Der Jakobsweg - Die Seele atmen lassen

1077772.title: Choodu
1077772.plot: After the death of her husband, Mathew, Ancy becomes a loner and she starts investing more time in painting, which is her forte and only source of income. Slowly but steadily she comes out of the shell and begins the journey to find answers to her elusive desire.

1077774.title: အင်္ဂလိပ်ကြက်ဖ ဘိုကြက်ဖ

1077779.title: Soul of the Ocean
1077779.plot: The undersea world has often been depicted as a dangerous place filled with lethal predators. A world where sharks are mindless eating machines. A world where the only relationship between species is that big fish eat little fish. Of course, stories of sensational danger and violent predation are seductive to wildlife film audiences. But is that what the ocean is really like?

1077793.title: I delitti del BarLume - E allora zumba!

1077831.title: Spider-Ham Lincoln 4: Score and 7 years ago
1077831.plot: The president time travelled for the first time but history isn't always as it seems.

1077852.title: Sidney Poitier - Der Mann, der Hollywood veränderte

1077872.title: O outro lado da fruta
1077872.plot: A day in the life of Marta, a raspberry grower who doesn't give up on her dreams.

1077921.title: HOURS IN SILENCE
1077921.plot: a camera test for abe nevin's new film.

1077949.title: Ecuador Multilingual
1077949.plot: A short documentary film that explains why ancestral languages are dying and promotes their preservation.

1077992.title: Jahan
1077992.plot: Jahan always stays in dilemma between real and un-real due to her post traumatic disorder. Her husband Shihab tries to yield Jahan in normal life by hiding her trauma but keep failing due to the intensity of it. One day suddenly an accident happened. In between Jahan’s traumatic imagination and reality, the allegation falls on her where Shihab couldn’t save her anymore.

1078034.title: Panorama : Histoires du vin naturel
1078034.plot: Since the arrival of chemicals in the vineyards to the commercial breakthrough of sulfurless wines, the most prestigeous french winegrowers tell us the slow revolution of the wine world. A wide point of view about viticulture, trying to define what is natural wine, to finally know « who are we drinking ».

1078044.title: The Trial of Rowan McElligott
1078044.plot: Rookie lawyer, Bear Fisher, goes up against esteemed prosecutor, Calvin Krepps in a battle of wits. However, both appear to be in over their heads as the trial twists and turns in ways that neither see coming.

1078054.title: Pieces
1078054.plot: Young songstress, Jordan, yearns for love, music, and money in her life. Does she gain it all, and lose herself, or lose it all to save herself?

1078061.title: Meat Loaf - A Celebration Of Life
1078061.plot: A short film tribute about the musician Meat Loaf, released by his family in 2023 on the anniversary of his death.

1078066.title: Hearts & Horses
1078066.plot: A man is thrown into fatherhood unexpectedly when his daughter is suddenly dropped off at his New England apple farm. He was never told he had a daughter until her mother's death. After 16 years, the girl and her father will try to build a relationship. The girl will need her father's love, and her broken heart will need a horse.

1078133.title: Paper Sisters
1078133.plot: This work is a response to the Chinese Exclusion Act which was in enacted in the U.S. during the years of 1882-1943. This prohibited immigration on the basis of race. One of the only ways for families to come across was to become "paper" relatives of those who had legal status. This video montage expresses the emotions and turmoil these individuals endured.

1078136.title: The King In Yellow
1078136.plot: In four intersecting stories, a supernatural play causes supernatural horror to befall any who read it

1078143.title: Black Sunshine Baby
1078143.plot: Family memories and personal art movingly portray author and motivational speaker Aisha Chaudhary's journey with an immune disorder and terminal illness.

1078151.title: ADVAITA
1078151.plot: Advaita is a tale of duality and the feeling of mutual urge to vanish.

1078153.title: Le Voyage délivré
1078153.plot: From the front room of his apartment a young boy is taken on an extraordinary journey by a big-hearted bird.

1078154.title: Who Ate The Bird
1078154.plot: A cat tries to fall asleep in a busy sleep.

1078157.title: Muravjiniy marsh
1078157.plot: An ant goes off to discover the world around them and explore its wealth of music and sounds. Inspired by Chinese graphic arts, this film is a contemplation of nature and draws attention to the beauty of small, simple things

1078158.title: Dry Leaves
1078158.plot: A celebration of the multitude of the forms, textures and colours of nature through 527 autumn leaves.

1078160.title: Babette et l'Oiseau
1078160.plot: What would happen if a grumpy handywoman and a clumsy blue bird, who both love music, tried to live together?

1078185.title: all of my brothers on go
1078185.plot: business went bankrupt so dbb2 fell through, just repurposing some stuff

1078186.title: Madonna X Vanity Fair – The Enlightenment
1078186.plot: ‘The Enlightenment’ is a film feature created by Madonna and Luigi & Iango during the making of the photoshoot published in the February 2023 issue of Vanity Fair.

1078211.title: MELA
1078211.plot: As a young mother and aspiring Reggeaton dancer, Mela must navigate the challenges of balancing family while fighting to pursue her dreams of success.

1078227.title: Grace Point
1078227.plot: A young man on his way to a remote drug rehab finds himself in a strange town being chased by the locals, as well as his own personal demons.

1078229.title: Trespass
1078229.plot: Two men go for a walk in the forest unaware of the sinister being that lurks behind them.

1078240.title: Atrapades entre dos mons
1078240.plot: The voice of girls and women from Muslim families, born here or arrived as children, who rebel against the patriarchal tradition and demand the protection of their rights in Catalonia.

1078303.title: Grace & Sophie
1078303.plot: The morning after a house party, straight-identifying best friends, Grace and Sophie, wake up to the realisation that they’ve just slept together.

1078305.title: One Night With Asterix & Obelix
1078305.plot: On the occasion of the release of the blockbuster "Asterix & Obelix: The Middle Kingdom", unpublished images of the preparation of the film and the manufacturing secrets, as well as the crazy story of Asterix and Obelix since its origins.

1078307.title: Won't be a thing to become

1078329.title: LFA 152: Valente vs. Bekoev
1078329.plot: LFA 152: Valente vs. Bekoev was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 10, 2023 at the Grand Casino Hotel and Resort in Shawnee, Oklahoma.

1078331.title: LFA 153: Mariscal vs. Faria
1078331.plot: LFA 153: Mariscal vs. Faria was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 17, 2023 at the Horseshoe Hammond Casino in Hammond, Indiana.

1078337.title: ACA 152: Bukuev vs. Gadzhiev
1078337.plot: ACA 152: Bukuev vs. Gadzhiev was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Saturday, February 25, 2023 at the Coliseum in Grozny, Chechnya, Russia.

1078338.title: Paris Marseille, meilleures ennemies ?
1078338.plot: The Parisians talk about it, the Marseillais talk loudly. The Parisians are stressed, the Marseillais are slackers. This war of clichés has long been a source of fantasy and soccer stadium slogans. What if we tried to find out more? Let's travel between Marseille and Paris, in the story of two rivals who love to hate each other.

1078339.title: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 1/Welterweights
1078339.plot: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 1/Welterweights was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, January 27, 2023 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.

1078341.title: ACA Young Eagles 32
1078341.plot: ACA Young Eagles 32 was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Monday, January 30, 2023 in Russia.

1078343.title: "PUNETE"
1078343.plot: A tale about two friends embarking on a mysterious journey guided by a wizard.

1078396.title: ETERNAL8
1078396.plot: A nomad embarks on a spiritual journey in search of a higher realm known only as “yume”.

1078405.title: Parsifal - PBO
1078405.plot: A young man ignorant of everything, including his own name, arrives at the Kingdom of the Holy Grail. Is he the ‘pure fool, enlightened by compassion’, who, it has been prophesied, will purify the realm?  OperaVision is live from Bergen for a concert staging of Parsifal, Richard Wagner’s final music drama which is unlike anything that went before or has come since. It can feel more like a ritual ceremony than an opera – grand yet intimate, somehow occupying its own space and time. At the heart of Parsifal is a curious, magical treatment of the symphony orchestra that appears to give the voices above it all the space and autonomy they need.

1078408.title: Road Trip
1078408.plot: A found footage, short horror film centered around two young men who get caught up in some strange occurences during a road trip to Los Angeles.

1078414.title: Dr. Bezbaruah 2
1078414.plot: Shantanu finally agrees to return to his birthplace Assam after seven long years to attend his sister's wedding but his fate welcomes him with some odd surprises. Will Shantanu be able to fight the demons of his past or is he just a part of a bigger conspiracy? Sequel to the 1969 Assamese thriller Dr. Bezbarua.

1078417.title: Duel Solitaire
1078417.plot: A young woman practices swordsmanship in the woods and fights her demons.

1078418.title: Tous ensemble!
1078418.plot: In Aubervilliers, near Paris, a city stadium delimits housing estates and new buildings. Children, adults come to train, pass the time. An atmosphere of cohesion emanates but is threatened by the arrival of hipsters.

1078463.title: Aftermath
1078463.plot: An amateur killer goes to their hideaway, awaiting their partner in crime, who doesn't show. Soon, the paranoia begins to settle in. This was the first film I made for a competition. The key word was "spring", which I took and made part of the backstory, as they killed their target via bomb triggered by bed spring. Also, Justin Kurzel saw the movie at the comp!

1078464.title: Mum! Mum!
1078464.plot: Mum! Mum! is a short film in which artist Natasha MacVoy takes on the identity of ‘The Mother as Stunt Performer’, reflecting on the stunt performer’s paradox, where illusionary techniques deny their existence to the audience and their success is tied to their invisibility.

1078466.title: A Pirate Love Story
1078466.plot: A man trying to illegally record the latest Hollywood blockbuster in his local cinema, has his plans scuppered when he encounters an old flame.

1078468.title: Potholes
1078468.plot: When two starkly different Somerset residents are both early to attend a local meeting in a village hall, they quickly find themselves at odds with one another’s world views…yet can they find common ground?

1078469.title: Open Country
1078469.plot: Up the hill, away from the coast, Alfie’s anger simmers at his cousin Rody; his mum’s physical health slowly deteriorating but Rody seemingly distant and unreachable. Months later, Rachel gone, the two grieving cousins tentatively reconnect.

1078471.title: Croak
1078471.plot: A disgraced Television presenter forms a pact with a desperate stranger.

1078480.title: L’Air de rien
1078480.plot: In a seaside sanatorium, an old man sees his life turned upside by the arrival of a seagull that he gently tames. When the gull is injured, the old man takes care of it and for a moment finds his childhood soul.

1078483.title: Boom
1078483.plot: A pair of clumsy birds try their best to protect their eggs from a volcanic eruption.

1078485.title: Passagers
1078485.plot: What happens when a building is abandoned?

1078487.title: Hellscape
1078487.plot: Brave and intrepid warrior Enyo is determined to find his mentor who is lost in Hell.

1078490.title: 21 Grams
1078490.plot: A film about the soul. This was made from love. love for people and love for the world.

1078507.title: The Veiled City
1078507.plot: In 1952, London was engulfed in the Great Smog. As a result of industrialisation, a leaden fog settled over the entire city. The archive images from this period become letters from a desolate future.

1078512.title: Bamboo
1078512.plot: Bamboo is a Marathi movie starring Abhinay Berde, Vaishanvi Kalyankar, Parth Bhalerao, Shivaji Satam and Samir Choughule in prominent roles. It is directed by Vishal Devrukhka.

1078522.title: Unfamiliar Cosmos Chapter 2
1078522.plot: Following their encounter in the cosmic void, Aries, a soldier from a bittersweet future, continues his search for John, A troubled man from the present, trapped in the endless unknown.

1078527.title: Status Quo
1078527.plot: Interfaith couple who have been dating for a long time talks about the future of their relationship. What will happen next?

1078537.title: Pretty Evil
1078537.plot: Trouble comes in heels, sass and irresistible eyes. Her name…? ESINDA

1078550.title: My Four Favorite Buttons
1078550.plot: These are my four favorite buttons.

1078553.title: Dan Nightingale: Smasher
1078553.plot: Dan Nightingale’s new stand-up special filmed live at the Mary's Creative Space, Chester

1078597.title: How the Holocaust Began
1078597.plot: Historian James Bulgin reveals the origins of the Holocaust in the German invasion of the Soviet Union, exploring the mass murder, collaboration and experimentation that led to the Final Solution.

1078615.title: Marc Maron: From Bleak to Dark
1078615.plot: Over the course of a hilarious and deeply personal hour, Maron explores such universal topics as getting older, antisemitism and faith, and the superiority of having cats over children - especially during the pandemic.

1078634.title: A Neighbor's Vendetta
1078634.plot: After her boss-turned-secret lover is found dead, architect Sonja vows to give her marriage another chance. She and her husband decide to make a fresh start and rent a remote cabin. But when an unexpected neighbor appears at their door, they soon discover that she’s linked to Sonja’s adulterous past and is intent on taking “an eye for an eye.”

1078636.title: All the World Is Sleeping
1078636.plot: Fighting for her own life and the ones she loves, a Chicana in New Mexico sinks deeper into her addiction while struggling to surface for her daughter.

1078641.title: The Big Snow of '82
1078641.plot: News archive, home movies and interviews with celebrities are combined to look back at the extreme weather that hit Britain in December and January 40 years ago. Stories covered include a deadly train crash caused by a blizzard, as well as the Penlee lifeboat disaster, daring motorway rescues and RAF helicopters delivering lifesaving parcels to stranded Highlanders.

1078648.title: PROVE2 - A Short Film
1078648.plot: A short film tying into Ricoth's upcoming project: "Prove2".

1078673.title: One Week
1078673.plot: A deteriorating romantic relationship between a young couple over the course of one week.

1078674.title: Bad Romance
1078674.plot: Rob is the loneliest of loners. He is so desperate to find love that he constructs an absurd (and quite cinematic) plot to meet and impress women: he is tracking a man by the name of Jack S. who killed his wife to seek revenge, which – to him – is obviously an insanely loyal and courageous thing to do. Hannah, a seductive bartender who used to be married to a man named Jack S., agrees to help Rob track him down – a perfect excuse to get closer to (the now single) Hannah and to do everything he can to become exactly who she wants in her ideal guy. But little does Rob know that some of the people he meets along the way have intentions that turn Rob’s reality upside down – or is it right-side up?

1078675.title: Krush The Wrestler
1078675.plot: Exploring the innate intimacy of submission wrestling, a lifelong wrestler turns his talents into an on-demand fetish video service.

1078679.title: Rock Collection
1078679.plot: A roommate receives a box from their father who works at Chernobyl.

1078681.title: Hypermoon
1078681.plot: Director Mia receives a life-changing announcement and begins a journey into her own history. We also follow the astronaut's lonely journey through space and the aging gangster Vincent who makes a surprising find in his basement.

1078685.title: Synthetic Flowers
1078685.plot: Summer is finally here, and a motley group of young people head through the Stockholm night in search of intoxication and closeness. Together they have created an oasis where they can be themselves, a group of friends with a mishmash of backgrounds and sexualities where no one apologizes to anyone. Over the course of a day, they move from forest raves to house parties, mixing alcohol and drugs with reflections on love and existence, right up to the inevitable going home. Blomster offers a playful and associative close-up of a group of young people’s search for belonging, seasoned with humor, civilizational criticism, and sensual realism.

1078686.title: Metallica - Sick of the Studio Tour - LIVE in Wien 2007

1078688.title: Langkah Renjana
1078688.plot: Tells the story of Renjana who lives abroad, far from his family and realizes that living overseas is not that easy.

1078689.title: Gallery of God
1078689.plot: Two weeks before the graduation exhibition at the art school, the new principal Jack von Rosen (Magnus Krepper) takes office. During his presentation, he presents business-oriented ideas and it turns out that he secretly represents an ancient society that wants to commercialize art. Meanwhile, one of the students, Irma (Isabelle Grill/Hilda Krepper), is commissioned by God to create the perfect work of art and thereby becomes a target for Jack and his company. The debuting directors from the collective KonstAB, however, do not let Irma stand alone in the fight, but give her support from the school’s two lecturers and not least a Danish Dadaist.

1078695.plot: A young man wakes up trapped in a room and without any memory of how he got there or who he is. He realises that nothing outside the room is real, causing him to question his own reality. Stuck in his own mind, he loses himself and lives his life aimlessly. Will he be able to break free?

1078711.title: The Happy Camper
1078711.plot: When Dillon's love life falls apart she returns to her grandfather's farm in Colorado, where she works with Jordan, a handsome hardware store owner, to restore a vintage 1960s travel trailer, and along the way, finds new love.

1078732.title: Sweet on You
1078732.plot: Kate, a small town pie shoppe owner, encounters city boy Drew who, unbeknownst to Kate, is in town to build tract homes that would run straight through her shoppe… until Drew finds his heart stuck between his family’s wishes and a chance at love.

1078743.title: The Good People of Orphan Ridge
1078743.plot: When an indie rock band sneaks into a haunted house to record their final album, they are met with more than they bargained for: fairies, banshees, and the ominous Innkeeper.

1078762.title: Electric Appalachia
1078762.plot: Using found archival footage, the film offers a meditation on electricity and modernity in East Tennessee. Compiled by Eric Dawson (director at the Tennessee Archive of Moving Image and Sound – TAMIS) with score written and performed by guitarist William Tyler and harpist Mary Lattimore.

1078764.title: Jim Jefferies: High n' Dry
1078764.plot: No topic is off limits for Jim Jefferies as he muses on stoned koalas, his dad’s vasectomy confusion and choosing between his hair and his sex drive.

1078800.title: What I Need
1078800.plot: The story of Jean who tries to reconnect with her lifelong friend and recent ex, Heather, after she is married and about to start a family with the man she left Jean for.

1078819.title: Sea of Black, Glimmer of Light
1078819.plot: Two lesbian lovers and their friend visit Redondo Beach on a December night.

1078856.title: Copenhagen Cowboy: Nightcall with Nicolas Winding Refn
1078856.plot: Show creator Nicolas Winding Refn and his team detail how they brought the stoic heroine and dark fairy tale version of Copenhagen's netherworld to life.

1078862.title: All the Places
1078862.plot: Two siblings who haven't seen each other in 15 years mend their relationship while fulfilling a childhood dream: a motorcycle road trip through Mexico.

1078881.title: Phoenix. Har/Jar
1078881.plot: Documentary on the Romanian rock band Phoenix.

1078882.title: Watch Me
1078882.plot: A stay at an ordinary motel turns into a night of terror for its guest.

1078899.title: SIAMO IN UN FILM DI ALBERTO SORDI?

1078903.title: The Skullduggery: Arcana
1078903.plot: Liz uses tarot cards to show The Thinking Skeleton the future of the bone cult.

1078905.title: Hilahil
1078905.plot: Chaos erupts as an uninvited guest interrupts three men having a casual drink.

1078917.title: Desiderium
1078917.plot: A man haunted by his past has to go back through his memories to find an element. But things don't work out as planned.

1078960.title: Into Particles
1078960.plot: In his first semester at an out-of-state university, Ison navigates new friendships and a romantic interest.

1078988.title: To Bits
1078988.plot: A struggling pre-med student falls apart—literally.

1079007.title: Table for one
1079007.plot: A grieving woman returns to the cafe where she and her husband used to frequent

1079018.title: Experiment 81 a Vacant Space Films Production
1079018.plot: A group of homeless strangers are selected to take part of an experiment involving an android.

1079025.title: 2023 Oscar Nominated Shorts: Documentary
1079025.plot: ShortsTV presents the Oscar-Nominated Short Films Documentary. Your annual chance to predict the winners.

1079028.title: Last Days
1079028.plot: A young woman leaving town decides to make amends with estranged members of her life.

1079041.title: Mensch Papa! Die Wissenschaft vom Vatersein

1079043.title: Une nouvelle histoire du peuplement des Amériques

1079046.title: Milan Kundera: The Unbearable Weight of History
1079046.plot: The unique and enigmatic journey of the writer Milan Kundera: from communist Czechoslovakia to exile in Paris, from his quest for glory to his withdrawal from the media scene.

1079047.title: 2023 Oscar Nominated Shorts: Animation
1079047.plot: ShortsTV presents the Oscar-Nominated Short Films Animation. Your annual chance to predict the winners.

1079049.title: 2023 Oscar Nominated Shorts: Live Action
1079049.plot: ShortsTV presents the Oscar-Nominated Short Films Live Action. Your annual chance to predict the winners.

1079054.title: Triskaïdékaphobie
1079054.plot: Friday the 13th, a day like any other for the mower, but not for the world of believers...

1079059.title: Eat Your Bread
1079059.plot: A short film following the mundane and private task of preparing a bagel

1079069.title: Beginning
1079069.plot: Nithya, an IT professional, gets abducted and locked up inside a room by masked strangers. A random call connects her to Bala Subramaniam, a youngster with intellectual disability. Can Bala with his low level of understanding save Nithya?

1079111.title: On Mothers and Daughters in Times of Injustice
1079111.plot: Through old letters, Merle revisits her past as an anti-Apartheid activist, which fractured her relationship with her mother forever. At the same time, she faces her privilege in today's South Africa and her own relationship with her daughter.

1079125.title: Untitled (VHS Tape)
1079125.plot: Artist Ser Serpas pushes around a wood pallet and a few other items.  Rafik Greiss shakily films on a low resolution VHS camera and occasionally speaks to Ser.  The audio is almost entirely loud static sound.

1079127.title: Astrogolem
1079127.plot: "Astrogolem" is a film about a love triangle set in a fantastical world where science and the supernatural collide. The story follows the brilliant inventor, Nikola Tesla, as he and Alan Turing accidentally release demons into our dimension. Desperate to find a solution, he turns to the renowned scientist, Robo-Marie Curie, for help. On his way he completely forgets about his mission as he has a huge crush on her and wants to seize the moment to confess his love. However he is shocked to learn that Robo-Marie Curie is in a relationship with the Astrogolem. The film tells a story of love, sacrifice, and the consequences of playing with powers beyond human understanding. It is a thrilling journey into a world where science and the supernatural coexist, and the choices we make have the power to shape our destiny.

1079135.title: Earth's Trial: Debunking Climate Change Myths
1079135.plot: In this courtroom drama, Mother Earth is sent to trial for the destruction she has brought upon humanity. The audience is faced with a moral dilemma of whether Earth should be held responsible for the loss of lives and habitat from extreme typhoons. Witnesses and experts are brought to the stand to disprove misconceptions about climate change.

1079141.title: 3C's: Communicating Climate Change
1079141.plot: The film directly communicates climate change's impact in this changing and progressing world, its causes and repercussions on Earth, and actions that must be taken to address these concerns. The surface knowledge of random teenage students was expressed and used in disseminating information about the current issues inclined to the climate crisis. The misconception that the youth are insensible about the alarming change in climate was also debunked. The film explains the significance of the environment in our lives. It principally aims to inform, educate, and raise consciousness about the necessity of communicating climate change. It tells us the narratives of the mechanisms of how climate change progressed throughout history and how it drastically changed the earth’s landscape.

1079143.title: Tanaw Juan
1079143.plot: As Juan, an errand boy, goes through his normal day routine, he casually explains scientific concepts and phenomena surrounding climate change with various encounters throughout his errand journey.  The team’s concept of climate change expression and communication is delivered through an interactive, engaging, and fun way transitioning into a motivational mood for a call for action as the film’s ending statement.

1079146.title: Sirak
1079146.plot: A small video explainer that communicates climate change through the greatest common denominator, the heat outside.

1079150.title: Marvels of Science: Climate Change
1079150.plot: Do you think that the COVID-19 pandemic and nuclear war are the only threat to humanity? An engaging film entitled “Marvels of Science: Climate Change” welcomes you again to the world of Science. This explanatory video pursues to educate and entertain its viewers at the same time. Hoping that all ages can understand today's biggest problem and how we can all be a hero to our world, this aims to promote awareness and responsibility to take action. The film encourages people that we don’t have to do something big; simple changes and actions have a significant impact. With Science, imagination, and collaborative effort, positive change is possible!

1079153.title: Banta
1079153.plot: This film tackles the ongoing underwater threat mostly caused by climate change, its possible effects and consequences if the ocean ecosystem has been destoyed.

1079154.title: Climacts
1079154.plot: A documentary film that highlights the root cause, drastic effects particularly system thinking, and both existing and developing actions with emphasis on systemic change. This also accentuates the thematic representation of climate change action in general.

1079156.title: Alan Partridge - Stratagem
1079156.plot: Devised, written, choreographed, performed and funded by Alan Partridge, Stratagem sees Alan not just treading the boards but pounding them, atop stages graced by such luminaries as Michael Ball, Jack Whitehall and Welsh rockers the Stereophonics.

1079161.title: K5 Katutubong Kahoy Kontra Krisis sa Klima
1079161.plot: A micro-documentary film focused on planting native trees for climate resilience and biodiversity conservation.  The film discusses how planting native trees, while limited, is an important nature-based solution for mitigating the climate crisis.

1079162.title: Awareness
1079162.plot: Inadequacy of knowledge of the locals around the peatland, human intervention is inevitable, expediting climate change. In spite of that, there's still hope for a change. Embarked on a journey in the Caimpugan Peatland, unmasking drawbacks and raising awareness (kamalayan).  To start with, our objective is to show the detrimental effects of the destruction of Peatlands specifically in Caimpugan Peatlands on Agusan del Sur. We immersed ourselves in the field to discover the dilemmas our locals face and gathered as much information as possible to put together an eye-opener film.  Having a glimpse of their reality, we concluded a solution that makes sense. Having little to no information about Peatlands only leads to more human interventions. In order to call for action it is necessary to address the subject matter. In the hopes of mitigating climate change, we must first raise awareness among the mass.

1079163.title: Marka ng Pawikan
1079163.plot: A short documentary film about the effects of climate change to the sea turtles of Morong, Bataan.  The concept of the team will be expressed in this film as our team will go Morong to experience the situation that is happening in that are in regards of the sea turtles.

1079170.title: Operation Fryday
1079170.plot: Police informer Ghulam holds the force responsible when his brother gets killed in a gang war.

1079174.plot: In suburban housing estates in France, young people are wishing for money and success. Their dreams even clog up the air conditioning ducts until everything begins to drip. What might happen if you swallow light?

1079202.title: Meter i sekundet
1079202.plot: It follows a Copenhagen couple's new life at a West Jutland folk high school.

1079203.title: Circle of Deception
1079203.plot: A lonely, hard-working African-Australian woman falls in love online with a man from her old village in Africa. She plans to bring him to Australia, but her mother despises the idea of marriage and all who surround her have hidden agendas.

1079211.title: The Blackened Path
1079211.plot: A local Detective and an out of state FBI Agent investigate the strange vanishing of a lone driver on a desolate road.

1079230.title: Delusional
1079230.plot: The perfect wife kills her war hero husband because of obsession, jealousy and deceit. While being evaluated to stand trial, her convincing manner sends her doctor to find her invisible and drives an orderly to the brink.

1079233.title: Melting Ink
1079233.plot: In 2020, the author Anatol Regnier published Jeder schreibt für sich allein, a book that examines the life and work of writers in Nazi Germany. In collaboration with Regnier, Dominik Graf, Constantin Lieband, and Felix von Boehm have adapted this book into a polyphonic essay film of the same name  – almost three hours in duration – that takes a meticulous look at the contradictory biographies of Hans Fallada, Gottfried Benn, Erich Kästner, Ina Seidel and Will Vesper.

1079235.title: Cabin Tales
1079235.plot: Some college age friends spend a weekend at a Cabin telling spooky stories until they end up having their own creepy encounter.

1079246.title: 700K
1079246.plot: A group of the kids broke off from Illegal Civ and are proud to present their first full length video, "700k"

1079252.title: Legendär! Queens of Music - Eine Zeitreise mit Riccardo Simonetti

1079263.title: the films we almost saw last summer or (maybe we should turn off the lights)

1079268.title: Jake Paul vs. Tommy Fury
1079268.plot: Jake Paul and Tommy Fury finally meet in Saudi Arabia February 26.

1079271.title: A Big Happy Occasion
1079271.plot: Car mechanic Li Dajun and manicurist Liu Mei, two young people who are in love with each other, set a wedding date at the engagement party, but at the same time, Li Dajun also received a challenge from his father-in-law, Liu Kegian - 500,000 yuan bride price. For Li Dajun, it was almost an impossible task to come up with a bride price of 500,000 yuan in three months. So Li Dajun and Liu Mei started to fight with Liu Kejian, and the process was full of laughs.

1079293.title: New Year’s Evil - 20/20 Special
1079293.plot: The story of what happens when Shele Covlin — a 47-year-old mother of two and successful banker — is found dead in her bathtub in her luxury apartment on the Upper West Side of Manhattan, it seems at first like a tragic accident. But family members quickly grow suspicious of her estranged husband, Rod Covlin, especially after authorities exhume her body and come to a shocking conclusion: Shele was strangled.

1079318.title: Serge Lama, la vie à la folie
1079318.plot: Serge Lama is the author of huge popular successes for more than 60 years: "Je suis malade", "Femme, femme, femme" or "Les Ballons rouges" have gone through the fashion. In this documentary, Serge Lama reveals himself to Mireille Dumas as he had never done before. The artist comes back on the important moments of his life. He talks about love, about the women he has sung to throughout his career, about his possessive and tyrannical mother, about his father, an operetta singer who became a beer merchant out of necessity, and who he would like to avenge at all costs by shining on the stage of the Olympia. He also tells of the pain of having lost his first love in a terrible accident.

1079325.title: 27 Storeys
1079325.plot: 27 floors, 10,000 residents*: The world-famous residential park Alterlaa in Vienna is considered an iconic monument of social utopia. In 27 STOREYS, director Bianca Gleissinger goes back to the place of her childhood, traces the young and old residents of this biotope with a great deal of humor and self-irony, and puts the architect's former promise of happiness to the test.

1079327.title: Requiem Fur a Dream
1079327.plot: Following a life changing event, a waning superstar attempts to navigate a world that no longer appreciates him.

1079352.title: Tomorrow's Game
1079352.plot: On the day of his Uncle's ascendance into the Hall of Fame, Daniel is forced to embark on a journey through time that sees him restore his family's legacy and rewrite baseball history.

1079373.title: Blood Moon
1079373.plot: A young woman attempts to escape her past by emigrating to the moon colony of Ganymede only to have her past catch up with her

1079378.title: Poacher
1079378.plot: A group of Indian Forest Service officers, NGO workers, police constables and Good Samaritans risk their lives trying to track down the biggest elephant ivory poachers in the history of India and bring them to justice.

1079394.title: The Five
1079394.plot: A scorned woman enlist the help of five strangers to execute a bank robbery. Tensions rise as the men anxiously await her arrival with the money, leaving the crew to wonder if they have been betrayed.

1079405.title: Supression
1079405.plot: A single-parented girl who has to help her father who had an accident at home

1079438.title: Subriel Matias vs. Jeremias Ponce
1079438.plot: Top super lightweight contenders will square off as popular knockout artist Subriel Matías meets undefeated Argentinian Jeremías Ponce for the vacant IBF Super Lightweight World Championship.

1079450.title: The Nomad
1079450.plot: When a reporter filming a story about a serial killer targeting the city’s priests comes face to face with the killer, she must choose between turning him in and finishing the story or directing him towards her abusive father and finishing her own.

1079458.title: Red Pages: Part I
1079458.plot: Struggling writer has horrible, vivid nightmares that have real life consequences.

1079463.title: 90 Seconds
1079463.plot: The world is coming to an end terror fills my bones I'm supposed to be an adult but on the inside I'm just a scared boy crying for his mum to come save him from this inevitable destruction.

1079473.title: No Running
1079473.plot: A student waits for the bell to ring before bolting out of class. Their teacher follows in hot pursuit, not only to stop the student but to discover their intended destination.

1079489.title: Ádám Wilds
1079489.plot: Ádám's playthrough of the game Outer Wilds

1079490.title: Jay Briscoe: Celebration of Life
1079490.plot: The three-hour show includes new matches, classic Jay Briscoe matches and testimonials from many wrestlers and staff who knew him.

1079491.title: My Daughter's Deadly Roommates
1079491.plot: New beginnings have disastrous consequences as a young woman starts college and quickly finds herself trapped inside a secret society that has sinister motives. As the society isolates her from her family with increasing intensity, she must decide whether to resign herself to their deadly manipulation, or if she will fight back to stop them once and for all.  ~Courtesy of MyLifetime.com

1079493.title: The ACTUAL History of Bloons
1079493.plot: Still not as crazy as the eets is Btd6. This took so long to make, finally its here

1079498.title: A UFO Intruder
1079498.plot: Taki joins the UFO Research Laboratory (URL) trying to find his wife and children kidnapped by the aliens.

1079517.title: Customers 2
1079517.plot: Over a year after their meetcute in a grocery store, Mark and Delaney prepare to spend a couple weeks at Delaney's parents place, but Delaney must attend an art exhibition first.

1079531.title: Cash from Chaos/Unicorns and Rainbows
1079531.plot: Broadcast between 1994 and 1997, this work spans three years and more than 50 hours of footage. While it figures into a rich tradition of artists using television against itself—bookended by figures from Andy Warhol and Jaime Davidovich to Ryan Trecartin—a broadcast of this scope by artists remains unprecedented. In this installment of Hyundai Card Video Views, we’re presenting 60-plus minutes of a “super-edit” intended to distill the essence of this epic project.

1079545.title: Cherish & Ruelle
1079545.plot: About a fashion designer named Cherish who wants to buy back her childhood home.
