Helped by Ruelle, her best friend, she also accepts the offer of a mysterious man called by the Dealer to steal a wedding dress worth tens of billions of rupiah belonging to a controversial businessman named Richella. Can they do it?

1079592.title: Lake Bastion
1079592.plot: After being written out of the family will, a grieving grandson delves into the mysterious circumstances surrounding his grandfathers death, and the company he once worked for.

1079637.title: Louis de Funès, le rire éternel
1079637.plot: On the occasion of the fortieth anniversary of the death of Louis de Funès, this documentary by Jacques Pessis pays tribute to the cult actor by retracing his career through excerpts of his greatest successes in the cinema and in the music hall, never-before-seen archives, as well as testimonies from personalities and relatives.

1079643.title: Devil Beneath
1079643.plot: Two estranged brothers come together and discover old family secrets after inheriting their grandfather's property. As their friends start to go missing, they fear they are being stalked by a creature lurking in the shadows.

1079657.title: Reflections
1079657.plot: Adrift in space, an astronaut reflects on the life events that led to his dire situation.

1079661.title: France-Allemagne, un couple en thérapie
1079661.plot: Sixty years after the signing of the Élysée Treaty, which opened an unprecedented era of cooperation between the two countries, how is the Franco-German tandem doing? An enlightening assessment, at a time when the war in Ukraine is shaking the world order.

1079664.title: Ako Si Ninoy
1079664.plot: A musical film that chronicles the life and tragic death of Philippine former Senator Benigno "Ninoy" Aquino Jr.

1079667.title: A Alegria é a Prova dos Nove
1079667.plot: A film about love, also a memoir, about the trip made in the 1970s to Morocco by Jarda Ícone, an artist, sexologist, and octogenarian rocker, as she defines herself, and Lírio Terron, a human rights activist. In fact, a journey that is not over in their lives. Jarda Icon teaches classes on how women can obtain their own orgasm. With her group of disciples and friends Ana Brasil, Sheyla Fernanda, Caroline Sylvie and Lakshmi she develops self-sustainable feminist and artistic projects. The film is political, but not at all politicized in the traditional sense. It is an ode to the underground and counterculture movements, it is a hymn to freedom, and its title is also a tribute to Oswald d Andrade, one of the main names in Brazilian modernism.

1079710.title: Il posto più bello del mondo

1079717.title: Adrien Broner vs. Michael Williams Jr
1079717.plot: Adrien Broner will square off against Michael Williams Jr on Saturday 25th February 2023 at Gateway Center Arena in College Park.

1079722.title: Alright Forever
1079722.plot: Director Jeff Richards sets out to prove that the global COVID pandemic has created shared trauma. As he interviews people directly affected by this event, he struggles with his own health anxiety that stemmed from the pandemic.

1079725.title: 5G: The Reckoning
1079725.plot: Eight students are in lockdown at their college dorm following a global pandemic, unable to connect to the outside world. They soon realize they are victims of a far more sinister and unexpected entity.

1079737.title: Gone West
1079737.plot: It's been one year since teenage boy Xander was dealt a sudden and tragic loss. Now he must confront the people from his life he has since pushed away.

1079760.title: My friend Vincent
1079760.plot: A man trying to reconnect with an old friend, a suit-wearing ape named Vincent, leaves him a package containing pictures, a letter....and a banana. As Vincent's past haunts him in the form of fruit, the ape loses his mind.

1079789.title: Cupboard of Visions
1079789.plot: After stepping out of a mysterious cupboard, a boy finds himself in a state of distress and disarray.

1079827.title: Sweet Tooth
1079827.plot: Madeleine go with her mother, a mobile esthetician, at new customer's home in a fancy neighborhood. The 8 years old girl is sent in the game room and three girls invite her to play around a board game. But she has to bet money, which Madeleine has not.

1079840.title: NOT WORKING NO NO WORK
1079840.plot: The folding in of days spent in an office. A call to not work

1079841.title: The Interrogation
1079841.plot: A man wakes up in a chair in a pitch black room: he’s covered in blood, beaten and bruised, laying in his own bloody vomit, and has no recollection of what came before. Until a strange man dressed in black enters the room to question him…

1079846.title: Train 5639
1079846.plot: 5639/5640 Green Leather Slow Train, the "mountain bus", has maintained low fares during more than 20 years of operation. You can get a rare income in remote mountainous areas.\r This film reflects the humanistic care of Train 5639 by showing the deep friendship between Wu Wenzhen and other vegetable farmers and the people and things on Train 5639.\r This trip The train serves as a bridge for the Miao villagers to communicate with the outside world, and it carries the desire of the mountain villagers to live a happy life. It is not the speed that is slow, but the patience to keep pace with the low- and middle-income people.

1079875.title: Ádám Wilds - The Movie
1079875.plot: The playthrough of Ádám of the game Outer Wilds

1079890.title: Watch Out
1079890.plot: A man who is travelling on a train finds it's difficult to take pictures of the view, so he comes up with a unique solution.

1079892.title: Artur Beterbiev vs. Anthony Yarde
1079892.plot: WBC/IBF/WBO light heavyweight world champion Artur Beterbiev (18-0, 18 KOs), boxing's only world champion with a 100 percent knockout rate, will battle England's big-punching Anthony Yarde (23-2, 22 KOs) on Saturday evening at OVO Arena Wembley.

1079893.title: Women under Hitler's Flag
1079893.plot: German women may be perceived as passive witnesses to the horrific crimes committed by the Nazi regime, but many were active participants that were as brutal and merciless as their better-known, male counterparts. Over the past 15 years, a new generation of international historians has been digging into the truth of how deeply the Third Reich’s women were involved in the atrocities.  Combining their fresh analyses with striking archival footage, this film reveals previously unknown stories about the women who refused to live in the shadow of Nazi men.

1079895.title: Shiringa: Amazon White Gold
1079895.plot: Jorge Escompani is a "Shiringa" master, "Shiringa" is a tree which produces natural latex. This is considered a tradition that preserves great passion and environmental awareness. The extraction of latex from the Shiringa tree led to the death of thousands of indigenous people due to slavery during "the fever of latex" in the 19th century.

1079897.title: Retrospection
1079897.plot: An Alzheimer's patient comes home calling out for his wife. As he walks through the house visions of his past surround him, until his caretaker, Sam, brings him back to reality and reveals the truth behind his life.

1079899.title: Ramblings of a Middle-Aged Drag Queen
1079899.plot: A prying journalism student interviews a world-wearied drag queen about her life and career.

1079900.title: Peanut Butter
1079900.plot: Dan is fed up. Fed up with his misfortunes, fed up with his bad luck and fed up with his life. He decided to end it by eating his last ban: peanuts.  Adapted from the eponymous tale of Jérome Bérubé

1079902.title: Go On and Bleed
1079902.plot: Heading north to avoid the US draft in the summer of 1971, Monty meets the beautiful, enigmatic Marianne. They share an unexpected connection yet when he awakes, she is gone. He spends the rest of the heady summer thinking of her, as he begins to realize the land to which he ran is not as benign as imagined.

1079903.title: Gentle Hum of Spring
1079903.plot: As the spring thaw approaches in Saskatchewan, a young beekeeper struggles to maintain his bee colonies.

1079904.title: Fruitfly
1079904.plot: A sardonic comedy about depression in the spirit of "Twilight Zone". Amelia invites her sister Olive to stay with her, which she soon regrets as Olive sets them off on a road trip in search for Euphoria.

1079905.title: For Roy
1079905.plot: Inspired by true events, an imaginative Asian-Canadian girl attempts to fold a thousand cranes as she learns to lose her father during his final days in the hospice.

1079907.title: Closed System
1079907.plot: A genetically modified invasive species, bred to eat plastic and spin it into rope, makes a bid for freedom in the last wilderness on earth. A dutiful scientist is sent by a ruthless algorithm to hunt it down and destroy it. As she experiences the forest for the first time in her life, the scientist begins to question everything she has been taught about pollution, conservation, and the mythos of the untouched wilderness.

1079912.title: Sarah
1079912.plot: An abstract portrait, based on a true story, of a young woman experiencing homelessness on the streets of Hamilton, Ontario.  Adapted From: Conversations Around a Table by Kelly Wolf  Based on: Tree of Stars by Jessica Compton

1079913.title: The Perfect Game
1079913.plot: Canadian five pin bowling champion Jim Noggins strives to score a perfect game while trying to raise his daughter who he struggles to relate to.

1079914.title: Fall
1079914.plot: A man spends a seemingly interminable night alone in a hotel room, avoiding contact with the world outside and besieged by insomnia, boredom and a faulty air conditioner.

1079917.title: Currents
1079917.plot: Emma, ​​a young actress, is stuck working odd jobs to make ends meet while waiting for her career to take off. For the next few weeks, she is housesitting for a rich couple, in the suburbs of Geneva, who are gone on a ski trip. Her days are far from full. Little by little, the house seems to take an unexpected effect on her.

1079919.title: Becoming Tom Thomson
1079919.plot: Becoming Tom Thomson is about an actor researching a character for an upcoming feature film that is inspired by Canadian wilderness painter Tom Thomson who died mysteriously in Algonquin Park in 1917. From learning to paint, canoe and fish to camping and fending off bears the host takes the audience on a journey back in time, scouting some of the locations that inspired the Canadian icon while also gaining first hand experience about what might have taken the young artist's life. The film won the Outstanding Northern Ontario Short Film Award at Sudbury Cinefest.

1079931.title: Mowes
1079931.plot: Jan works at her father's old fashioned clothing shop but her life is about to change when singer Helen comes in to buy a suit.

1079934.title: Carnage Collection: Deadly Dollies
1079934.plot: The most horrific scenes from some of Full Moon's most ferocious killer doll classics.

1079939.title: Tales of the Fantastic
1079939.plot: More fantastical family fun from the Moonbeam library.

1079982.title: Funtown Journey Into The Living Land
1079982.plot: A short film by Alice Avery

1080050.title: Velvet Suite
1080050.plot: From https://www.roxycinemanewyork.com/screenings/the-velvet-suite/:  "Velvet Suite is a 38 min. documentary of a concert event of the same name he recently staged with Lee Ranaldo and others interpreting the music of the Velvet Underground before a live audience in Spain. Ignacio Julia is a filmmaker and writer who published the book Linger On: The Velvet Underground through Thurston and Eva Moore’s imprint Ecstatic Peace Library. Ignacio is the editor of Spain’s Ruta 66 and the author of several music books."

1080065.title: INTRUDr
1080065.plot: In a near-future world where petty thieves use the dark web to coordinate robberies, a destitute burglar is confronted with a malevolent presence in an apartment she found online.

1080068.title: NWA Nuff Said
1080068.plot: In the main event the NWA World's Heavyweight Champion "The Great American Smash" Tyrus will put the 10 lbs of gold on the line against the man that has never been pinned or submitted for the title he had to relinquish due to injury, "Alwayz Ready" Matt Cardona!

1080093.title: Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd Solo Live "Shout in Crisis"
1080093.plot: A girl appears like a comet, shining small and bright. Her glorious singing voice overlaps with more than a million stars. Finally, the second stage arrives. Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd solo live, "Shout in Crisis". Let's observe together a dreamlike moment spent in the galaxy. Features old favorites from her first album "Still Still Stellar" and many new hits from her 2nd album "Specter"!

1080125.title: Achala
1080125.plot: It showcases a personal message between the artist's mother and her sister. They discuss keeping in touch through pictures, which represents a form of exchange for their monitored communications.

1080126.title: BKFC 35: Cedeno vs. Slaveski
1080126.plot: BKFC 35: Cedeno vs. Slaveski was a bare-knuckle fighting event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on January 27, 2023, at the John T. Rhodes Sports Center in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, USA.

1080129.title: Domino 23 - Gli ultimi non saranno i primi

1080130.title: AI: African Intelligence
1080130.plot: It showcases the contact zones between African rituals of possession within traditional fishing villages and the emergence of new technological frontiers known as Artificial Intelligence.

1080132.title: ONE Friday Fights 2: Sangmanee vs. Kulabdam
1080132.plot: ONE Friday Fights 2 took place Friday, January 27, 2023 with 11 fights at Lumpinee Boxing Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand.

1080136.title: Borrowing a Family Album
1080136.plot: Tamer El Said appropriates another family’s amateur footage to reclaim a memory of a lost sibling. The installation invites visitors to look for their own recollections in the same footage, creating an act of collective remembrance in the process.

1080137.title: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 2/Women's Featherweights
1080137.plot: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 2/Women's Featherweights was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 3, 2023 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.

1080138.title: Dancing Boy
1080138.plot: It showcases a joyful moment of a child dancing to a contemporary Tibetan song in a Tibetan home. The boy looks straight at the camera humorously and charmingly.

1080139.title: Desert Dreaming
1080139.plot: Sri Lankan labor migration to the Middle East, using popular culture and anecdotal, intimate recollections to challenge monolithic narratives of personal history and middle-class Muslim upbringing.

1080140.title: The early rains which wash away the chaff before the spring rains
1080140.plot: The title of this film translates to the Shona word “Gukurahundi,” a cynical euphemism which refers to a series of massacres, executed in wake of Zimbabwe’s liberation. The work unfolds as a mosaic, evoking ghosts in the shape of nationhood and ancestry.

1080141.title: Home Invasion
1080141.plot: A nightmarish essay film on the history of the doorbell, tracing its invention and constant reinventions through 19th century labor struggles, the nascent years of narrative cinema, and contemporary surveillance cultures.

1080143.title: ONE Friday Fights 1: Nong-O vs. Ramazanov
1080143.plot: ONE Friday Fights 1 took place Friday, January 20, 2023 with 12 fights at Lumpinee Boxing Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand.

1080144.title: If You Don’t Watch the Way You Move
1080144.plot: If You Don't Watch the Way You Move features Derek "Dripp" Whitfield Jr. and Taymond "choSkii" Hughes of the music group BmE composing and recording their latest composition, "Shiesty", in the Columbus, Mississippi studio of Jermaine "Country Blakk" Brown only to be interrupted by a John Cage score.

1080147.title: Mangosteen
1080147.plot: A story about storytelling: After returning to his hometown to work in his sister’s fruit processing factory, Earth slowly but surely pulls out of the family business to dedicate himself to writing an abstract, gory novel.

1080148.title: Our Daughters Shall Inherit the Wealth of Our Stories: The Imaginactivism of Yugantar Film Collective

1080151.title: Father Mother
1080151.plot: A 2-channel-video on feelings around familial expressions of care, language, identity, and memories of and longing for a lost homeland, which are expressed unspoken.

1080153.title: Scenes of Extraction
1080153.plot: An archival constellation from the still and moving images of the British Petroleum Archives, documenting the expansive colonial network behind the British geophysical expeditions that spanned across Iran in the early 20th century.

1080154.title: Simia: Stratagem for Undestining
1080154.plot: Speculation as a method for worldmaking: Simia was created in conversation with the fictitious artificial intelligence program Project Simiyaa, which aims to create a planned economy and manage infrastructural commons across Africa and the Middle East.

1080157.title: Summer Grass
1080157.plot: On a Typical day on the sunny grasslands of Tibet, offering a rare glimpse of daily life shared between two family members that have been separated for over 40 years.

1080159.title: Tartupaluk (Prototype)
1080159.plot: Invites the viewers to the eponymous island state in the Arctic north between Canada and Greenland.

1080164.title: Trip After
1080164.plot: It showcases a travel vlog inspired by the reports of the 1960s United States Information Service mobile film units' field trips for anti-communist psychological operations in Thailand.

1080167.title: In-between World
1080167.plot: It showcases stories of migrants and their descendants in Germany: a monument for a Pakistani poet, the payslips of a Turkish Gastarbeiter, three sisters turning a decolonial gaze on Bavarian history.

1080178.title: The Funeral, the Bijouterie and an Occasional Coat

1080195.title: Ascension
1080195.plot: Eight students are in lockdown at their college dorm following a global pandemic, unable to connect to the outside world. They soon realize they are victims of a far more sinister and unexpected entity.

1080217.title: Lagaslas
1080217.plot: A wild and wet erotic drama thriller starring newest sexy actress Manang Medina. A young man named Edmar falls madly in love with Karisma, a barrio lass. Will he still love her if he finds out Karisma's deepest darkest secret?

1080238.title: Roy Orbison At The BBC
1080238.plot: A deep-dive into the BBC’s archives to celebrate the great Roy Orbison – full-time rock 'n’ roll legend, part-time Traveling Wilbury and the man Elvis famously described as ‘the best singer in the world’.  The Big O’s story was in many ways a tragic one, full of family tragedies and heartbreak, and his extraordinary voice captured all those emotions and more, bringing a new dimension to popular music. This programme features some of the hits that had fans eraptured and fellow music superstars singing his praises, with performances from his many visits to the UK including Only the Lonely, Crying and Oh Pretty Woman.

1080239.title: Surprise
1080239.plot: As the successful actor Ingrid arrives at her daughter's 35th birthday party, her unexpected return is not as well received as she has hoped. Instead, her years as an absent mother come to the fore and the gap between mother and daughter are felt to be an abyss.

1080242.title: Royal Rumble 2023
1080242.plot: In the main event of WWE's Royal Rumble 2023 the fan favorite Sami Zayn turns on Roman Reigns and the Bloodline. A story of love and betrayal, will Sami Zayn go on to defeat his former tribal chief?

1080271.title: Tom Wants Home
1080271.plot: Gary and Tom are father and son - and both deaf. They are on holiday, hitchhiking on motorway services to head South. For Gary, it's all very exciting, but Tom wishes they could be driving like everybody else.

1080276.title: Container Scanning
1080276.plot: Company lingo and middle-aged, middle class comfort as Jens Bejemyr is introduced to colleagues at a new job. A simultaneously humorous and sharp observation of a world free of conflict, where the dialog chugs along without aim.

1080282.title: The Haunting of Julia Fields
1080282.plot: A young woman from a small town moves out on her own for the first time only to realize something sinister lurking inside her new home.

1080286.title: Last Stop
1080286.plot: A teenage girl is forced to upend her life after accidentally getting pregnant.

1080300.title: Neon Cactus
1080300.plot: Stanley Cooper is an east coast transplant to Texas. His new marriage to Maureen is on the rocks as she pines after her deceased husband, J.R. Both approach a shady character named Johnny Rocket to murder the other.

1080304.title: It's Just a Parcel
1080304.plot: A mysterious unmarked parcel becomes the obsession of a girl whose greatest fear lies within

1080305.title: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 3/Heavyweights
1080305.plot: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 3/Heavyweights was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 10, 2023 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.

1080307.title: CTV205: Mon histoire du cinéma
1080307.plot: Mete Kaan's love letter to cinema.

1080313.title: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 4/Lightweights
1080313.plot: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 3/Lightweights was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 17, 2023 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.

1080319.title: Galatea
1080319.plot: A lifeless woman’s body is found wrapped in plastic in the woods. Who is she and how did she get there? Hampus and Arvida Byström’s debut film is a suggestive Nordic noir that asks unconventional questions about the woman’s role in the lonely man’s sexual impulses.

1080320.title: Palookaville
1080320.plot: Grand Jury Award Winner - Slamdance 2023 Jury's notes: “With idiosyncratic music choices, sibling chemistry out the wazoo, and a philosophical Brooklynite as the series lead (played by Howard Lester in his introductory role), Theodore Collatos’s Palookaville explores the surreal existence of JoJo, a man victimized by a random act of violence who now thinks he’s the famous defunct boxer/anti-fascist, Joe Louis. Will you believe that JoJo’s become the Brown Bomber? Doesn’t matter, because you will believe in Palookaville.”

1080322.title: I Think of Silences When I Think of You
1080322.plot: A wedding in Ghana, a trip across the sea, and a new home in Europe. Using both archival material and new images, Jonelle Twum takes us on a poetic journey where the silence tells of a woman’s life and dreams.

1080324.title: Vernissage
1080324.plot: After a rough sex act, Simon and Siván meet at couples therapy to talk through the distance that Simon experiences between them. In the domains of the cultural elite, where aesthetics triumph most things, a relationship on the rocks is pushed to the pressure point.

1080325.title: Twerk for Yemen
1080325.plot: A dedicated documentary filmmaker follows in Lena Nyman’s footsteps and asks people on town what they are to do about the war in Yemen. The reactions she meets and the answers she gets are at the same time deeply disheartening and uncontrollably entertaining.

1080335.title: The Long Shadow
1080335.plot: A blissfully unaware podcast listener's evening stroll for toilet roll takes a nightmarish turn in this one-take comedy horror short.

1080338.title: The First Hour
1080338.plot: Germany 1945 – the Third Reich has just collapsed and the first Allied troops are moving in. What happened in the first hour after the end of the Second World War? Re-enacted scenes alternate with the accounts of eyewitnesses, not many of whom are likely to be alive by now.

1080341.title: Eight Brothers and Sisters
1080341.plot: “Acht Geschwister” by Christoph Weinert is a tribute to sibling life, a piece of non-fictional narrative cinema. The film tells the story of two sisters and six brothers who were born between 1933 and 1943 and grew up on a farm in a small village in Pomerania. With their intertwined, very different lives, the film tells not only the story of the eight siblings and their common escape with their parents after the end of World War 2, but also a piece of recent German history, when the siblings are separated by the inner-German border for over 40 years during the Cold War. Nevertheless, the contact between them never breaks.

1080347.title: The Tortured and the Hare
1080347.plot: Four people are living their normal lives when they are mysteriously transported to a strange basement. When they try to find a way out, things take a turn.

1080359.title: Addiction
1080359.plot: A short film in which one character wants a drug and another character scares them.

1080386.title: Stardom Triangle Derby I in Korakuen Hall
1080386.plot: Triangle Derby I is the first annual round-robin six-woman tag team tournament event promoted by World Wonder Ring Stardom.  Singles Match  Rina Amikura vs. Waka Tsukiyama  Tag Team Match  Lady C & Maika vs. Neo Stardom Army (Yuna Mizumori & Yuu)  Triangle Derby I Match  STARS (Hazuki, Koguma & Saya Iida) vs. STARS (Hanan, Mayu Iwatani & Momo Kohgo)  Eight Man Tag Team Match  Queen's Quest (AZM, Miyu Amasaki, Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita) vs. Oedo Tai (Natsuko Tora, Rina, Ruaka & Saki Kashima)  Three Way Nine Man Tag Team Match  Natsupoi, SAKI & Yuko Sakurai vs. Donna del Mondo (Giulia, Mai Sakurai & Thekla) vs. Rebel X Enemy (Maika Ozaki, Maya Yukihi & Ram Kaicho)  Triangle Derby I Match  God's Eye (Ami Sourei, MIRAI & Syuri) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)

1080388.title: I Have Arrived, I Am Home
1080388.plot: Made specially for the first anniversary of the passing of Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh, "I Have Arrived, I Am Home" is a new documentary from filmmaker Max Pugh (A Cloud Never Dies, Walk With Me). The film includes footage and commentary on Thich Nhat Hanh's return to his native Vietnam, where he lived from 2018 until his passing on 22 January 2022. It also traces his continuation through monastic and lay students at Plum Village practice centers around the world.

1080396.title: Les chenilles
1080396.plot: Two women meet as waitresses and tentatively become friends. They are both from the Levant and living in exile in France. A film about the Silk Road, about exploitation – then and now – and about female solidarity, friendship and solace.

1080431.title: From Fish to Moon
1080431.plot: A small supermarket somewhere in the American backwoods. The staff come in early, drink coffee and restock the shelves. They chat about the air conditioning, would like to read poetry in peace and sometimes even get lucky on the slot machine.

1080432.title: Happy Doom
1080432.plot: Flickering and pulsating, spitting and swallowing at the same time. The screen becomes a vibrating membrane; colours, shapes, beats and sounds a psychedelic whirlpool. A short, fast-paced audiovisual ode to the hypnotic power of colour and vertigo.

1080434.title: A Kind of Testament
1080434.plot: A young woman comes across animations on the Internet that have clearly been created from her private selfies. A stranger with the same name confesses to identity theft. But death is quicker than the answer to the question: “Why?”

1080440.title: The Beads
1080440.plot: Two young women retreat to a remote holiday home. While one of them undertakes a medical abortion, the other quietly cares for her. A snake slithers around them, unnoticed.

1080441.title: Freddie
1080441.plot: Freddie Mercury was known for his flamboyant stage persona and four-octave vocal range - the lead singer of Queen defied the conventions of a typical rock frontman. He paved the way for many contemporary artists to have a more confident and theatrical act which indelibly shaped the next generation of pop and rock music. From working as a baggage handler at Heathrow airport to hiding his HIV diagnosis from the public until just before his death, Mercury's life was filled with adventure, publicity, and perhaps above all, a clear duality. He was both flamboyant and shy, outspoken and intensely private. The illness that claimed his life could never have defined Freddie, and now, years later, his legacy is greater than he could have ever imagined.

1080442.title: A Woman in Makueni
1080442.plot: She is in prison, waiting. But he has a long way to travel and arrives too late. He wanders through the strange city, lost, until he meets a woman who is willing to help him with some gentle magic.

1080444.title: Terra Mater - Mother Land
1080444.plot: There she stands, confidently, like a goddess of technological junk, surrounded by endless mountains of rubbish, plastic, stench and rare earths. Her accusations are angry, composed and to the point.

1080445.title: The Waiting
1080445.plot: A biologist describes her research into various species of frogs in the rainforest of Central America and their mysterious disappearance as if it were a criminal case. Brilliantly animated drawings accompany her vivid scientific analysis.

1080466.title: 1FPS
1080466.plot: In the far reaches of no man's land, a battle rages like no other.  It's gunfire pounds like a drum, with gore that rains over the wasteland like a tsunami. It seems infinite, an endless barrage of hardship and suffering. Until one day, when a rogue soldier rises from the ashes and ends it all.  This is the story, of a war so deadly, you can barely see it. This is 1FPS.

1080481.title: Call Me Dancer
1080481.plot: Follows a young talented street dancer from Mumbai whose parents' insistence is that he follow a traditional path. While he is determined to be a professional dancer, but the odds are stacked against him.

1080499.title: Aurora
1080499.plot: It follows Kenny Gaines, who is set to marry. On the day of the wedding, the bride mysteriously disappears and sets off a chain of events that unearths secrets, lies and betrayal.

1080506.title: Danse Éphémère
1080506.plot: Alex, late to a party, makes a horrible discovery on the way.

1080512.title: Pandemonium
1080512.plot: Nathan and Daniel wake at the scene of a car crash, confused and seemingly unscathed. The two men begin to understand that they did not make it after all. Nathan’s past acts will now determine his fate, however reprehensible they may have been. He will have to leave this earthly world and enter the depths of Hell, where is confronted with other tormented souls and forced to experience their pain, too. Jeanne, a psychotic little girl whose parents are frightened as she is prone to violence; Julia, who spiralled out of control after her daughter’s suicide. But this is only the beginning…  From the creative mind of artist Quarxx, comes this aesthetically stunning and relentlessly macabre tale.

1080539.title: Riverside - ID.Entity
1080539.plot: Finally, the new studio album from RIVERSIDE, Poland's pioneering and leading progressive rock band! As a follow-up to the 2018 album 'Wasteland' which peaked at #13 in Germany, #28 in the Netherlands, #23 in Switzerland, #39 in Austria, #83 in the UK, #30 in Finland, #30 in France Having entered the charts at number 97, in the Czech Republic at number 59 and in Poland at number 1, the new album 'ID.Entity' expands on RIVERSIDE's signature sound, but in a reworked and more dynamic form. Recorded and mixed in two studios (The Boogie Town Studio in Otwock with Paweł Marciniak and Serakos Studio in Warsaw with Magda and Robert Srzedniccy), the album was mastered by Robert Szydło and produced by Mariusz Duda of RIVERSIDE himself. 'ID. Entity' marks a remarkable start to the third decade in RIVERSIDE's career.

1080543.title: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 5/Women's Flyweights
1080543.plot: PFL Challenger Series 2023: Week 5/Women's Flyweights was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 24, 2023 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.

1080548.title: What a Peach Is
1080548.plot: Julian has agreed to help Henry make his first film--but, on the day of shooting, Julian shows up having taken four tabs of LSD. Across the streets of Toronto, the two friends battle for control of the frame and struggle towards the meanings of art and communication.

1080565.title: FIREBALL
1080565.plot: A video sonnet composed from stock footage, edited by Dan Power.

1080587.title: Sexy Zone 5pecial Performance in Tokyo Dome

1080633.title: whatever you do, DO NOT HOT SHOWER
1080633.plot: To relieve stress, a man steps into his shower doors for a nice hot shower.

1080701.title: Gianmarco Bellini: Gulf War POW
1080701.plot: On the eve of the Operation Desert Storm in the first Gulf War, the Italian government deployed eight Tornado Fighter-bombers.  Gianmarco Bellini was one of the pilots, shot down, captured, abused and returned beat up but able to rise to the rank of General.

1080730.title: KSW 79
1080730.plot: KSW 79 was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Saturday, February 25, 2023 at the Home Credit Arena in Liberec, Czech Republic.

1080753.title: The art of Conversation
1080753.plot: Jimmy is a teenage boy who has become increasingly reliant on social media for social interaction. He finds himself feeling lonely and shy, unable to approach girls in person or online. As the film progresses, Jimmy slowly discovers the power of real relationships and the importance of taking risks to turn his life around.

1080760.title: Absence
1080760.plot: A young poet, lost in his work, faces his own creation.

1080771.title: Miss Planet International 2023
1080771.plot: MISS PLANET INTERNATIONAL 2023  Miss Phillipines, Maria Luisa Varela  Koh Pich Theater, Phnom Penh City, Cambodia  January 29, 2023  1st Runner-Up – Miss Zimbabwe, Jemima Mandemwa  2nd Runner-Up – Miss Japan, Aya Ono  3rd Runner-Up – Miss Vietnam, Tiffany Ha  4th Runner-Up – Miss Finland, Katarina Juselius  5th Runner-Up – Miss Latvia, Alina Safronova  6th Runner-Up – Miss Cambodia, Pok Srevleak

1080775.title: Diva and the Sound Man
1080775.plot: A financially struggling sound technician overhears the private phone call of a famous soap actress, Daiva. Their relationship is put to the test as he decides whether or not to sell her story to the press.

1080782.title: ARES 12
1080782.plot: ARES 12 was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, February 17, 2023 at the Dôme de Paris in Paris, France.

1080787.title: Nate Bargatze: Hello World
1080787.plot: Grammy nominated comedian Nate Bargatze delivers his family friendly take on a variety of topics including disadvantages of being the first born, the challenges of playing golf with your wife, and what happens when a bald eagle touches your head

1080789.title: i don't know what i lost

1080806.title: Jeremy Clarkson: King of Controversy
1080806.plot: A look at the career of Jeremy Clarkson and the many controversies surrounding him.

1080830.title: TMZ Investigates: Lisa Marie Presley: Unending Tragedy
1080830.plot: Lisa Marie Presley's untimely death does not end this tragic story. There are still questions about what led to her death, who will get custody of her twins, and what will happen to the Elvis fortune.

1080841.title: Anubhav Singh Bassi: Bas Kar Bassi
1080841.plot: Fresh out of national law university, Bassi arrives in Delhi as a young lawyer with dreams, ambition and friends. All he needs is some perspective and a lot of money but timing and bosses keep getting in his way. He relates the story of his odyssey with defining career decisions and celebrations of wins and losses, in the midst of the incredible comedy that has been his life.

1080852.title: Pathways 2
1080852.plot: Pathways 2 is an imagined world of skateable modern architecture and surreal imagery, drawing its influence from the creative skate videos of Japan. Six years in the making and filmed primarily in the San Francisco Bay Area.

1080912.title: The Dog & the Boy
1080912.plot: Experimental short from Netflix Anime Creators' Base, AI character development company rinna, and WIT STUDIO. The short utilizes AI assistance in the background art workflow.

1080916.title: Titanic: 25 Years Later with James Cameron
1080916.plot: The Academy Award-winning director and National Geographic Explorer-at-Large James Cameron adds a postscript to his fictional retelling of the tragedy. After hearing fans continue to insist Jack didn’t have to die that night, he mounts tests to see, once and for all, whether both Jack and Rose could have fit on that raft and survived.

1080921.title: Agrippina - DPT
1080921.plot: With her husband apparently drowned at sea, a scheming empress secures the throne for her son from another marriage. But the commander of the army has other ideas, and then the emperor returns, very much alive.  Drottningholm Palace Theatre (Drottningholms slottsteater in Swedish), located at Drottningholm Palace in Stockholm, is one of the few 18th century theatres in Europe that is still used as a theatre with original stage machinery. The beautiful rococo backdrop is the starting point for this production of Agrippina. The Italian conductor and harpsichordist Francesco Corti, a regular collaborator of the orchestras Les Musiciens du Louvre and Il Pomo d'Oro, presides over Handel’s music which is bursting with originality and fun, as well as carefully considered moments of great beauty.

1080926.title: when i leave this all behind
1080926.plot: A young adult is about to move on to the next phase of his life when he is suddenly swept into the unknown.

1080928.title: The Perfect Machine
1080928.plot: Fifty years ago, history was made when the Miami Dolphins completed a perfect 17-0 season by winning Super Bowl VII in Los Angeles. Despite several teams coming close, the perfect record has stood the test of time and the 1972 Dolphins remain the only team to complete an undefeated season in NFL history. This examines what made that team so good and how the undefeated season unfolded.

1080930.title: Still Free
1080930.plot: A film must confront the world in which it is made, but also the one in which it is shown. When Vadim Kostrov accompanied young couple Katya and Kostya to a nearby lake, and filmed them with the directness for which he is known, he couldn’t foresee the political implications of these images. At the time Kostya was about to join the Russian military – a decision he came to regret later on. It’s breathtaking to witness the film’s playful innocence, while at the same time measuring every word against the destructive nature of war – yet the film outlines more than a political parable: Kostrov reflectively turns towards the few hours of light in the face of an impending darkness, which linger too briefly.

1080938.title: Thieves & Patrons
1080938.plot: Stuck in a rock and a hard place, two people discuss the appealing prospect of freedom.

1080942.title: Salem's Flames
1080942.plot: A chauvinistic young man pays a visit to a new nightclub named "Salem's Flames", unaware that he is about to meet his comeuppance at the hands of a coven of witches.

1080948.title: Spinning Out of Control
1080948.plot: Infatuated and obsessed with a fitness instructor, Natalie hatches a devious plan to eliminate everyone in the young woman's life so she can have her all to herself.

1080955.title: Thirsty Thursday
1080955.plot: Two bartenders prepare to close for the night until something sinister occurs.

1080973.title: My Landlord Wants Me Dead
1080973.plot: A college dropout unwittingly puts her own life at stake when she investigates a series of strange and terrifying events at her aunt's secluded ranch house.

1080982.title: Quei due: Edda e Galeazzo Ciano

1080995.title: Kold kanvas
1080995.plot: The entrepreneurial duo Tobias and Benjamin arrive at serial entrepreneur Allan Dyrkjær's castle to get an investment. But no one opens the door, and when Allan claims they don't have a deal, Benjamin has to fight to be allowed to pitch for his idol. Tobias is more lukewarm about the welcome they receive from the enigmatic billionaire, so the cracks in the partnership begin to show.

1081000.title: Dollhouse
1081000.plot: Ella ends up encountering a strange man that is infatuated with young black women, while on the job. The man happens to be the infamous Dollhouse Killer, who turns his victims into perfect dolls for his pleasure.

1081007.title: Open Luv
1081007.plot: Reeling from a recent break-up with his girlfriend of two years, Anderson Hunt, is convinced by his well-meaning friends to get back out on the dating scene, by using an app for alternative lifestyles.

1081008.title: Clara Luciani : Ça commence comme ça

1081011.title: Op. 3 No. 1
1081011.plot: Experimental short. First entry of a series of digital shots about light sources.

1081018.title: Ghoda Dhai Kadam
1081018.plot: In this dangerous game of chess, the age-old greed for power makes their own blood to double-cross each other. Who will checkmate the king?

1081053.title: Ethnic People
1081053.plot: A documentary film that looks back on the history of Koreans in China through various materials and videos, from the first ethnic Koreans who settled in China in the 17th century to modern and contemporary history such as the Japanese colonial period and the Korean War.

1081054.title: Chopin. I Am Not Afraid of Darkness

1081065.title: Daughter of the Bride
1081065.plot: It follows Diane and Kate, a mother and a daughter who are inseparable friends. Their lives are turned upside down, when Diane announces her engagement to a mystery man.

1081070.title: Mondoladro
1081070.plot: Fornovo, Parma. A grandson trying to communicate with his grandfather, who passed away. A Ouija board to assist him. A situation from which it seems difficult to get out.

1081084.title: I'd go to the Moon with you
1081084.plot: A man wrestling with his health goes on a date with the one he adores.

1081093.title: Blue Boy
1081093.plot: Insecure New Jersey bodybuilder, Joey Rossi, aka Joey Muscles, starts doing steroids in a last-ditch effort to go pro.

1081095.title: n'importe où hors du monde
1081095.plot: 'anywhere out of the world'  the title is from a poem of charles baudelaire.

1081113.title: I Used To Live There
1081113.plot: Dan is a photographer / filmmaker that is losing his vision due to a degenerative eye disorder. Monika just got out of a long relationship and has recently decided to get back into acting, after having been away from the craft for a number of years. Monika and Dan come together at a rented studio for a brief photo shoot. Dan takes her headshot, and Monika gives him a loaf of fresh bread. The night culminates in a brief moment of intimate warmth between them, before they go their separate ways.

1081141.title: GRBBR
1081141.plot: After being laid off from her tech job, a young woman fights her way through the increasingly terrifying world of gig work.

1081195.title: In These Parkas We Can Only Be Warm
1081195.plot: Two parka-adorned silhouettes engage in a barely-audible conversation about Snapchat, grades, money, and other unintelligible topics, until one notices something on the other's glasses. It is not ice.

1081223.title: Aath Aana
1081223.plot: A young Mathematics teacher and an elderly, veteran Hindi teacher get into a heated argument about who is the poet of a certain Hindi poem.

1081255.title: عبود في البيت
1081255.plot: Two young boys must work together to stop robbers from breaking in after their family accidentally leaves them home alone during the COVID-19 lockdown.

1081273.title: The History of Broadmoor
1081273.plot: Discover the interesting and sometimes gruesome past of one of Britain's most infamous hospitals: Broadmoor. Join narrator Viar Murad on this whistle-stop journey as you uncover the very start up to the present day of the hospital.

1081313.title: Tonight You're Sleeping with Me
1081313.plot: Stuck in a passionless marriage, a journalist must choose between her distant but loving husband and a younger ex-boyfriend who has reentered her life

1081334.title: Heart of a Champion
1081334.plot: A 14-year-old coping with the divorce of her parents, a new school and typical teenage growing pains finds purpose and pride in a lost horse she cares for and trains for a state competition.

1081341.title: BRUTAL
1081341.plot: A Man is hunted by a killer

1081346.title: Rosebud Lane
1081346.plot: When a middle aged Hollywood filmmaker receives an unexpected card from his young son whom he has never met, he makes the difficult decision to go see him in the Blue Ridge Mountains of North Carolina. Both of their lives then take a life-altering turn as drama surrounding the boy’s mother unfolds in the small mountain town.

1081349.title: Juicy
1081349.plot: When a creature of the night destroys his kitchen, Jacob is reluctantly forced to deal with the beast.

1081353.title: Amy's F**k It List
1081353.plot: Plain and basic Amy receives news that suddenly turns her world upside down. Together with her outspoken and bold Sister Mary, the pair embark on a mission to set things right in the world and reconnect their once lost bond along the way.

1081360.title: La Lutte Est Une Fin
1081360.plot: One summer day in Marseille. The boxers of the "Boxe Massilia" collective are about to enter the ring in front of a cheering crowd. Behind this ancient spectacle of hand-to-hand combat, another fight, more decisive and fundamental, seems to be played out.

1081368.title: Erik Bazinyan vs. Alantez Fox
1081368.plot: Erik Bazinyan vs. Alantez Fox was a boxing event that took place on Thursday, February 2, 2023 at the Casino de Montreal in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

1081386.title: Peer Gynt
1081386.plot: A pre adolescent boy uses the fictional character of Peer Gynt to deal with the world and the people in it.

1081387.title: Perfectly Good Moment
1081387.plot: Ruby and David have been on-and-off for 8 years. Six months after Ruby last ran out on him, she has returned. But Ruby has more in store than just a reunion.

1081397.title: Traces
1081397.plot: In the midst of the rubble of a torn building, a reel of film. An unlikely unraveling of queer bodies taking shape and form, while the war-torn city around and its spectacle of toxic masculinity glitches and disintegrates.

1081416.title: Payphone
1081416.plot: After receiving consecutive calls from an unknown number for almost a week, Noah (Davin Broadhurst) and Claeg (Brandon Criswell) discover that the call has been coming from a retro payphone.

1081458.title: ¡PERÙ!
1081458.plot: Geo and Luca are two thieves who live off petty theft. Their relationship, business and friendship, is in danger of being destroyed when one of them falls in love with a "victim", while the other wants to try a big deal at all costs.

1081472.title: FOUR FAMOUS PAINTINGS
1081472.plot: WHAAM! - THE WATER LILY POND - LATE MORNING -  ​THE BATHERS

1081479.title: All End?
1081479.plot: A girl is looking for her missing dog in a forest. But something mysterious and seemingly invisible makes its own way through the surrounding sky.

1081480.title: Battle of Goyang Makgeolli
1081480.plot: A human comedy set in the 1960s portrays Go Jin-goo, who guards a brewery based in Goyang against the South Korean president who fell in love with it and is curious about its taste. It will also depict an incident that happens when a fixed spy, Park Tae-gil, decides to steal makgeolli for the North Korean leader, and is confronted face-to-face.

1081489.title: Emily Atack: Asking For It?
1081489.plot: Actress Emily Atack explores why she is sexually harassed online on a daily basis, and seeks to understand why the blame for unwanted sexual attention is so often put on the victim.

1081491.title: The Pauper
1081491.plot: A young pauper living on the streets finds hospice after being invited into a house by a kind stranger. But hijinx ensue as the stranger's mother is not too keen with having this pauper inside their house

1081518.title: Eitelmo Oficial em: Acampamento de Weslânia

1081527.title: oh to feel again...
1081527.plot: "Save The Youth Testimonials 01  a short film composed of confessions from my fanbase. scored by myself, directed by caleb wild.  "oh to feel again" was premiered at save the youth: (no blondes edition) in LA in december. wanted to bring that piece of art to life online and show some of the pains that some of my fans go through.  we see you" - Montell Fish

1081550.title: The Last of the Ferrymen
1081550.plot: A short documentary about how Taisto Kainulainen became a ferryman for the river of Vuoksi.

1081597.title: Behold
1081597.plot: The simple storytelling and stunning visuals take viewers on a journey as one young man finds that good things and good behavior are a way out of his dark world.

1081600.title: MRCNLN
1081600.plot: postdigital ethnography, of new media cultures; the earliest YouTube videos uploaded with metadata for each state

1081609.title: Schoolhouse Rock! 50th Anniversary Singalong
1081609.plot: Black Eyed Peas, Derek Hough, Hayley Erbert, Fortune Feimster, Jason Biggs, Jenny Mollen, Julianne Hough, Kal Penn, The Muppets, NE-YO, Raven Symoné and Retta perform classic Schoolhouse Rock! hits.

1081620.title: The Weapon

1081637.title: Libido Dominandi
1081637.plot: While worshipping a mysterious camgirl, an unhinged porn addict is called upon to make the ultimate sacrifice.

1081649.title: F-List
1081649.plot: Meg Superstar Princess recounts the tales of NYFW 2022.

1081666.title: De koninklijke republiek
1081666.plot: A portrait of the timpani and percussion section of the Dutch Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra.

1081669.title: Donks
1081669.plot: An exploration of ocean plastic, avatars and adaptive bottom feeders. The musical!

1081670.title: The Proof of the Pudding
1081670.plot: Portrait of laureate architect Herman Hertzberger as a passionate, humorous, and modest man whose vision on what architecture means for people and society is valuable to this day.

1081685.title: Andit Ken (አንዲት ቀን)
1081685.plot: የ ኤልያስ ወርቅነህ ፊልም (A Film By Elias Workneh)

1081694.title: The Reading
1081694.plot: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

1081714.title: Capture
1081714.plot: The search for their missing son leads a mother and father to a tech company, and a digital gatekeeper who seems to have all the answers.

1081722.title: Supervillains: An Investigation
1081722.plot: An in-depth exploration of supervillains across comic book history, this French documentary zooms in on the complex motivations, origins, and morals behind these sinister yet fascinating characters.

1081727.title: Thalaikoothal
1081727.plot: A man's long battle to save his comatose father is met with financial obstacles, and with his family suggesting euthanasia as the best possible option, his hopes of his father coming back to normalcy are tested.

1081735.title: Soul of a Nation Presents: Black in Vegas
1081735.plot: This special explores the history of Black entertainers in Las Vegas and celebrating those who are now ruling the historic strip.

1081748.title: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Aaron Chalmers
1081748.plot: Floyd Mayweather will finally fight in the UK when he faces Geordie Shore star Aaron Chalmers in an exhibition bout at the O2 Arena in London.

1081751.title: Why I am Choosing...
1081751.plot: Short film about why I chose to apply for a filmmaking degree which  was recently accepted by the film school.

1081789.title: The Weeknd: Live at SoFi Stadium
1081789.plot: Filmed at LA’s SoFi Stadium, The Weeknd brings down the house – and your living room – in this epic concert event.

1081791.title: Buffer Zone
1081791.plot: Two young soldiers across enemy lines fall in love and find escape from their oppressive environments in this musical drama.

1081793.title: The Family Meeting
1081793.plot: During a family meeting, a grandmother and granddaughter are forced to face their fears about growing old and growing up.

1081805.title: Dig
1081805.plot: A man is digging in a field

1081816.title: The Beating Seed
1081816.plot: Two energies that exchange glances, yield to a passion that vibrates in harmony. Both are transmuted, revealing themselves as witnesses that with a gesture of love it is possible to deserve the world.

1081818.title: Doppelgänger
1081818.plot: The myth becomes the reality. when a normal day becomes your worst nightmare, the sight of yourself, foreshadowing your own death.

1081823.plot: Its New Years Eve, cause for celebration? NO ! CAUSE FOR MURDER !!?

1081859.title: Breakin' The Wall
1081859.plot: Ipang trying to make his way tagging until he saw a cop near his hideout.

1081866.title: How to Fix the World
1081866.plot: How to Fix the World? is a comprehensive and informative documentary about direct action in the 1990s and 2000s, directed by Jouko Aaltonen. In the documentary, anarchists, climate activists, and squatters openly describe their experiences and link them to mainstream phenomena in society. A wide range of archive material sheds a light on the history of direct action and activism in the Finnish society.

1081887.title: Cloche petite aux merveilles du pays

1081920.title: Royal Rendezvous
1081920.plot: A Chef from East L.A. received an invitation to a manor in Ireland to cook for a royal banquet that was planned by a Lord to convince his grandmother to sell their home.

1081922.title: Acústico MTV: Manu Gavassi canta Fruto Proibido

1081924.title: Stardom Supreme Fight 2023
1081924.plot: Stardom Supreme Fight 2023 is a professional wrestling event promoted by World Wonder Ring Stardom.

1081933.title: Drop Dead Farnham
1081933.plot: One interviewer and his quest to interview people who love Farnham but it doesn't quite work when everyone he interviews hates the town.

1081936.title: Crawlies
1081936.plot: Little monsters run amok at a heavy metal festival.

1081940.title: Joint Custody
1081940.plot: Jobe moves on with his life after the divorce from his ex-wife, and because of the divorce they now have joint custody of their two children.

1081988.title: Fursat
1081988.plot: A young man unearths an ancient relic that lets him peek into the future. In his obsession to control what lies ahead, he risks losing all that matters most in the present.

1082006.title: Montclair
1082006.plot: Pinegrove • Live at the Wellmont Theater

1082019.title: Noëlle Perna - La vraie vie de Mado

1082047.title: Code of Silence
1082047.plot: In September 2016, police shot and killed Hussam Hussein in Berlin; the case has still not been solved. Inspired by this incident, “Code of Silence” sheds light on the esprit de corps, here using the example of a German police duo. While pursuing a suspect, police officer Thomas loses his service weapon in a scuffle with the fleeing suspect. His partner, and long-standing friend, Grebe sees no other way than to shoot at the suspect and kill him. Thomas is not entirely convinced that Grebe’s actions were right, and now has to decide whether his moral obligation is to truth or to loyalty.

1082048.title: I Love You
1082048.plot: I LOVE YOU is an award winning experimental short film about a toxic relationship and the inner conflict of a woman which decision she's gonna take.

1082052.title: The Stupid Boy
1082052.plot: London is being terrorised by christian white supremacists. While a broken man is groomed for the next attack, a boy from Brixton sees the world in a different way. But seeing things differently can be dangerous.

1082054.title: Sweet Freedom
1082054.plot: An ensemble film that curiously discusses shifting power relationships between strangers.

1082057.title: 10 Letters to the Future
1082057.plot: People living in times of global crises, trying to envision how the future is 50 years from now.

1082095.title: Bullies of Baltimore
1082095.plot: This documentary is a lively and colorful look back at the team’s magical season framed by a reunion of its key figures filmed in front of a live audience in Baltimore in May 2022. The story of the 2000 Baltimore Ravens, a loving, unapologetic portrait of an irrepressible cast of characters.

1082174.title: Congratulations
1082174.plot: Aditya marries his college girlfriend Ragini who wants to have a kid but Aditya is not mentally ready to be a parent. After a miscarriage and delivering a stillborn, Ragini cannot conceive a baby. How far will Aditya go to revive his love life with Ragini? Will he become the first pregnant Gujarati man alive?

1082196.title: Bricoleur 2
1082196.plot: After that beautiful day in Vijayawada (in the first BRICOLEUR film), the cinephile decided to live on. Ten years later, the suicidal urges begin to take over his mind.

1082199.title: On the Red Carpet Presents: The Banshees of Inisherin
1082199.plot: On The Red Carpet presents an in-depth look at the making of The Banshees of Inisherin.

1082246.title: Motorboat
1082246.plot: A priest and a harbor patrol chief must work together to try and stop the evil behind a possessed boat that begins hunting down and killing the locals of a small lakeside community.

1082289.title: As the World Sets
1082289.plot: Alone on the moon, a dying astronaut faces his past regrets and lost love as the earth sets over the horizon.

1082295.title: ROFFA
1082295.plot: Winner of the IFFR Supershort competition. ROFFA is a Short film about love and the many forms it comes in. The film is a love letter to the diverse city of Rotterdam and the acceptance of different religions, sexualities and upbringings.

1082296.title: The Devil
1082296.plot: A man comes home to find that no one is home and suddenly, THE DEVIL appears…

1082297.title: Marooned Awakening
1082297.plot: Marooned Awakening is a 2022 British psychological thriller film directed by Musaab Mustafa, co-written by Cameron Ashplant and Mustafa, and starring Ashplant, Murray McArthur, Tilly Keeper and Tim McInnerny.  The film was shot entirely on the island of Guernsey.

1082298.title: It Is Not Good, Maybe.
1082298.plot: Kaminiida Midori is a member of "Pon Poko Pi", a three-person streamer group. The number of views of their videos has been dropping and Midori has been tasked by her friends to be the "test subject" of a surprise documentary project, "Let a cute girl approach a guy who looks like he has never dated anyone". One day, Midori approaches an unattractive man named Ishibashi Wataru, and begins dating him, but gradually feels guilty about it.

1082299.title: Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum: Reencontro
1082299.plot: Almost 30 years since "Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum" premiered, the cast of the famous children's program from the 90s reunites to talk about the backstage and the aftermath of one of the greatest achievements in brazilian audiovisual history.

1082307.title: Could You Be Free Yet Locked In?
1082307.plot: When a woman expresses her willingness to master photography in the evening of her life, the grandson buys her a smartphone and teaches her mobile photography. The film tells the story of the relationship between two generations, the sighs and hopes of the lives that have passed.

1082318.title: These Untold Secrets
1082318.plot: A mother-son reunion awakens old feelings of loss and remorse, a gay man and a lesbian woman navigate a marriage of convenience in the city of Paris, and an old college buddy crashes on the couch of a young author, oblivious to the emotions he stirs up in his friend. All is not as it seems in this impactful collection of shorts exploring private passions and hidden pasts.

1082321.title: Daughters of the Sun
1082321.plot: The Yazidi girls were often just teenagers when they were abducted from their villages in the mountains of Kurdistan by fighters of the Islamic State. They were forced to convert to Islam and were sold as sex slaves to terrorists. Now that the survivors have returned to their homeland, the question arises as to whether they will be able to start anew. Theatre-maker Hussein is trying to help them find a new life.

1082322.title: Yao-Chinese Folk Tales
1082322.plot: An eight-part series inspired by traditional Chinese literary works, featuring various monster-like characters, or “yāo” (妖) in Chinese.

1082323.title: The Flag
1082323.plot: The Flag reflects on the aftermath of the 2015 Paris attacks, exploring the decline of civil liberties as local media and politics continue othering Arab and African communities.

1082325.title: Uterus Galaxy
1082325.plot: A woman’s uterus is the source of all life. However, none of us remember what the uterus sounds and looks like. Uterus Galaxy is an experimental animated documentary that explores what happens in the uterus when a 32-year-old woman is wondering whether she wants a baby or not.

1082340.title: Kill Or Be Killed
1082340.plot: The story of a mother of two called Nikki Addimando, who was admitted to police that she shot and killed her partner, beloved gymnastics coach Chris Grover, in their home. But did she pull the trigger in self-defense after enduring years of physical and sexual abuse at the hands of Grover, or did she stage the crime scene and murder her partner in cold blood?

1082345.title: Boy From Nowhere
1082345.plot: The true story of Gary, a young and vulnerable Filipino boy who loses everything in an attack on his village that kills his father. Desperate to find his mother and her tribe, Gary sets out on a perilous journey while battling hunger and solitude. Along the way, he gets caught up in the dangerous world of gangs and is eventually brainwashed into becoming a child soldier for a local rebel faction.

1082377.title: James Baldwin Abroad
1082377.plot: Showcasing three short films by American writer James Baldwin, wherein he muses about race, sexuality and civil rights, among other topics, in Istanbul, Paris and Great Britain.

1082389.title: Searching For an Answer
1082389.plot: In the aftermath of a world-altering event, two men hunt down a dangerous target.

1082408.title: Amma Lodge
1082408.plot: After seven years, ABHISHEK, a city-raised, introverted young man moves to Amma Lodge, an old inn in a remote village in odisha. He is hereby to do Asthi Visarjan or Bone Immersion of his father, which was his father's last bizzare wish but a conflict arise when he refuses to make it.

1082419.title: Chairs
1082419.plot: It is a story of how God and his community are a space for restoration; for taking that which is broken and making it beautiful. In the film, there are four characters meeting in the setting of a life or cell group and they are fixing some broken chairs; each chair a mirror of themselves. Over the course of the evening, progress is made in fixing the chairs through the community they find together.

1082426.title: The Social Chameleon
1082426.plot: Cosmo the Chameleon doesn't fit in with the other animals. No matter how hard he tries, he just can't seem to find his place in the jungle. Then, everything changes when he meets another chameleon who shows him how to live by his own true colors.

1082429.title: Marie's Fridge
1082429.plot: "Marie's Fridge" is an unusual love story told from the perspective of a refrigerator. Marie lives alone. She is young and owns an old fridge inherited from her grandmother. Little does she know that this heirloom will change her fate one day.

1082430.title: Tidal
1082430.plot: Tidal externalizes the internal life of a bedside nurse over the course of a year. The film examines the cyclical nature of workplace trauma and the relentlessness of the nursing profession. With the use of movement and dance, waves of deep-seated expression move through her as she tries to find home. Disjointed and overwhelmed, she is increasingly unable to connect to her outside world and no longer able to separate hospital life from herself.

1082447.title: Re-Resonator: Looking Back at From Beyond
1082447.plot: A brand new making-of documentary featuring interviews with actors Jeffrey Combs, Barbara Crampton and Ken Foree

1082462.title: Camino
1082462.plot: A man takes his daughter on the Camino de Santiago to honor his late wife's last wish.

1082498.title: Felines
1082498.plot: When Max, a troubled girl looking for a way out of her mundane life, meets the mysterious and seductive Lily, she instantly falls head over heels in love. But Max soon realizes Lily is not who she seems and she finds herself trapped in a dangerous world of drugs, deceit and murder.

1082503.title: Walking in the Wrong Direction
1082503.plot: A young woman is forced to confront her unexpressed feelings following a drunken confession to her best friend's girlfriend.

1082508.title: Our First Time
1082508.plot: Sud Yod, a famous live online game streamer who has an office syndrome in which he has sit for a long time in front of the computer, has received a gift voucher of a free special 2-hour hotoil massage from a famous massage parlor on Nimman road Chiang Mai, Thailand. He decides to try this oil massage for the first time. Num Un, a nephew of the massage parlor owner, is not aware that today he has to be a special masseur for this game streamer and the story of the two timid boys and their “first” time of impression has begun.

1082558.title: he said, she said
1082558.plot: A short artist film that explores femininity and sexuality. SHE journeys through her life and mind in order to be reborn, and reclaim all that men have taken from her.

1082564.title: Critters, Carnivores and Creatures
1082564.plot: Gather the family 'round the home screen for this collection of some of Moonbeams coolest and creepiest monsters. It's the greatest moments from some of our gnarliest kid-flicks all crushed together.

1082572.title: SANS
1082572.plot: The movie follows two assassins who need to acquire fingerprints. It's about their love for drugs.

1082580.title: GR8TNESS
1082580.plot: Kevin Weekes chats with Alex Ovechkin on his chase to catch Wayne Gretzky’s NHL career scoring record.

1082593.title: The Hesitant Earth
1082593.plot: A bare body guy buries his secrets in the earth right beside a river. An aspiring writer watches it from the bush. Begins a complex game with the secrets where the Earth stands witness.

1082595.title: Olivia's Dream
1082595.plot: Four-year-old Olivia has a prophetic dream

1082703.title: EIN SOF
1082703.plot: A classic “talent show” set in a parallel galaxy where living beings have migrated to a more evolved state. These beings from planet EIN SOF have gathered here to perform and present all their wonderful attributes

1082705.title: Smart Water
1082705.plot: A high-school student decides to poison her classmate in order to pass an AP-Photography test

1082835.title: Peti Tick-tack
1082835.plot: "Everybody has their special someone out there and I will eventually find the one for me" says "Tick Tock" Pete, known and liked by all the locals in his small town of Solymár just outside of the Hungarian capital but considered a special case by most. He takes lonesome daily trips to his favorite spots: having tea at the pub, tending to the horses he adores and the church on main square. Some would say a lonely outcast but he's never bored; if anyone's clock needs fixing, be that a cuckoo or pendulum, they all can but rely on the person whose the most capable in this field: Tick Tock Pete. The only issue is each time he fixes a clock, he'll use parts from another, rendering it useless, a pawn. Something is always missing - no different with our Pete. Is time truly on the clockmaster's side, ever-turning, never-ending? Tick Tock.

1082844.title: Manny Pacquiao: Unstoppable Force
1082844.plot: While the sport of boxing requires sacrifice, discipline, concentration, and determination for Manny Pacquiao, it was survival.

1082847.title: FOR HER EYES ONLY
1082847.plot: Decades before Magic Mike and The Chippendales there was Crystal T's – the home of Melbourne's very own all-male nude revue.  FOR HER EYES ONLY is a fascinating 1985 documentary by filmmaker Brian Jones ('Coming Of Age') that shows Melbourne, Australia at a turning point, shaking off the prudishness of the past to embrace a new sexual freedom that was sweeping the nation.

1082850.title: Une confession
1082850.plot: John Duxbury, a fifty-year-old man disappointed by his life, sees his wife die from a fatal fall while they are on vacation together. And while an accident is initially thought to be the cause of death, suspicions soon turn to John... especially since a witness claims to have seen him push his wife.

1082856.title: Who Am I?
1082856.plot: Bhavitavya, a philosophy student, is full of questions about life. When his favourite professor passes away, Bhavitavya embarks on a journey of self-discovery, wondering who he is and what his life means.

1082894.plot: A documentary about a doorman at his workplace, observing, through a television, different views of a residential building.

1082916.title: For All Humankind
1082916.plot: Discover the story of humanity and space exploration as witnessed in the interrelated events of 1968 and 2020.

1082928.title: A Sour Tale Of Wrath In The West
1082928.plot: A disgruntled ex-soldier has tracked down his war-weary Confederate Captain from the Civil War, vengeful for his fallen comrades' deaths. What they don't know is that the Union are also interested in seeing Wyatt dead...

1082930.title: A Date with Deception
1082930.plot: Released from prison for a crime she didn't commit, Diana tries to prove her innocence by tracking down her ex-husband, Elias, who framed her for fraud. However, she soon uncovers a much more nefarious plot that involves a mysterious disappearance.

1082939.title: Miedo Pizza Mito Champán
1082939.plot: Documentary essay on the fascination of Argentine television with the UFO phenomenon in the 90s.

1082963.title: Escape from Love
1082963.plot: A man hires a private investigator when his wife disappears on their honeymoon and his bank account gets drained.

1082965.title: Gardez
1082965.plot: Silvia Brockmann, the wife of a rich industrialist, is no longer considered by her husband. Fascinated by the sensual appearance of a young church attendant, she decides to bring a little joy into her dreary everyday life. She cleverly uses the unsuspecting and good faith pastor of the congregation to get the attention of the church attendant.

1082973.title: The Ditch
1082973.plot: Every day of his life a man digs a ditch.

1082977.title: La Clé De L'Amour
1082977.plot: A young American college student travels to the City of Lights in search of the grandfather she has never met and who is likely unaware of his American family. Does the mysterious Professor Dominique hold the key to her grandfather's whereabouts?

1082984.title: Hormak
1082984.plot: Iker is a 17-year-old who has not quite found his place in the world. During an afternoon he will stay with his friends and will have to deal with the bitterness of adolescence.

1082993.title: På andra sidan om dig
1082993.plot: Strange things are happening in an old house in the middle of the woods where a woman lives. As a calling the woman hangs up a white dress and places matching shoes underneath. The spirit world makes itself known in a dark love story of grief, loss and sacrifice, as we try to determine whether the growing danger comes from the spiritual realm or the physical.

1082996.title: Back Home
1082996.plot: An escalating argument between girlfriend and boyfriend reveals deeper secrets.

1083002.title: Robota
1083002.plot: A young girl's interpretation of war around her.

1083004.title: Chaotic Hannah
1083004.plot: An Insight into the life of a chaotic mind.

1083031.title: My Home, our Home
1083031.plot: A 60 second short film on the theme of 'Home'.

1083033.title: Max Fosh: Zocial Butterfly
1083033.plot: They said he couldn’t make it as a global fashion icon; they were wrong.  They said he couldn’t legally become the world’s richest man; they were wrong.  They said he couldn’t beat all the odds to become London’s first ever YouTuber mayor… to be fair, they got that one bang on.  But now, armed with the rosiest of cheeks & the floppiest of hair, Max Fosh faces his biggest challenge yet – The London Palladium – as he brings you his hilarious & unpredictable debut live show: Zocial Butterfly.  Join Max and friends at his biggest show to date. Let’s #TakeLondonToTheMax.

1083043.title: Looking Right and Left
1083043.plot: A short film about looking right and then left and then right again

1083055.title: Right Here Right Now
1083055.plot: Documentary Right Here, Right Now told the nostalgic tale of when Fatboy Slim brought a quarter of a million partygoers to Brighton Beach

1083056.title: Ausgerastet und abgestürzt: Der Fall des Angry German Kid
1083056.plot: Be it as ‘Unreal Tournament Kid’, ‘KeyboardCrasher’, or ‘Angry German Kid’: Almost everywhere across the world this video of a youth who freaks out whilst playing on the computer and destroys his keyboard is known. Many still share it today as a meme when chatting without knowing that it was staged. Also: the young guy never uploaded the video himself. Powerless, he had to witness how it was shared and distorted countless times – how it destroyed a part of his life. Now, for the first time, Norman Kochanowski speaks with ZAPP about his story and the consequences of virality.

1083073.title: RIKO
1083073.plot: A documentary about the making of the new film, The Queen of Hearts

1083096.title: Zurück in die Zukunft - Wie ein Film zeitlos wurde

1083101.title: Aces High
1083101.plot: Gary, a young man aspiring to work with his older brother Logan, is finally allowed the opportunity to prove himself in a game of poker to his enigmatic potential employer, Enzo.

1083104.title: Home - A Sixty Second Short on the Shortcomings of Society's Views on Singularity
1083104.plot: Two unnamed characters, peculiar in their appearance, learn the importance of home.

1083108.title: The Universe
1083108.plot: In a last-ditch effort to save earth, a man sacrifices himself and is forced to relive a series of suppressed memories that become smeared by the detonation of a stellar bomb. This paranormal explosion of thoughts begin to blur the lines between reality and fiction; the only way out is forward.

1083119.title: The Lost Chronicles
1083119.plot: The terror begins for several people when nightmares become reality and they deal with stalkers, murders and monsters.

1083127.title: Kırmızı Başlıklı Kız ve Bizim Kahramanlar

1083130.title: ONE Friday Fights 3: Chorfah vs. Petsukumvit
1083130.plot: ONE Friday Fights: Chorfah vs. Petsukumvit (also known as ONE Lumpinee 3) was a combat sport event produced by ONE Championship that took place on February 3, 2023, at Lumpinee Boxing Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand.

1083155.title: Marcella Arguello: Bitch, Grow Up!
1083155.plot: Arguello couples her larger-than-life stage presence with her brutally honest take on post-pandemic hook ups and why broke men are better in bed, an exploration of how “Beauty and the Beast” triggered an epiphany, and a self-reflection on her middle school D.A.R.E. essay.

1083157.title: Josh Johnson: Up Here Killing Myself
1083157.plot: In this comedic exploration of black mental health and self discovery, comedian Josh Johnson  shares with his therapist, and the audience, his thoughts on growing up without money, grieving, and firing his first gun. There is no subject too big, small, or intimate for Josh to parse through in his first Peacock comedy special.

1083159.title: Across the Gulf
1083159.plot: A young man and an older one meet by happenstance in a local cafe and decide to sit and talk about their points of view on life.

1083164.title: ZAPPER!
1083164.plot: In a surreal universe where bananas fire laser beams and soup cans are used as grenades, a cast of wacky gangsters are thrown into a deadly game to battle it out over a mystical longboard in this trippy take on the Tarantino crime genre.

1083193.title: Ancient Beast: Wolf Lizard
1083193.plot: A group of university students planned a special graduation trip, ready to embark on a tense and exciting adventure, but by mistake, they enter a forbidden island inhabited by giant beasts.

1083194.title: Wet Floor
1083194.plot: A night security guard investigating a minor disturbance unwittingly stumbles upon a supernatural mystery with deadly consequences.

1083235.title: Blossom
1083235.plot: While battling depression, Clarisse volunteers at a women's shelter and befriends a domestic abuse survivor, only to discover there's more to the young woman than she alludes.

1083237.title: From Inside of Here
1083237.plot: From Inside of Here is a feature-length non-fiction film based in research in the Mexican Wolf Recovery Area in western New Mexico. The audience is invited to understand the filmmaker as a subject co-produced by their location, as well as consider the ways the land is co-produced by those on it. The place itself is a character in the film, as are the filmmaker's methods. The film is composed of multiple media: 16mm film, HD video, infrared stills, inter-titles, and sound recordings. The result is a feminist ethnographic landscape film that communicates both the majesty of 1800s landscape photography and the violence of a settler colonial gaze that is its context.

1083310.title: Slava Ukraini
1083310.plot: The day after the Russian invasion, we shot a film, "Why Ukraine", documenting the first months of the Ukrainian ordeal and broadcast on ARTE. This new film takes up where the other one left off. It is a diary kept in the second half of the year 2022 and where everything has been recorded: small and large events, hazards, emotions, testimonies of living people and mourning, chronicle of the front and bombed cities, portraits. The film begins in Kharkiv, in the Donbass. It ends in Kherson, the day after the liberation of the city, and then in Ochakiv, the base from which the elite units fighting the last battle of the Ukraine against the Russian occupation and its devastation will perhaps leave. All in all, the true story of a war without equivalent for three quarters of a century and of which we have tried to be the committed but lucid witnesses.

1083318.title: Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Dotsuitare Hompo vs Buster Bros!!!]
1083318.plot: Blu-ray release of character rap project “Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle-: Rule the Stage [Dotsuitare Hompo vs Buster Bros!!!]”.

1083351.title: Stardom Triangle Derby I in Nagoya ~Come to Nagoya~
1083351.plot: Pre-Show Rumble Match  Koguma vs. Hazuki vs. AZM vs. Ruaka vs. Yuna Mizumori vs. Saya Iida vs. Super Strong Stardom Machine vs. Momo Kohgo vs. MIRAI vs. Lady C vs. Miyu Amasaki  Six Man Tag Team Match  Oedo Tai (Natsuko Tora, Rina & Saki Kashima) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Triangle Derby I Match  Rina Amikura, Waka Tsukiyama & Yuko Sakurai vs. Donna del Mondo (Giulia, Mai Sakurai & Thekla)  Triangle Derby I Match  Cosmic Angels (Natsupoi & Tam Nakano) & SAKI vs. Prominence (Hiragi Kurumi, Risa Sera & Suzu Suzuki)  Tag Team Match  Mayu Iwatani & Syuri vs. Maika & Utami Hayashishita  Wonder Of Stardom Title Match  Saya Kamitani (c) vs. Ami Sourei

1083366.plot: Singles Match  Momo Kohgo vs. Thekla  Singles Match  Syuri vs. Yuna Mizumori  Six Man Tag Team Match  Donna del Mondo (Maika & Mai Sakurai) & Lady C vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Eight Man Tag Team Match  Oedo Tai (Natsuko Tora, Rina, Ruaka & Saki Kashima) vs. STARS (Hazuki, Koguma, Mayu Iwatani & Saya Iida)  Tag Team Match  Queen's Quest (Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita) vs. God's Eye (Ami Sourei & MIRAI)  Triangle Derby I Match  Rina Amikura, Waka Tsukiyama & Yuko Sakurai vs. Cosmic Angels (Natsupoi & Tam Nakano) & SAKI
