1083371.plot: Tag Team Match  Miyu Amasaki & Waka Tsukiyama vs. STARS (Mayu Iwatani & Momo Kohgo)  Triangle Derby I Match  Haruka Umesaki & Oedo Tai (Ruaka & Starlight Kid) vs. Donna del Mondo (Himeka & Maika) & Lady C  Triangle Derby I Match  STARS (Hazuki, Koguma & Saya Iida) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Triangle Derby I Match  Prominence (Hiragi Kurumi, Risa Sera & Suzu Suzuki) vs. Neo Stardom Army (Nanae Takahashi, Yuna Mizumori & Yuu)  Triangle Derby I Match  Queen's Quest (AZM, Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita) vs. Oedo Tai (Momo Watanabe, Natsuko Tora & Saki Kashima)  Triangle Derby I Match  Donna del Mondo (Giulia, Mai Sakurai & Thekla) vs. God's Eye (Ami Sourei, MIRAI & Syuri)  Triangle Derby I Match  Rebel X Enemy (Maika Ozaki, Maya Yukihi & Ram Kaicho) vs. Cosmic Angels (Natsupoi & Tam Nakano) & SAKI

1083373.plot: Three Way Match  Koguma vs. Yuna Mizumori vs. MIRAI  Three Way Tag Team Match  STARS (Hazuki & Saya Iida) vs. Cosmic Angels (Natsupoi & Tam Nakano) vs. God's Eye (Ami Sourei & Syuri)  Triangle Derby I Match  Rina Amikura, Waka Tsukiyama & Yuko Sakurai vs. Queen's Quest (AZM, Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita)  Triangle Derby I Match  Haruka Umesaki & Oedo Tai (Ruaka & Starlight Kid) vs. Rebel X Enemy (Maika Ozaki, Maya Yukihi & Ram Kaicho)  Triangle Derby I Match  STARS (Hanan, Mayu Iwatani & Momo Kohgo) vs. Donna del Mondo (Himeka & Maika) & Lady C  Triangle Derby I Match  Prominence (Hiragi Kurumi, Risa Sera & Suzu Suzuki) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Triangle Derby I Match  Oedo Tai (Momo Watanabe, Natsuko Tora & Saki Kashima) vs. Donna del Mondo (Giulia, Mai Sakurai & Thekla)

1083374.title: Stardom Award 2022 in Takadanobaba
1083374.plot: Future Of Stardom Title Match  Ami Sourei (c) vs. Mai Sakurai  Six Man Tag Team Match  Oedo Tai (Rina, Ruaka & Starlight Kid) vs. God's Eye (MIRAI, Syuri & Tomoka Inaba)  Triangle Derby I Match  Queen's Quest (AZM, Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita) vs. Donna del Mondo (Himeka & Maika) & Lady C  Triangle Derby I Match  Rebel X Enemy (Maika Ozaki, Maya Yukihi & Ram Kaicho) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Triangle Derby I Match  STARS (Hanan, Mayu Iwatani & Momo Kohgo) vs. Prominence (Hiragi Kurumi, Risa Sera & Suzu Suzuki)  Triangle Derby I Match  Oedo Tai (Momo Watanabe, Natsuko Tora & Saki Kashima) vs. Neo Stardom Army (Nanae Takahashi, Yuna Mizumori & Yuu)  Giulia Gauntlet Match  Hazuki, Hina, Koguma, Natsupoi, SAKI, Saya Iida, Super Strong Stardom Machine, Tam Nakano, Thekla & Waka Tsukiyama vs. Giulia

1083375.title: Night of the Black Glove
1083375.plot: A woman is pursued by a black gloved killer in this Giallo homage.

1083376.title: House 666
1083376.plot: A man takes a simple house sitting job, but nothing is as it seems...

1083378.title: The Incarnate
1083378.plot: A vicious monster is mauling random citizens of Los Angeles. Can he be stopped?

1083380.title: Stardom 12th Anniversary Supreme Fight 2023
1083380.plot: Naniwa Roulette Match  Mayu Iwatani vs. Saki Kashima vs. Natsupoi vs. Tam Nakano vs. Natsuko Tora vs. Yuna Mizumori vs. Mina Shirakawa vs. Momoka Hanazono vs. Momo Kohgo vs. Mai Sakurai vs. Thekla vs. Mariah May vs. Waka Tsukiyama vs. Miyu Amasaki vs. Billy Ken Death (Fukigen Death)  Triangle Derby I Match  Haruka Umesaki & Oedo Tai (Ruaka & Starlight Kid) vs. STARS (Hazuki, Koguma & Saya Iida)  Six Man Tag Team Match  Queen's Quest (AZM, Lady C & Utami Hayashishita) vs. God's Eye (Ami Sourei & Syuri) & Konami  Singles Match  Chihiro Hashimoto vs. MIRAI  Goddesses Of Stardom Title Match  Neo Stardom Army (Nanae Takahashi & Yuu) (c) vs. Donna del Mondo (Himeka & Maika)  Wonder Of Stardom Title Match  Saya Kamitani (c) vs. Momo Watanabe  World Of Stardom Title Match  Giulia (c) vs. Suzu Suzuki

1083384.title: Life to the Limit
1083384.plot: From the Revolution of Dignity to full-scale war: successful Ukrainian film producers took up arms to defend the country and cameras to record the gruesome reality. From the fragments of memories and their own film archive, veterans Pavlo and Yurko assemble a mosaic of the causes and consequences of today's Russian-Ukrainian war - from the end of 2013 to today. The authors went to the front as volunteers, visited the hotspots of Donbas, created the home-made drone "Furia", which is now named after one of the best air reconnaissance units. And all this time they continued to create in order to show the world the truth about the terrible war that became possible in the 21st century.

1083391.title: Stardom Triangle Derby I in Funabashi
1083391.plot: Three Way Match  Rina vs. Hina vs. Tomoka Inaba  Six Man Tag Team Match  STARS (Hanan, Mayu Iwatani & Momo Kohgo) vs. Cosmic Angels (Natsupoi, Tam Nakano & Waka Tsukiyama)  Triangle Derby I Match  STARS (Hazuki, Koguma & Saya Iida) vs. Donna del Mondo (Giulia, Mai Sakurai & Thekla)  Triangle Derby I Match  Oedo Tai (Momo Watanabe, Natsuko Tora & Saki Kashima) vs. Club Venus (Mariah May, Mina Shirakawa & Xia Brookside)  Triangle Derby I Match  Haruka Umesaki & Oedo Tai (Ruaka & Starlight Kid) vs. God's Eye (Ami Sourei, MIRAI & Syuri)  Triangle Derby I Match  Donna del Mondo (Himeka & Maika) & Lady C vs. Neo Stardom Army (Nanae Takahashi, Yuna Mizumori & Yuu)  Triangle Derby I Match  Queen's Quest (AZM, Saya Kamitani & Utami Hayashishita) vs. Prominence (Hiragi Kurumi, Risa Sera & Suzu Suzuki)

1083396.title: Building / Blocks: The Architecture of Chicago’s South Side
1083396.plot: The architecture of Chicago is world class. But often overlooked are the remarkable buildings and luscious green spaces of the city's South Side. Take a trip with architecture photographer and writer Lee Bey as he explores these masterpieces of design and engineering hidden in plain sight.

1083463.title: Del Potro, el último match point

1083488.title: Chavo
1083488.plot: Tommy is a roma man who's worldview were shattered when his son committed suicide. A year later, a teenage boy, Antonio, shows up at Tommy's restaurant and lingers until closing. A bond between a mourning father and a rejected son builds up, and it seems like they have more in common than Tommy was first aware of.

1083522.title: Grasshopper
1083522.plot: Night falls down on empty business premises - and lights go up. A minimalistic musical.

1083528.title: Our Islands Our Home
1083528.plot: This short documentary includes powerful storytelling, beautiful footage and is a compelling case for everyone to step up in the fight for climate justice in the Torres Strait.

1083538.title: Shikake-nin Fujieda Baian
1083538.plot: Baian Fujieda, an assassin for hire, got an unusual job from his usual fixer to end up with an unexpected twist of destiny from the past.

1083540.title: Bishara: Från Instagram till Mello
1083540.plot: Bishara began his singing career as a fifteen-year-old by singing covers on Instagram. Just months later, he was on stage at the largest music competition in Sweden.

1083541.title: The Honey Of Your Small Voice
1083541.plot: The Flesh Between My Existence Is Torn As I Claw Towards My Distant Faith Upon It’s Thorned Throne. My Unheard Cries Trickle Their Resentment Upon The Holy Scriptures Of Condemnation. Dreams Of Submerged Shrines Of Innocence Defiled By Nightmarish Psychiatry, Syllables Of Their Mass Cult Present Themselves As Inscriptions On The Nakedness Of Suspicion.

1083548.title: The Rocket
1083548.plot: After being called a liar for years, Stathis is forced to gather all his friends and take them to a top-secret location to prove the existence of a supposed rocket (that only he knows about). If he doesn’t show the rocket, he loses all his friends.

1083629.title: Tu Hovein Main Hovan
1083629.plot: While Sukhi and Tania are madly in love and want to get married, Garry and Kelly are married with kids. As working parents they try to juggle their domestic responsibilities and working career but the day-today grind takes a toll and they decide to separate. As Garry and Kelly contemplate separating, their kids try various tricks to make them fall in love again. Looking at Garry and Kelly's situation, Sukhi and Tania have second thoughts about getting married themselves. Will Garry and Kelly divorce each other? Will Sukhi and Tania finally get married?

1083631.title: Metanoia
1083631.plot: Metanoia: a change in one’s way of life through the transformation of the heart resulting from penitence or spiritual conversion.

1083640.title: 人生半山腰
1083640.plot: Special Film for the 40th anniversary of Tony Leung‘s debut

1083650.title: The Book of Vesna
1083650.plot: The stories of four adventurous kids, an idealistic commune, a group of dangerous revolutionaries and an unstable family man intertwine in the creation of a powerful book.

1083691.title: Cuisine indienne: A toutes les sauces !

1083721.title: Dados
1083721.plot: After his release from prison, Dados decides to stay a crook, only seeing things bigger this time.  To do this, he recruits four women with chaotic lives and embarks on several burglaries, blackmail and fraud operations all motivated by personal reasons.

1083736.title: A Rainy Night
1083736.plot: A short film showing the beauty of Paris by night

1083745.title: Journey through time
1083745.plot: Journey through time filmed through the years of the eyes of Geovrz and through the light of experimental cinema

1083753.title: The Apatanis of Arunachal Pradesh
1083753.plot: "Of all endangered species in the world the indigenous peoples are the most important ones-not because they are human, but because it is only them, who may show the "civilized" that there is no way of life, which may exclusively be called "right"...D. Quinn APATANIS OF ARUNACHAL

1083758.title: Silverskin
1083758.plot: A girl has a sudden fascination for animals in search of control.

1083760.title: Sector Balakot
1083760.plot: A film about war against the terrorism

1083774.title: Faded
1083774.plot: 'Faded' is a short drama following the character, Sam as he explores his mind and memories whilst spiraling into a state of depression after the death of his younger brother Robin which he blames himself for.

1083780.title: Boom! Boom! The World vs. Boris Becker
1083780.plot: An inside look at the controversial life and career of tennis great Boris Becker—featuring interviews with John McEnroe, Novak Djokovic, Björn Borg, and other icons.

1083785.title: Shooto Brasil Boxing: José Aldo
1083785.plot: Shooto Brasil Boxing: José Aldo was a boxing event that took place on Friday, February 10, 2023 at the Upper Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

1083788.title: SATAN
1083788.plot: Hungary’s best chef pushes her cooks to the brink of insanity. Dani has been working relentlessly for many years, and sacrificed everything for recognition… to no avail. In his final desperation, he makes an alliance with a senior colleague and prepares for something radical. Frustration, beetroot purée and terror - SATAN is a high-voltage tale about the price of extreme ambition.

1083848.title: The Match-Stick Flame 2: Lunada Bay
1083848.plot: Dalton returns to Rancho Palos Verdes, CA after hiding out for a year due to his father Match-Stick's death. Match-Stick was hunted down and killed by the Triad leader Mr. Tang. Dalton suffers with PTSD from being a Navy Seal Veteran in the "War On Terror" and he tries to come up with coping mechanisms to deal with his PTSD. Dalton finds out he has a half brother out of wedlock who takes over the Hollywood Mob. DEA Agent Prasad recruits Dalton to go undercover into the Lunada Bay surfing gang to find out who's supplying the drug Galaxy. There's plenty of action and family drama.

1083854.title: The Dirty 3rd: Next Generation
1083854.plot: Twenty years after the incarceration of his son, Street has graduated from drug kingpin to legitimate businessman when his trusted street soldier comes home from prison and his long lost grandson shows up unexpectedly in Houston.

1083865.title: KOK 109 in Vienna
1083865.plot: KOK 109 in Vienna is a kickboxing event that took place on Saturday, 18 February, 2023 at the Eventhotel Pyramide in Vienna, Austria. The event is headlined by a KOK Middleweight title fight between Austrian Karim Mabrouk and Loic Njeya of Switzerland.

1083883.title: The Shamima Begum Story
1083883.plot: At 15, Shamima Begum left London to join the terror group Islamic State. For the first time, her account of what happened is investigated to find the truth.

1083885.title: Consent
1083885.plot: Bold and authentic drama set at an elite school where the lines of sexual consent are dangerously blurred. When a serious accusation is made against 'one of their own', how will the school react?

1083895.title: In the Grip of Gazprom
1083895.plot: The war in the Ukraine has changed the way many European countries view Russian politics. Suddenly it became clear how dependent countries had become on Russian gas imports for decades and what Vladimir Putin was up to. However, no country needs more gas than Germany. It was only after Russia's invasion of the Ukraine that the German government realized that Russia had long used gas as a weapon to impose its will on states. The instrument created for this purpose is the natural gas production company GAZPROM. So how did Germany become so dependent on Russian gas? The documentary shows how, over several decades and several changes of government, a broad alliance of politicians and business representatives did everything possible to secure Germany's energy supply with cheap Russian gas, while the Kremlin's foreign policy became increasingly aggressive and the warnings of experts went unheeded.

1083897.title: The Love App
1083897.plot: Rachel is a promising young woman getting over a recent breakup while her friend signs her up for a dating app unbeknownst to her. She is presented three blind dates to choose from. Little does she know, one of them is a serial killer.

1083929.title: Trouble
1083929.plot: Set in 1952, this musical thriller is what happens when a traveling salesman shows up on the doorstep of a dying old man and can't contain the song within his heart. A dark riff on a classic musical.

1083941.title: Between the Lines
1083941.plot: The first-ever feature film by Shelby Hagerdon.

1083986.title: Moments of Love
1083986.plot: My Lovely Tutor:  When nineteen-year-old Pun has to repeat grade twelve, his parents hire handsome fourth-year university student Get to tutor him.  My Ex-Boyfriend:  At the end of high school, Forth tells his close friend Non that he loves him before Non's ready. Forth accepts the heartbreak. When Non enters university, though, he begins to know himself better and goes to confess to his old friend Forth.  My Heartless Boy:  Fort is an extra persistently auditioning for bigger roles and never booking them. Fortunately, he has Pie always waiting by his side to encourage him.  My Crazy Romance:  The two meet in a tumultuous transition period of James' life. Smart tries everything to make James feel better about himself, but James is stuck in his suffering.

1084005.title: Schweigen
1084005.plot: Conflict - without dialogue  An old priest of a small church in Düsseldorf lives a quiet life, which spirals out of control after a soul-shaking encounter with a murderer and god.

1084024.title: The Love Club: Sydney’s Journey
1084024.plot: Sydney has transitioned from a track star to a successful food blogger. Moreover, her heart is still attached to her college boyfriend. However, they have not seen each other in a decade.

1084026.title: The Love Club: Lauren’s Dream
1084026.plot: Lauren supported her husband Peter get his career going. This means her dream of opening an art gallery has been put on the back burner. Soon, she becomes so resentful that it tears their marriage apart.

1084028.title: The Love Club: Tara’s Tune
1084028.plot: Tara has always considered herself to be a free spirit. Moreover, the talented singer doesn’t seek love. Instead, she has her friends in The Love Club.

1084030.title: Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil, Louis de Funès - Les rois de la comédie

1084038.title: Burning Batteries
1084038.plot: In the tradition of experimental genres such as the cut-up, collage, permutation, altered book, & erasure poem, ‘Burning Batteries’ dissects the idea of the book in both a literal & philosophical way. Books are usually thought of as 2D, static, fixed pieces of historically relevant narratives – ReVerse Butcher wants you to (re)think books as contested spaces for possible intervention, creative agency, & rebellion. She sees books as multi-layered places where multiple meanings hide behind the illusion of being locked-in by consensus reality.

1084048.title: Remember Me, If At All...
1084048.plot: A lost soul wanders through the darkness within.

1084049.title: IXHA: Phantasma
1084049.plot: A spirit is born into our world in a human body.

1084071.title: Hospice
1084071.plot: 'Hospice care' is a type of health care that focuses on the sick or terminally ill patient's pain and symptoms and attending to their emotional and spiritual needs at the end of life.

1084075.title: The Mimic
1084075.plot: The Mersey Murderer has slumbered for years. Today he awakens.

1084078.title: Bench
1084078.plot: An encounter with a stranger while trying to leave a bench triggers an anxiety attack.

1084094.title: Guess who?
1084094.plot: Two young couples gather for a game night. Milla, Zalán, Alíz and Boti have been friends for years, but this night is not without some tension between them. It quickly becomes clear that games are not only played on the board, and stakes are higher than that anyone would have expected…

1084096.title: Poco's Colorful Day
1084096.plot: A surreal Lego stop-motion film (brickfilm) that blurs the boundaries between reality and dream. Join Poco on a fantastic journey through space and time!

1084097.title: No Control
1084097.plot: The film presents an underground punk band that appeared in a small town in Borsod county in the eighties. In the depressing factory town of the forgotten Eastern Hungary, a movement called Privát Nihil started, which resulted in an amazingly high-quality music world. The focus of the film is the frontman of the band, my father, who embodies genius, but he could not enforce it because of his principles, addictions and demons. Gábor Jesse's strong character created a world, a mini-state, where you can take all your traumas and shout them out. But this roar comes at a price.

1084102.title: Barnabás
1084102.plot: Barnabás is a 22 years old boy who we can observe throughout the film within his own personal environments, in his comfort zone. During these 24 minutes, the viewer is offered a glimpse into someone’s everyday life who lives with a personality disorder. In this one and a half week into Barnabás’ life we can examine how he deteriorates as he helplessly drifts back-and-forth, until one day the external factors controlling his decisions make him over step a certain line, leading Barnabás to fight his life-or-death battle.

1084106.title: Artur
1084106.plot: King Arthur, defender of Britain, valiant knight and a legend of the entire kingdom, is defeated in a glorious battle, he says goodbye to his friend Bedivere, and all of Britain is shrouded in grief for their king. New, dark times are coming.

1084120.title: Dutch Crimes
1084120.plot: Cora, a young language teacher, faces problems with one of her students and decides to take a sleeping pill. When she wakes up at the next morning, she notices her house is overturned, her bicycle is missing and a body was found in the Capibaribe River, in front of her house. She now finds herself between reality and fantasy, in a dilemma about her relationship with the crime.

1084121.title: Pill Hai Ke Manta Nahi
1084121.plot: Soon to be a father, a married man's life turns upside down when an act of infidelity leaves him dealing with a volatile situation. Will he find a way out?

1084122.title: Pásztor stairs, 13th of september
1084122.plot: A man believes he have witnessed a murder on the Pásztor stairs in Budapest. As he becomes increasingly obsessed with the case, an irresolvable confrontation develops between the man in search of meaning and the meaningless world around him.

1084130.title: Kuttram Purinthal
1084130.plot: After a family is killed by mysterious individuals, a man driven by mental anguish takes justice into his own hands. He aims to punish the killers and those who caused them to escape the law.

1084135.title: The Game of Kings
1084135.plot: An unusual game of chess between two rivals.

1084141.title: ORK
1084141.plot: Takumi Kijima is an art student who has closed his heart off after having lost both parents. One day, a witch appears before him and bestows upon Takumi an Ork Stone, an object that grants its user the power to see the future. In one vision, Takumi sees his childhood friend Nozomi Shirai being killed by  a mysterious red creature named Gowm. Permanently influencing hydrochemical and petropolitical singularities, they give rise to xeno-disturbances, provoke pestilence, plague, and wars. The lord of the wind and epidemics - Pazuzu is the most powerful of them. Pazuzu feeds on dust, which, according to Kabbalah, is equal to the absence of God. The rise of Pazuzu is the apotheosis of apotropy, a sign of a new stage of the Anthropocene.

1084282.title: Contemporary History of Ukraine

While the walk is mediated via digital environments (personal videos, recorded conversations, google maps, etc.), it is based on various footage and chats with different people with whom Kazmina has friendships, intimacies, partnerships, and shared walks. To a large extent, the walk consists of the footage of the documentary project Underwater on which Kazmina has been working since 2015. From the nowadays' perspective of Russia's full-scale invasion, the work observes the chains and ruptures of collective digitized sensitivity, as well as fragile relations between bodies and territories that are neglected within the logic of informational warfare.

Creating conceptual links for each viral clip to a character, event, or thematic element from Morrison’s story, the film emphasizes questions around the book’s themes of internalized and externalized anti-blackness in contemporary culture.

1085100.title: Propagandaschlacht um die Ukraine
1085100.plot: The Russian war of aggression in Ukraine is not only waged with bombs, rockets and rocket-propelled grenades, but also in the media. It is a "propaganda battle" internally and externally. Russia spreads targeted disinformation in order to systematically devalue news. At the same time, their own population should be convinced that they want to liberate Ukraine from Nazis. Ukraine's narrative wants to emotionally mobilize its own population and strengthen resistance to the aggressor. Spindoctors are of particular importance in the propaganda battle over Ukraine. On the Ukrainian side, it's often influencers like Oleksiy Arestovych. On the Russian side, Vladimir Solovyov, Putin's snout, is supposed to sell the war to his own people with his daily TV talks. The documentary shows the new front lines of virtual warfare and provides insights into the populists' bag of tricks on social networks.

1085101.title: JOHNNY PORTER

Now living as Calvin Forrest, Johnny has been able to maintain a low profile while becoming a prominent figure in the city's criminal underbelly. However, Johnny's lifestyle of crime finally catches up to him when his apartment is broken into and his wife is taken. Listed as a prime suspect, Johnny is forced to skip town, but not before saving his wife and getting revenge on whoever tried to ruin his life.

1085204.title: The Lincoln Highway: Across America on the First Transcontinental Motor Route
1085204.plot: A video travelogue about the first ever coast-to-coast highway in America: The Lincoln Highway. The film traces the history and the path of much of the original 1913 route across 14 states, from the Pacific to the Atlantic, by way of a road trip in a somewhat-restored 1978 Ford Thunderbird. Instead of a vlog or a documentary, it is written and produced as an old-school travelogue, which incorporates both opinion and nonfiction into one unified narrative. It is not meant to be viewed in one sitting-- like a nonfiction book, you can pick it up or put it down at your leisure and also browse by chapter. However, like the Lincoln Highway, I wanted it to be a continuous experience from coast to coast, illustrating the landscape and its history all the way from the Palace of the Legion of Honor in San Francisco, to 42nd and Broadway in New York City, and beyond.

Each of the topics tries to answer the question "What can we do about it, so that Latvia's second largest city and Latgale as a region no longer causes surprise after the election results, and is loyal to the country and European values?"

The grand ceremony is just around the corner, and people in Chang'an are panic-stricken. The empress ordered Shen Ming, the head of the Dali Temple, to close the case within three days. Leng Jiyue, the chief of the water supervision department, also joined in, and met Duan Yan, an old acquaintance, on the "ghost ship" where the incident occurred. 1085900.title: As You Are
1085900.plot: A glimpse into a visual representation of memory; A Christmas-time series of meals, coffees, and movies, with friends, lovers, and housemates.  Faced with the compounding of faces and places, each moment begins to collide with one another: voices are muddled, and faces are broken. How is memory created? How are they separated from one another?

1085916.title: Whispers
1085916.plot: A man hears a sound many times.

1085941.title: Between Riverside and Crazy
1085941.plot: City Hall is demanding more than his signature, the landlord wants him out, the liquor store is closed—and the Church won’t leave him alone. For ex-cop and recent widower Walter “Pops” Washington and his recently paroled son Junior, the struggle to hold on to one of the last great rent stabilized apartments on Riverside Drive collides with old wounds, sketchy new houseguests, and a final ultimatum in this Pulitzer Prize-winning dark comedy from Stephen Adly Guirgis.

1086001.title: Family Mottoes
1086001.plot: The producer behind Big Man Japan (2007) sits in the director’s chair in this dryly comic and delightful Ninja action film. Family Mottoes focuses on a retired ninja named Monkey. Monkey’s wife Spider is established as an active and very deadly ninja, and they raise their four ninja kids in the forest. After rescuing an amnesiac old man from a sniper, the family finds they have invited trouble that they will need to confront, ninja-style!  Though Family Mottoes soundtrack is pulsating 70s string infused orchestral funk, and the film references the visual techniques and themes of the 60s Samurai era, it defies easy categorization, and prefers to look for the laughs in the action and violence. At its core, the film is about the strength of a supportive family working to common ends. Come expecting beautiful period costuming, sentimental music, and a family of skilled martial artists kicking ass side by side in a righteous battle.

1086020.title: Starling
1086020.plot: Four teenagers go on a birdwatching hike and things escalate quickly when one of them starts acting very strange.

1086063.title: LUCCIFIED
1086063.plot: A demon set loose from a hellish realm terrorizes a group of seniors in a small town high school. Based on a true story, director Tony Voccola delivers a horrifying depiction of the ABC murders that took place in his senior year. Starring Anthony Carlucci, Nicole Finlay, Levan Segura, Nicole Mattioli-Cortigiano and Cody Minutolo-Noble.

1086068.title: Twine
1086068.plot: Through animation and dance, Twine explores what it means to dream and create beauty and magic from within. Directed by Ana Contreras and Keely Song, the frame-by-frame animations are playful and wondrous.

1086113.title: 'Til We Meet Again
1086113.plot: A widow gets to reconnect with her husband -- but at a personal cost.

1086115.title: Luis Nery vs. Azat Hovhannisyan
1086115.plot: Former two-weight world champion Luis Nery looks to take a step towards another world title shot when he takes on Armenia's Azat Hovhannisyan.

1086119.title: Bubbly
1086119.plot: Manager Ray is about to make it big with singer Cas as she prepares for a breakout gig. But with dreams of fame flowing like cheap champagne, their relationship is tested to its limit and Ray does everything to hold on to his one shot.

1086140.title: IEM Katowice 2023 Grand Final - G2 v Heroic
1086140.plot: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2023 is an offline Polish Global Offensive tournament organized by ESL.

1086146.title: IEM Katowice 2023 Semi-Final - G2 v Liquid
1086146.plot: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2023 is an offline Polish Global Offensive tournament organized by ESL.

1086149.title: IEM Katowice 2023 Semi-Final - Heroic v Navi
1086149.plot: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2023 is an offline Polish Global Offensive tournament organized by ESL.

1086167.title: Puppy Bowl XIX
1086167.plot: It showcases 122 puppies, 67 shelters and rescues across 34 states, and for the first-time, it will feature a Native American animal organization and a puppy player from Dominica, West Indies

1086173.title: IEM Katowice 2023 Quarter-Final - Liquid v Vitality
1086173.plot: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2023 is an offline Polish Global Offensive tournament organized by ESL.

1086174.title: IEM Katowice 2023 Quarter-Final - Navi v Outsiders
1086174.plot: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2023 is an offline Polish Global Offensive tournament organized by ESL.

1086185.title: Affaire Johnny Depp/Amber Heard - La justice à l'épreuve des réseaux sociaux
1086185.plot: Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard is the story of two Hollywood movie stars, accusing each other of domestic violence, during a libel suit broadcasted online, followed in the entire world. During the spring of 2022, this media uproar was going along with an unprecedented online smear campaign against the actress. In fact, behind the casual banter, lie groups of angry men which, for many years, have the hate of women as their prority : masculinists.

1086186.title: Anacleto, o Balão
1086186.plot: A boy finds a flying balloon, filled with helium gas inside. The balloon gains a name, existing more than ever as Anacleto. So alive that it starts to scare the little boy.

1086205.title: Boyz in the Wood
1086205.plot: Boyz in the Wood follows two Asian cousins post lockdown, as they attempt to make a documentary about big cats in the UK countryside - a plan that they hope will solve their financial woes and catapult them to media stardom.

1086242.title: "We Are Fugazi From Washington, DC"
1086242.plot: To commemorate the 20 years that have passed since DC-based post-hardcore band Fugazi's last live appearance (November 4, 2002, at The Forum in London), Joe Gross, J oseph Pattisall and Jeff Krulik presented a screening of crowd-sourced, fan-recorded live shows and rare archival footage to pay tribute to Fugazi's prowess as a live act — for old fans to remember and for a new generation to discover what they missed. This one-off screening event celebrates the fans and their cameras, as much as the band itself — a collision/collusion of the ephemeral moment on stage, and the moments captured on camera.

1086255.title: (In)convenience
1086255.plot: Kirby is a trans man in his mid-twenties who, over his first few months on testosterone, heads to the local convenience store in San Francisco to pick up tampons each month he still has his period. During his first trip to the corner store, he meets Phoebe, the sociable cashier who is pleasantly surprised and intrigued at the scene she perceives: A man secure enough to buy tampons for his girlfriend? In the heat of the moment, Kirby doesn’t correct her. As Kirby starts making regular trips to the corner store, Devin, his best friend and roommate, picks up on Kirby’s interest in this mini-mart girl. With their encouragement, will Kirby tell Phoebe the truth? And if he does, how will she react?

1086258.title: Crossover
1086258.plot: For 48 hours, a terrible virus has paralyzed all the cops in the country... Only a shock team will be able to stop the author of this heinous act.

1086262.title: Heartbreakers at the BBC
1086262.plot: A selection of classic heartbreaking BBC performances from some of music’s biggest stars, including George Michael, Amy Winehouse, Sam Smith, Taylor Swift and soul legend Dionne Warwick.

1086268.title: Three
1086268.plot: Ivan and Vera are a young married couple. Both successful in their work, they live in a luxurious villa with their daughters, Petra and Vanja. Aleksandar is their best friend, an architect, as well as Vera's work colleague, who regularly spends time with Ivan and Vera. Aleksanadar and Ivan are friends from childhood, they often go out to nightclubs where Ivan leads a double life. Everything will change one day when the surprising proposal Alexander makes to Ivan does havoc in their lives.

1086274.title: I'm A Witch
1086274.plot: Here's a little film about a witch. I mostly made it for my kid, but you're allowed to watch it too.

1086289.title: Love Songs at the BBC: Volume Two
1086289.plot: A stunning selection of perfect performances of love songs from the BBC's music archives, including the sounds of Nat King Cole, Shania Twain, Billy Joel, Ed Sheeran and many, many more.

1086333.title: Férias 2
1086333.plot: After the july vacation, the end of the year vacation arrive, where they face new challenges and conflicts that test their friendship. They revisit old places and experiences while navigating tensions and reconciling differences.

1086340.title: A Whole Lifetime with Jamie Demetriou
1086340.plot: In this musical comedy special, follow Jamie Demetriou's journey from birth to unpleasant adulthood and old age.

1086343.title: Ardreal Holmes vs. Ismael Villarreal
1086343.plot: A main event matchup of undefeated prospects highlights the second SHOBOX of 2023 as Ardreal “Bossman” Holmes returns to SHOBOX to take on upset artist Ismael “Maelo” Villarreal in a 10-round super welterweight contest. In the co-main event, Misael Lopez looks to win his fourth straight bout after suffering his first pro loss on SHOBOX when he takes on Edward “Kid” Vazquez in a 10-round featherweight bout. Plus, the telecast opener pits two unbeaten 140-poiund knockout artists in Kurt Scoby and John “The Beast” Mannu. Live on SHOWTIME.

1086346.title: Behind the Scenes
1086346.plot: Hasan (33), who works as a sales manager in a construction company, and his wife Farida (30) have not been able to have children for a long time. After a doctor's examination, Hasan learns that he is infertile. But Hasan, who is afraid of harming his masculinity, hides this information from his wife. At the insistence of Hasan's mother, who thinks that the problem is in Sevda, they go to a midwife who lives in a village for treatment.

1086351.title: Whindersson Nunes: Preaching to the Choir

1086369.title: Robert
1086369.plot: “Robert” is a documentary film about a man that has been coming to Ukraine since 2005 to help children. In the movie, Robert comes back to the places where his journey in Ukraine began and also discovers new ones, such as Donbas, where children are in danger because of the war.

1086373.title: The February Plague
1086373.plot: A motion-picture essay about the beginning of the Russian invasion - an attempt to demonstrate a portrait of people, who are being forcibly uprooted from their homeland.

1086379.title: The Road
1086379.plot: A young family is driving down a road that is blocked by armed soldiers. The soldiers stop the car for no reason and take the man away for questioning. The man's wife and daughter stay in the car, waiting.

1086390.title: Screaming Soup Presents: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes Retrospective
1086390.plot: The movies, the cartoon, the toys and more with the cast and crew behind it all! Hosted by Screaming Soup!'s own Deadwest.

1086426.title: Lavell Crawford: THEE Lavell Crawford
1086426.plot: Lavell Crawford dives into the issues of getting older without the shame and with all the sarcasm. From experiencing his first bidet to paying HOA fees, Crawford brings playfulness to life's delicate situations that arise as we become more domesticated and seasoned.

1086430.title: Bubby's Nemesis
1086430.plot: A big boy goes to fight his Nemesis

1086454.title: Rolling Up the Welcome Mat (A Short Film)
1086454.plot: Short film featuring Kelsea Ballerini's 2023 EP Rolling Up the Welcome Mat.

1086460.title: Jelly
1086460.plot: A surreal trip across the expectations and insecurities of growing up.

1086479.title: I Am… Toni: 20th Anniversary Concert
1086479.plot: I AM… TONI: 20th Anniversary Concert Araneta Coliseum January 20, 2023

1086487.title: Zo doo wiejleu dat: een eeuw Twente op film

1086488.title: The Rocky Balboa Gender Show
1086488.plot: Rocky prepares for their big fight against the gender binary.

1086490.title: the bag.
1086490.plot: The bag being anything you want/desire. You must obtain it or accomplish your goal. Secure the bag.

1086491.title: Host Destination
1086491.plot: Host Destination follows a parallel narrative between Sloane, a soul awaiting their life on earth, and Katerina, a young artist who has to choose between her career and motherhood.

1086496.title: Be My Valentine
1086496.plot: After their Valentines day date, Elsie and Brett break down in an unknown area. They soon find out that isn't their only worry as a crazed man is on the hunt for his own Valentine.

1086506.title: Treat Myself
1086506.plot: A single woman just wants to relax on Valentine's Day until one big responsibility of hers keeps that from happening.

1086518.title: Last Night in New York
1086518.plot: If you are an avid reader of New York Social Diary, you already know David Patrick Columbia. If you just enjoy gossip about the powerful, the rich, the famous, and all those who aspire to be part of 'society,' he is the man for you.

1086547.title: Super Bowl LVII
1086547.plot: The Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles compete to determine the championship of the National Football League.

1086611.title: Monotonous Green
1086611.plot: A writer with indigestion starts having dreams about his siblings, who he hasn't been able to see since moving countries many years ago. Unemployment, distance, and repetition of daily activites take the writer into a state of decay.

1086635.title: Closeness
1086635.plot: It's been 2 years since they've been together. They haven't seen each other in person. Only pixels on a screen.

1086646.title: Amour
1086646.plot: Michael and Lisa have a date in a record store.

1086648.title: Super Bowl LVII Halftime Show
1086648.plot: While the Philadelphia Eagles and the Kansas City Chiefs compete for the Championship of the National Football League, Rihanna takes over the Apple Music Super Bowl 57 Halftime Show at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona.

1086657.title: Lou, notre maison s'envole
1086657.plot: Lou will be moving soon. With her friends, she creates a plan in order not to leave her small town, but soon enough reality catches the group up. The 12 years old girl is then forced to face her first friendship heartbreak.

1086673.title: Het Atelier
1086673.plot: The portrait of Grandma Lientje, which hung prominently in the living room, made Hella realize at an early age that there was great sadness behind it. No wonder that precisely that painting has become the starting point of a documentary about her remarkable creative resilience.

1086698.title: part i. The BUILDING.
1086698.plot: A short film about the Nicholson School of Communication and Media building at the University of Central Florida.

1086706.title: One of the most dangerous men in American history
1086706.plot: In 1830, David Walker sewed a pamphlet into the lining of a coat. The volume was thin enough to be hidden, but its content was far from insubstantial. At the time, many members of the US government considered this pamphlet to be one of the most dangerous documents in American history. But what was this incendiary document? And who exactly was the man who wrote it?

1086720.title: ANTHROPOPHILIA
1086720.plot: A young man goes about his daily routine, unaware that his own apartment is alive and desperately in love with him.

1086721.title: Pawns
1086721.plot: "The Pawn is the soul of chess." - Francois-Andre Danican Philidor

1086739.title: Roseanne Barr: Cancel This!
1086739.plot: For the first time in sixteen years, comedic icon Roseanne Barr returns to the stage for one night only on Fox Nation, with no subject off limits.

1086751.title: The Ten Commandments of Banquet Serving
1086751.plot: A lowly little banquet server named Jim tries to survive a wedding from Hell.

1086757.title: ETs Among Us Presents: Alaska's Secret Pyramid and Worldwide Alien Archaeology
1086757.plot: Peabody Award winner Linda Moulton Howe and other experts explore the enigma of the colossal stone pyramids encircling our planet, both their purposes and the incomprehensible technology behind their creation.

1086780.title: Vineyards
1086780.plot: A teenager finds himself entangled in a local love-triangle during a summer spent in Northern California's wine country. (Based on F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby").

1086792.title: Another Young Couple
1086792.plot: Another Young Couple — borne out of a camera test for If Beale Street Could Talk, James and I asked my friends Essence and Jihaari, newly transplanted to LA to allow us into their home for an afternoon tea about their lives and loves, apart and together. We were migrating to the Alexa 65 for Beale Street and wanted to see for ourselves how that large-format sensor would affect intimate portraiture within lived spaces… in particular the faces and spaces of Black folk.

1086794.title: Serial Dater
1086794.plot: On February 14th, 1958, three women experience the date night of their lives, but it just so happens to also be the last date they'll ever have.

1086796.title: The Punch of Respect
1086796.plot: In the late 70s, the controversial Sensei Toby Masterson amassed a cult-like following from a series of VHS martial arts lessons, in which he alludes to a very sought-after technique. Twenty years later, two dedicated and self-taught students drag along their friend in search of Lesson 100 aka The Punch of Respect.

1086805.title: Liam Brady: The Irishman Abroad
1086805.plot: On the 50th anniversary of Liam Brady signing schoolboy forms at Arsenal, covering the highs and lows of a life spent in the beautiful game.

1086865.title: ode to art.
1086865.plot: After a stressful conversation, a young woman reconciles herself through art.

1086874.title: The Last Coffee
1086874.plot: On the verge of a divorce, Rehaan and Iram meet for one last time over coffee. But they get stuck in a snowstorm and are left with no choice except to confront their pent-up feelings.

1086880.title: The Andes Tragedy: 50 Years Later
1086880.plot: In 1972, a plane carrying an Uruguayan rugby team disappeared into the Argentinean Andes. Now, 50 years after one of the greatest ordeals of survival in recorded human history, the full story is finally comprehensively told through the words of each of those who lived it.

1086881.title: Mama Frizby’s Sick Boys
1086881.plot: A scheming conman gets more than he bargained for!

1086883.title: liminal
1086883.plot: A boy arrives at his local health center only to enter the wrong section of the building and become lost

1086893.title: Ichigeki
1086893.plot: The drama depicts the exploits of the “Ichigeki Hishikkitai”, a special combat unit formed by farmers to deal with the "Imperial Robbers" and the "Imperial Thieves" of the Satsuma Clan who were causing a stir in Edo at the end of the Edo period.

1086899.title: Disney100 | Special Look
1086899.plot: In 2023, Disney’s 100-year milestone provides an opportunity to express thanks to the many generations of fans and followers, and also to honor the brilliant storytellers that have made Disney a part of everyone’s lives for 100 years.

1086905.title: 秦 基博 × U-NEXT FILM「イカロス 片羽の街」＆PREMIUM LIVE「ICARUS」

1086915.title: Eric
1086915.plot: Joshua finally gets to meet Eric, the beloved dog of a girl he's been dating. As the evening evolves, Josh begins to get a sneaking suspicion that Eric isn't your typical house pet.

1086928.title: A Short History of the Chechen Mustache
1086928.plot: A short feature documentary, that tells the complex history of the mustache in Chechnya. I hope this movie doesn't cause me to get my head cut off, that wouldn't be cool at all.

1087000.title: Eternamente Adolescente
1087000.plot: An actor who was famous and successful when he was just a 15-year-old teenager starring in the movie "The Pool Cleaner." Today, he finds himself without a job, without money and without friends, still living in his parents' house.

1087031.title: Helen Believe
1087031.plot: Olympic champion Helen Maroulis. At just 23 years old, she was competing in her first Olympic Games in Rio against Saori Yoshida, a 13x World Champion and the most decorated wrestler of all time. Yoshida was undefeated for over four straight years - until she stepped onto the mat with Maroulis, who shocked the world and defeated Yoshida to become the first, and only, American woman to win a Gold Medal in wrestling.

1087076.title: National Geographic Investigates - Guantanamo: Battle for Justice
1087076.plot: Recent events impacting Guantnamo prison detainees and families of 9/11 victims.

1087095.title: Making Him Famous
1087095.plot: Mario King (Vonii Bristow) is an inspirational speaker in the constant pursuit of fame. Though his grandfather (Cameron Arnett) always instilled the importance of living a life of integrity, Mario's affluent lifestyle leads to temptation, sending him down a path of destruction fueled by his own greed and arrogance.  Disgraced and humiliated, Mario picks up a delivery job in a small town in North Carolina hoping to make ends meet. When a speeding ticket threatens his livelihood and freedom, Mario must take on community service work at Safe Harbor homeless shelter.  While reluctant at first, Mario soon finds his calling in helping others with the encouragement of Olivia McBride (Morgan Graham) and Steven Young (Cornelius Muller). As Mario re-discovers the true meaning of "making Him famous," he begins to feel as if his past life is pulling him back.

1087102.title: All That You Love
1087102.plot: Travelling-Salesman Alfie Zimmer dreams of publishing a book about the graffiti he's encountered on his travels, but when the voices in his head start to get the better of him, he leaves the decision to go ahead with the publication up to fate and he may or may not come out alive. Based on "All That You Love Will Be Carried Away" from Everything's Eventual by Stephen King.

1087109.title: Come Spend The Night
1087109.plot: A young woman sends a letter to her distant lover, whilst pondering the very essence of her reality, and what it means for them to be together.

1087112.title: Ukraine War From the Air
1087112.plot: On 24th February 2022, Russia began its assault on Ukraine. This documentary will reveal the full scale of Russia's invasion from above.

1087124.title: Followers
1087124.plot: Wendy has the sneaking suspicion that meeting with Emma, who subsequently invites herself and her partner Mike over for dinner, was no chance encounter.

1087155.title: Valentine Bluffs
1087155.plot: After the horrific events that took place in Valentine Bluffs, TJ and Sara struggle to move on with their lives in a new town. Circumstances force TJ to move back to his hometown, where he tries to start a new life. 40 years pass, and the town of Valentine Bluffs has forgotten the names of Axel Palmer and Harry Warden. The next generation is getting ready to celebrate the big Valentine's Day dance. All seems well, until an ominous figure wielding a pick axe appears, leaving a trail of carnage behind.

1087169.title: Under a Juniper Tree
1087169.plot: A young woman named Dara falls in love with a woman named Juniper in her dreams, unaware of her true intentions.

1087170.title: The Date
1087170.plot: Desperate to find love for Valentine's Day, Noah agrees to go on a date with someone he met online. However, nothing is quite as it seems.

1087172.title: Two Thousand Twenty Three
1087172.plot: Two lovers recount a story told to them long ago.

1087191.title: Keep Me In Mind
1087191.plot: In an alternate universe, Jada continues her relationship with her deceased boyfriend.

1087206.title: 田原俊彦 WOWOW特別番組「ロマンティストでいいじゃない」

1087210.title: Ideopolis
1087210.plot: A non-narrative film consisting of ten takes throughout five sequences, entirely seen through the use of split screen.

1087218.title: GCW Take a Picture
1087218.plot: On January 21st GCW: Take a Picture 2023 is live on FITE+ straight from Von Braun Center in Huntsville, AL. The first matches are already announced, check them below:  Billie Starkz vs Sawyer Wreck  GCW World Tag Team Championship Los Macizos vs Jordan Oliver & Nick Wayne  Tony Deppen vs Adam Priest Blake Christian vs Cabana Man Dan Marko Stunt vs Mike Jackson ...and much more!

1087223.title: GCW 56 Nights
1087223.plot: In the first day of the new year GCW presents 56 Nights live on FITE! The event features The Do or Die Rumble and gets into the new year with a bang. You can check below and the first two matches from the lineup:  Do Or Die Scramble (Winner enters Rumble at #30) Joey Janela vs Blake Christian vs Tony Deppen vs Willie Mack vs Alec Price vs Jordan Oliver  Maki Iton vs Sawyer Wreck vs Billie Starkz vs Dark Sheik Matt Tremont vs Mad Man Pondo  Masha Slamovich vs Cole Radrick Nick Wayne vs Liam Slater  The Do or Die Rumble  *lineup subject to change

1087281.title: Ai Long Nhai: The Endless Love
1087281.plot: Ai studied abroad until, after being expelled for quarrelling, his father forces him to return to Thailand where he attends classes at the university where he teaches. There, Ai meets Chen Nhai, his new Harley Davidson-riding classmate who has an obsession with a yellow duck keychain. Ai falls in love at first sight and a whirlwind romance ensues.

1087289.title: 7 Gize Seba (7 ጊዜ ሰባ)
1087289.plot: የ ሃና ፍቃዱ ፊልም (A Film by hanna Fikadu)  Prepared and Presented By Kiru Multimedia

1087290.title: IM HERO The Final
1087290.plot: In the winter of 2022, Im Hero (IMHERO) Lim Young-woong's Encore Concert, which heated up the Gocheok Sky Dome, is coming to the audience in 2023 with "IM HERO The Final" through ScreenX, which will recreate the thrill of the grand finale.  "I feel like I became the main character of The Truman Show"  He says that he seems to be the main character of the movie 'The Truman Show', but he does his best every moment for the fandom 'Age of Hero', a 'real Lim Young-woong', a heartfelt interview, and a behind-the-scenes story of a national tour that can only be found in the movie theater.  Filmed with 14 cinematic cameras, Lim Young-woong's "IM HERO The Final" will provide a special viewing experience with angles that can only be seen in theaters.

1087309.title: Detector
1087309.plot: Victoria, a former operative, is getting used to a normal life with her beloved husband, a psychologist. But after being attacked by a criminal in the service, she cannot have children. The couple decide to take six-year-old Dasha, whose parents died in a fire, to their place for the weekend. And then strange events begin to happen in their country house. The girl behaves secretly and sometimes aggressively, draws scary pictures and spoils toys. In her drawings, Vika guesses the victims of that same criminal, now she is absolutely sure: the villain is alive, and he is somewhere nearby.

1087445.title: Dhishkyaoon
1087445.plot: Dishkiyaoon is a Marathi movie released on 10 Feb, 2023. The movie is directed by Pritam SK Patil and featured Prathamesh Parab as lead character.

1087453.title: Karma
1087453.plot: Karma, never loses an address. A family in which husband-wife and daughter were living a happy life and suddenly how the deeds are done in the past by someone brings changes in their lives.

1087538.title: Ho Ja Mukt
1087538.plot: 21-year old Vicky is diagnosed with mental health issues and starts having illusory images which he needs to break out of while his parents constantly fail to understand his situation.

1087544.title: Sab Fadey Jaange
1087544.plot: A night before his wedding Boota, a cab driver, finds himself stuck in an unforeseen situation when he offers to help a drunk stranger.

1087576.title: Dear Stranger
1087576.plot: Bintang (17), Zalika (17), and Surya, have been friends since childhood. Their friendship started when Zalika moved to the house next door to Bintang and Surya, who are brother and sister. One day, an incident made Zalika lose and forget Bintang. Bintang, who had harbored feelings for Zalika for a long time, did various ways to make Zalika remember him again. However, unexpectedly, all of Bintang's efforts ended in a reality he didn't expect.

1087591.title: Cassius X: Becoming Ali
1087591.plot: Cassius X puts a period of often-overlooked history into the spotlight - the period when Cassius Clay fought his way to achieving his lifelong dream of becoming World Heavyweight Champion while embarking on a secret spiritual journey.

1087596.title: Ruthless: Monopoly’s Secret History
1087596.plot: For generations, Monopoly has been America’s favorite board game, a love letter to unbridled capitalism and — for better or worse — the impulses that make our free-market society tick. But behind the myth of the game’s creation is an untold tale of theft, obsession and corporate double-dealing. Contrary to the folksy legend spread by Parker Brothers, Monopoly’s secret history is a surprising saga that features a radical feminist, a community of Quakers in Atlantic City, America’s greatest game company, and an unemployed Depression-era engineer. And the real story behind the creation of the game might never have come to light if it weren’t for the determination of an economics professor and impassioned anti-monopolist.  Part detective story, part sharp social commentary and part pop-culture celebration, Ruthless: Monopoly’s Secret History presents the fascinating true story behind America’s favorite game.

1087602.title: Can't Turn Us Around: Alabama's Foot Soldiers
1087602.plot: From roughly 1955 to 1965, an organized movement fueled by Black Americans grew across the American south. The goal—an end to segregation and a guarantee of equal civil rights. And nowhere did the movement for Black equality fight its most crucial battles than in one of the most segregated states in the union—Alabama.

1087603.title: Ukraine : vers l’Europe, loin de Moscou
1087603.plot: The shockwave of the Russian invasion in Ukraine has repercussions on the whole planet, Europe in particular. A geopolitical and historical analysis, with regard to the pivotal position of Ukraine in Europe

1087606.title: Black Broadway: A Proud History, A Limitless Future
1087606.plot: Celebrate legendary performances and roles made famous by Black artists as well as the new generation of Black Broadway stars.  An acclaimed cast performs classic songs from “The Wiz,” “The Color Purple” “Porgy and Bess” and many more that honor the rich history and evolution of Black roles and voices on Broadway. Weaving the history, prominence and hopes for the future through music, the cast includes Stephanie Mills, Norm Lewis, Corbin Bleu and more. Making special appearances are Clayton Cornelius, James Monroe Iglehart and more.

1087610.title: Jacques
1087610.plot: For over forty years, Jacques Duhoux, expedition pioneer in northern Quebec, has lived alone in the Uapishka (Groulx) Mountains. Now at 85 years old, he continues to live off the grid, despite the inevitable decline that comes with age. A tribute to a true monument of northern exploration, Jacques exposes the delicate balance between nature, aging and the search for freedom.

1087615.title: Doll Killer 3
1087615.plot: This third and final installment picks up on the same night as the previous installment as Charlie Crandall crashes a nearby slumber party before his final showdown with Doll Restoration Artist Stephanie.

1087630.title: Discovering the Ancient Colors of Yucatan
1087630.plot: The Ancient Colors of Yucatan. A trip to the Yucatan Peninsula, amid Caribbean colors and history, that part of Mexico is dedicated to tourism, inhabited by the Maya and with amazing seabeds where turtles and whale sharks come to breed.

1087632.title: The Prince
1087632.plot: All the world’s a stage and Jen and Sam have learned the hard way, being trapped in a Shakespearean multiverse. On their quest to discover the doorway back to reality they notice something unusual about Henry ‘Hotspur’ Percy.  Written by and starring Abigail Thorn, creator of Philosophy Tube, The Prince is a transformative new play that has everything: sword fighting, lesbianism, Hamlet, and disappointed parents.

1087637.title: Misteri Pamulang
1087637.plot: A slice-of-life film about the lives of three students living in the most haunted rented house in Pamulang.

1087640.title: Knights of Swing
1087640.plot: Set in 1947, Knights of Swing is a feature film that chronicles a group of young jazz musicians whose dream is to form a “really swingin’ Big Band”.  Unfortunately, things prove much more complicated when the community objects to the diversity of the band. Alliances form, and lines are drawn. What follows is soul searching, uplifting, and through music, our story illuminates forgiveness, healing and unconditional love.

1087686.title: The UFO Chronicles: A History of Mysterious Sightings
1087686.plot: "Written, performed, and illustrated by AI. Join us as we recount the riveting history of UFO sightings and alien encounters. The truth is out there. Let's find it together."

1087689.title: SCOOP D'ÉTAT
1087689.plot: On a hot summer's day, an ice cream man and his last scoop engage in a battle of wits! Who will win? ...Seriously, I'm curious. Don't ask me, I know just as much as you do!

1087693.title: REM
1087693.plot: Unfulfilled by his day-to-day life, an 18-year-old homebody copes with social anxiety by living the life of his dreams, in his dreams.

1087694.title: American Terror Tales 2
1087694.plot: From the hottest directors in Horror comes three tales of terror featuring Killer Dolls, Demonic Possession, and Witchcraft at a prestigious Dance Academy!

1087731.title: Your Music 消失音乐（家）无声, 翻译失败（没）注意
1087731.plot: 1st Advent-era repository proposed to be related to text "Dear Diary," as referenced by upload constituencies' representatives assigned 0-8.

1087743.title: Beneath the Concrete, The Forest
1087743.plot: “Beneath the Concrete, The Forest”  is a short experimental documentary that takes us inside an ongoing struggle inside the city of Atlanta, GA between two sides to determine the future of Weelaunee, the biggest contiguous urban forest in the country.

1087754.title: Alison Spittle: Wet
1087754.plot: Alison loves to do star jumps in the water. She also likes to watch people fight in chip shops. Her two worlds collide as a fight breaks out in aqua-aerobics and she's never felt so alive. When the foam settles, Alison realises she's an outwardly nice person who lives for confrontation.

1087771.title: Nada Que Ver
1087771.plot: After Carlos is tasked to care for Paola, both characters must work out their differences to make their time together more pleasant. As time goes on, they are faced with lessons about trust, mutual respect, and perhaps love.

1087787.title: Auto Conduct - The Story
1087787.plot: A documentary short telling the story of Ezekiel Wheeler, a car enthusiast working to grow the first "car culture sanctuary" in Downtown Los Angeles. His business, Auto Conduct, serves to not only store some of LA's rarest cars, but to also provide a place for events, exhibition, and culture.

1087788.title: The Saviour: Brig Pritam Singh
1087788.plot: The main focus of the documentary is based on the adventures life of this gallant soldier Brig. Pritam Singh (Saviour of Poonch, Sher Baccha, nick named by residents of Poonch). who was born on 5th October 1911 in village Dina in district Ferozepur, Punjab. He was commissioned in the Punjab Regiment in 1937 and served during the 2nd World War in North Western Frontier Provence and Italy. He was posted in Singapore during 1942 and badly wounded in an air raid during the fighting and taken as prisoner of War by the Japanese.

1087819.title: Her Affair to Die For
1087819.plot: A young woman’s dad becomes the obsession of her seductive roommate who will stop at nothing to possess him.

1087828.title: The Devil's Academy
1087828.plot: Reveals the shocking haunting that took over Miami Aerospace Academy and its students. In 1979, all hell broke loose at the school when the student body seemed to fall victim to mass demonic possession. Forty years later, shocking revelations from former students shed light on the day the devil took over their school.

1087855.title: berdiri
1087855.plot: a short film portrait Depok neighborhood.

1087896.title: Moonlight Chicken
1087896.plot: Jim is an ordinary guy running a Hainanese chicken rice diner. One night, he meets breezy Wen when he stays past closing drunk. Brought together by fate that night, intangible feelings arise. Neither can stop thinking about the other despite Jim's efforts to remain unattached. Working at the diner are Jim's nephew Li Ming, Saleng, and occasionally chicken supplier Kaipa who doesn't mind having an excuse to see him.

1087899.title: Matt Rife: Matthew Steven Rife
1087899.plot: Matt Rife’s hilarious new self titled special “Matthew Steven Rife” is the perfect look into his charismatic whit. In his second self-produced hour special, built by friends and fans, Matt pushes comedic boundaries with stories, improv, and positive messages. If you love laughing more than crying, this is the show for you!

1087926.title: Giant Snake Incident at Yellow River

1087971.title: The Last Video Store
1087971.plot: After a Gold Coast video rental store is robbed, Gary the store owner installs security cameras store wide. Unbeknown to the staff, Gary uses the cameras to capture an emerging love story unfold between two of his young employees Andrew and Stacy. Stacy's ex-boyfriend Damian a twisted criminal with a terrifying secret, returns to the store to make trouble for the young lovers. This conflict culminates in a dramatic showdown amidst the Comedy, Drama and Horror sections. The Last Video Store examines the themes of, movie nostalgia, unrequited love, bravery and the human cost of late returns.

1087973.title: Mama Weds Papa
1087973.plot: A kid tries to bring her parents together and organize their marriage.

1087981.title: Cik Kiah’s Trip to AJL
1087981.plot: Cik Kiah received 11 tickets AJL in the city. With help from her buddies, she managed to arrange a road trip. But it does not go as planned and encountered numbers of hilarious incidents on the way.

1088022.title: Fired Up
1088022.plot: A monster made of fire walks into a gym full of all kinds of monsters. What can possibly go wrong?

1088029.title: The Hiker
1088029.plot: A hiker gets lost in the forest and is swallowed by the mist.

1088046.title: Sab Fadey Jaange
1088046.plot: A night before his wedding Boota, a cab driver, finds himself stuck in an unforeseen situation when he offers to help a drunk stranger.

1088059.title: What Is Really Underneath?
1088059.plot: Short film accompanying 2023's Code Orange album of the same title.

1088063.title: Où est parti E.T. ? - L'enfance selon Spielberg

1088094.title: Lost Boy in the Real World
1088094.plot: An aspiring comedian documents his thoughts and practices his material in the days leading up to his first ever open mic performance.

1088112.title: Rap Trap: Hip-Hop on Trial
1088112.plot: The criminal case against Young Thug and Gunna, two of the biggest names in hip hop, reignited a conversation around the use of lyrics in the courtroom and sparked a movement to protect art. Are these words evidence of a crime or fiction set to rhyme?

1088116.title: The Gilbert Diaries
1088116.plot: .When a happy-go-lucky, but very naive, Gilbert embarks on his daily adventures, he comes across a variety of interesting encounters, opportunities, obstacles, and laughable moments alongside friends, family, and some adversaries

1088118.title: Maisons et hotels de légende - Auberge du Père Bise

1088122.title: Semst
1088122.plot: Semst, or Super Epic Mega Sweet Titans of Comedy is the comedy-trio consisting of Jonatan Unge, Ahmed Berhan and Branne Pavlovic. Touring together since 2014, the group has assembled a large crowd and this is their latest special, recorded in Stockholm 2021.

1088137.title: Night Cafe
1088137.plot: The film follows an ensemble of colorful characters at a restaurant who experience an eventful night while a waitress's shift goes from bad to worse.

1088181.title: David Adeleye vs. Dmytro Bezus
1088181.plot: David Adeleye faces unbeaten Ukranian Dmytro Bezus for the vacant WBO European heavyweight belt.

1088186.title: Murphy's Lore: Origin, Method & Legacy
1088186.plot: Three part documentary from Indicator about the history and career of Michael J. Murphy.

1088219.title: Alarm
1088219.plot: A person wakes up on four different days.

1088349.title: UFC Fight Night 220: Muniz vs. Allen
1088349.plot: Andre Muniz vs. Brendan Allen (Middleweight)  Augusto Sakai vs. Don'Tale Mayes (Heavyweight)  Tatiana Suarez vs. Montana De La Rosa (Flyweight)  Mike Malott vs. Yohan Lainesse (Welterweight)

1088359.title: Burt Reynolds: The Last Interview
1088359.plot: Burt Reynolds' last interview - uncut, unscripted and uncensored - with exclusive Q&As with Academy Award winner Quentin Tarantino and close associates, that reveal the final act of his life.

1088365.title: The Snow Queen - Ice Ballet
1088365.plot: In 1844, Hans Christian Andersen imagines the story of an evil troll who wants to drive the sun out of the hearts of humans. To do this, he hangs a huge magic mirror in front of the moon. When it breaks, the people touched by its shards become insensitive. This is the plot of the multidisciplinary work performed in the setting of the Tampere ice rink in Finland, with music composed by Tuomas Kantelinen.

1088370.title: God's Not Here
1088370.plot: The first-ever "faith-based anthology film" featuring four stories about forgiveness, love, hope and faith.

1088387.title: arnold palmer kisses
1088387.plot: A boy works his way through a breakup.

1088400.title: BKFC: Knucklemania 3
1088400.plot: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship: KnuckleMania 2 will be a bare-knuckle fighting event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on February 17, 2023, at the Tingley Coliseum in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

1088427.title: Southern Bypass: 5.49-6am
1088427.plot: Southern Bypass is a road south of Nairobi in Kenya that leads into the heart of the city; This single take shot was filmed from 5.49 am to 6 am heading in the direction of the sunrise. The motorbike rider is a boda boda, a motorcycle taxi service. Where they came from and where they are going is incidental to their state of being; they are still and the world around them moves.

1088432.title: Black Country, New Road - 'Live at Bush Hall'
1088432.plot: A concert film chronicling three shows from Black Country, New Road's weekend residency at London's Bush Hall. Each night featured a different visual theme and corresponding stage sets, inspired by school plays, pastoral scenes, and a fictitious, haunted pizza parlor called I Ain’t Alfredo No Ghosts.

1088467.title: A Palermitan Cowboy
1088467.plot: Nino Vetri is a palermitan writer and musician, he goes around dressed like a cowboy. On his way he will meet weird and wonderful characters; he will face trials looking for a inner quietude, obsessively chased by a Director and his own camera.

1088541.title: White Tendons
1088541.plot: A lost traveler encounters a talking clown puppet that won’t stop looking at a mysterious orange light.

1088554.title: GCW Jersey J-Cup, Session 1
1088554.plot: On February 11th GCW presents Jersey J-Cup live on FITE+ straight from White Eagle Hall in Jersey City! The event will be in 2 sessions, and the first 15 entrants in Session one have been announced, here they are:  Mike Bailey Alex Shelley Jonathan Gresham Komander Arez  Jack Cartwheel Joey Janela Jordan Oliver Cole Radrick Tony Deppen  Blake Christian Alec Price Billie Starkz Charlie Starboy Lio Rush

1088556.title: GCW Jersey J-Cup, Session 2
1088556.plot: On February 11th GCW presents Jersey J-Cup live on FITE+ straight from White Eagle Hall in Jersey City, NJ! The event will be in 2 Session and this is the second one. Stay tuned for more information about the pro wrestling stars that will take part in this session.

1088558.title: GCW Vs New South
1088558.plot: On January 22nd GCW vs New South is live on FITE straight from Singin' River Brewing in Florence, AL. The first matches are already announced, you can check them below:  Sawyer Wreck (GCW) vs Donnie Primetime (New South) Bussy vs The Carnies Los Macizos vs Infrared  Tony Deppen vs Brandon Williams Blake Christian vs Hunter Drake ... and much more!

1088560.title: GCW Save Me
1088560.plot: On January 7th GCW presents Save Me live on FITE+ straight from Thalia Hall in Chicago, IL. The first matches from the lineup are already announced and you can check them below:  THRUSSY (Effy, Allie, Sheik) vs Mason'S Mercenaries (Mason, Slade, Parrow) Joey Janela vs Tony Deppen Cole Radrick vs Arez  Macizos vs Bang Bros Christian Blake vs Liam Slater Homicide vs JWM

1088561.title: The Trident
1088561.plot: When you're the legendary Puss in Boots, life and death go paw in paw. In this epic original short, Puss recalls one of his most daring deaths yet.

1088571.title: Canned Love
1088571.plot: There are many couples show affection in public. A clown is thirsty for love and found that the consumption of canned love can quickly get love.

1088608.title: The Yellow Triangle
1088608.plot: As M.Bou, the boss of the city underworld, offers a big reward to whoever brings him the Yellow Triangle. Bart and Oscar, two gangsters who always work together, decide to get it !

1088616.title: Hi!
1088616.plot: Your first day in school is never easy, let alone when you have ADD or ADHD. Hi! is the story of a little ADDer child who is encouraged by her mom to go to school by bus. An animation that raises awareness about ADD and helps children who find saying "hi" is not that easy.

1088631.title: Mr. Sardine's Basement Vol. III
1088631.plot: The third installment in the "Mr. Sardine's Basement" series.

1088637.title: Platform Phantasm
1088637.plot: An animation project about a ghost conductor who takes care of all their passengers.

1088638.title: Blijven Gaan
1088638.plot: Five seniors, the eldest is 91 years old, train together in a gym in Rotterdam to keep fit. But the body falters and their environment is getting smaller and smaller. By doing sports, the seniors support each other: origin and social status disappear. The gym fraternizes and gives the elderly unprecedented pleasure. Despite the fanatical sports, the decline is unstoppable. This documentary also shows the seniors alone at home and the confrontational fight against the body that is becoming stiffer, with the realization that that battle is always lost in the long run.

1088641.title: Mr. Sardine's Basement Vol. IV
1088641.plot: Children and animals are the same. You can get rid of them easily, and even use them as you want.

1088668.title: Faraway Fiesta
1088668.plot: An immigrant young man prepares his apartment for his mother’s birthday. However the "party” is a lonely video-call because his entire family is a country away.

1088683.title: Cosmic Static Interference
1088683.plot: An abstract expressionist portrayal of the Universe - its explosive beginning and what may exist beyond our planet and ourselves - made up entirely of edited images of TV static (noise).

1088753.title: Reflection
1088753.plot: A character meets their future self in a mirror and confronts their current self and who they will eventually become.

1088765.title: Jagal Rahayu
1088765.plot: Five teenagers decided to celebrate New Year's Eve at a cottage in a village that turns out to have a very terrifying New Year's ritual.

1088777.title: Under His Influence
1088777.plot: A social media influencer falls for an inmate and starts a crusade to prove his innocence, but after they win his appeal, she uncovers a dark secret that changes her life.

1088779.title: Slave Dolls
1088779.plot: A deranged loner only known by his online alias "Webmaster" spends his days and nights operating an international sex trafficking ring on the dark web known as "Lolita Slave Dolls", where kidnapped victims have gruesome operations performed on them and are then sold to customers to be used to fulfil their most depraved desires. For his next operation, he enlists a group of corrupt and sadistic doctors to torture, degrade and humiliate a new victim at the behest of a customer. But when the media starts to catch on to the Webmaster's doings, his mind begins to work against him, and paranoia slowly takes over his being.

1088807.title: Putin and the Presidents
1088807.plot: FRONTLINE investigates Russian President Vladimir Putin’s clashes with multiple American presidents as he’s tried to rebuild the Russian empire. Veteran filmmaker Michael Kirk (Putin’s Revenge, Putin’s Road to War) and his team trace the miscalculations and missteps of U.S. presidents over five administrations, culminating in Putin’s invasion of Ukraine.

1088812.title: SpongeBob SquarePants Presents the Tidal Zone
1088812.plot: GrandPat travels through alternate dimensions and timelines to get home.

1088825.title: Felix Sturm vs Sukru Altay
1088825.plot: Sturm last fought in March 2022, when he lost an IBO Inter-Continental super middleweight title fight to Istvan Szili.  Altay's last action was to win a split-decision win over Aleksandar Kuvac in September. The fight will take place 2/18/23 at the Porsche Zentrum in Stuttgart, Baden-Wurttemberg.

1088832.title: The Job Is Done
1088832.plot: A noir-style short film following a hitman.

1088833.title: Impact Wrestling: No Surrender 2023
1088833.plot: On February 24th Impact Wrestling presents No Surrender live on FITE straight from Sam's Town in Las Vegas, NV. The event features the title defence of the longest reigning IMPACT World Champion of all times Josh Alexander against former champion Rich Swann in what has all the makings of an all-time classic.  One more title is on the line when the Knockouts Champion Mickie James goes one-on-one against one of her toughest opponents Masha Slamovich to defend her Impact Knockouts World Title.  Plus IMPACT World Tag Team Champions The Motor City Machine Guns, X-Division Champion Trey Miguel, Digital Media Champion Joe Hendry Moose, Frankie Kazarian, Eddie Edwards, Jonathan Gresham, Heath, Rhino, The Major Players, The Bullet Club, Deonna Purrazzo, Jordynne Grace and more top IMPACT Wrestling stars in action.

1088838.title: Aagantuk
1088838.plot: On his way back to his house in Saputara, Daanish stumbles upon a stranger lying on the road. The old and tired stranger Shukhlaji latches on to Daanish for a lift on the deserted streets of Saputara ghat. Both strangers, with opposing personalities, inside a car set for a journey full of surprises and shocks.

1088842.title: Cupid
1088842.plot: Short Film Written and Directed by Demarco Mayle. Starring Demarco Mayle.

1088849.title: The Broken Table
1088849.plot: The 24-minute film juxtaposes a day in the lives of Giridhar or Giri, a 60-something Alzheimer’s patient (played by Shah), and Deepti, an aspiring psychologist (played by Dugal). During the course of the film, Deepti, who’s charged with looking after Giri for a day, as his family is away for a wedding, ends up remembering a thing or two about herself.

1088885.title: The Perfect Escape
1088885.plot: Love, sex and psychedelic rhythms. In an isolated mountain cabin, four couples rediscover their relationship. They only have one weekend to find a happy ending.

1088900.title: 8 комнат. Ключи Есенина
1088900.plot: Journey into the world of poetic images of Sergey Yesenin, his deep contradictions and spiritual searches. The poet meets eight hypostases of himself on the way of understanding his work, talent and era.

1088901.title: Где проходит граница?
1088901.plot: The action begins in Moscow, continues in the Crimea and takes place in the Donbass. These three points, three locations are important, semantic ancestors of historical events that shocked the whole world.

1088913.title: Falling Higher: The Story Of Ampage
1088913.plot: In the years following the collapse the 80s Glam Metal era of the Sunset Strip, a songwriter chronicles the unexpected events of his life and the transformation of his band and craft.

1088935.title: Sridevi Shoban Babu
1088935.plot: Sridevi, daughter of Sekhar, i is a budding costume designer whose creative urges take her to Araku, where she meets Shoban Babu either by design or by accident and falls for him. But there is a catch. Sridevi's father and Shoban's mother are estranged siblings.

1088952.title: Angoulême : 50 ans de bulles
1088952.plot: In 1974, a group of friends, inspired by what they had seen in Italy and driven by their common passion, organized a comic book fair in their Charente town of Angoulême. Half a century later, the event has become an internationally renowned festival, which is about to celebrate its 50th edition. This documentary tells the story of the creation of the Angoulême International Comics Festival in the context of the 1970s, and the evolution of the event since then, which has made the city a world reference in an exponentially growing bubble market.

1089013.title: Pieces
1089013.plot: Pieces is an emotionally powerful exploration of the effects of trauma on a young girl's life. It is a window into the protagonist's inner turmoil and her way of dealing with it.

1089024.title: Tran Minh Hieu Eats a Bacon Double Cheeseburger
1089024.plot: Tran Minh Hieu sits down and eats a burger.

1089035.title: Transatlantic: The Final Flight: Live At L'Olympia
1089035.plot: Following the release of 2021’s ambitious studio album ‘The Absolute Universe’, progressive[1]rock supergroup Transatlantic present ‘The Final Flight: Live At L'Olympia’. A document of the bands triumphant show in Paris, the last night of their tour in support of their most recent studio album, it sees Neal Morse, Mike Portnoy, Roine Stolt & Pete Trewavas (along with Ted Leonard) performing the entirety of „The Absolute Universe (The Ultimate Version)”, before returning to the stage to perform some of their extensive back catalogue. A night as special as they come, this audio/visual document presents the band at their most majestic. Mixed by Rich Mouser, ‘The Final Flight - Live At L'Olympia’ will be available as a 3CD+Blu-ray Digipak & as a Gatefold 180g 4LP Vinyl with LP-booklet, featuring stunning photos from the evening. The Blu-ray features the entire concert film, plus 5.1 surround sound mix option.

1089057.title: Love: The Fractalmix
1089057.plot: A very long and cinematic music mashup by JDII about the story of a romantic relationship.
