1089058.title: Where Have You Been?
1089058.plot: The portraits of a young man who has lost his creativity.

1089068.title: Ukraine: Kinder im Krieg
1089068.plot: The war in Ukraine told by children. A director gives the floor to young Ukrainians who share their experience, their emotions and their aspirations in the face of horror.

1089118.title: Jane Boleyn:  The Most Evil Woman in The Tudor Court?
1089118.plot: Tracy Borman tells the story of the woman some claim brought down Anne Boleyn.  Lady Rochford , Jane Boleyn.

1089119.title: Preach Modern
1089119.plot: Preach Modern shows a documentary team following Damien, an eager and charming student, to document his way into priesthood as a young adult. It quickly becomes clear that Damien has no idea about celibacy and to make matters worse, he is very popular among his female classmates.  Throughout the documentary, Damien and his mentor, Father Titus, work towards a trial service that young Damien will hold at Father Titus' local church. On their way to promote the trial service and Catholicism, Titus encounters memories of his past as a young priest, and Damien must confront his female classmates, who are helplessly drawn to his charms. Will Damien be able to resist accidental temptation or is he in for an unexpected shock?

1089121.title: How I Got My Names
1089121.plot: I never knew how to answer the question, "what is your name," because if truth be told, I do not have a name, I have five names... Using family album and hand drawn animation, How I Got My Names tells a personal story about dealing with a traumatic childhood while navigating the ever-confusing young adulthood.

1089127.title: President Biden's 2023 State of the Union Address
1089127.plot: On February 7, President Biden will speak directly to the American people about the historic progress we've made, the work that lies ahead, and his optimism for the future.

1089136.title: The Murderer
1089136.plot: A lack of inspiration plunges a painter into an intense and hasty introspection. His sanity diminishes, leaving a sinister and putrid madness adrift that drives him to murder the cause of his creative plateau.

1089138.title: If Her World Ends
1089138.plot: Combining 8mm footage and stop motion, this micro-documentary asks how the intimate need for Reproductive Justice is threatened by the US' recent restriction of abortion rights.

1089147.title: Still
1089147.plot: A experimental documentary using real testimonies from women about their experiences in night clubs. Visualised through an interpretive dance piece.

1089165.title: Velma Meets the Original Velma
1089165.plot: HBOs Velma meets the original 1969 Scooby Doo Velma. How does this animation go? IDK Keep watching to find out. Maybe Norville meets Shaggy. Maybe they meet the original Scooby Doo Mystery Gang.

1089172.title: Movie Themes at the BBC
1089172.plot: A selection of some of the best BBC moments and classic archive performances from those singers and bands who cracked Hollywood as well as the pop charts.  These are the tunes that get hummed when leaving the cinemas over the years from blockbusters, Oscar winners, comedies and family favourites, featuring a selection of soundtrack stars including Destiny’s Child, Paul Simon, All Saints, Simple Minds and Dolly Parton.

1089174.title: It's Not Gonna Lick Itself
1089174.plot: Go inside the Texas drag shows with an undercover reporter. Talk with experts who can describe what effect the hyper-sexualization is having on the children forced to attend.

1089175.title: The Freedom of Herds
1089175.plot: The history and trauma of two men, brought together by war, is exposed when a mysterious visitor treads familiar ground.

1089177.title: The Breakup Album of the Year
1089177.plot: It's being called the breakup album of the year. Running late to a studio livestream, Jamie gets a voice note from his ex - the first communication they've had in months. She's heard the album. She has some thoughts.

1089188.title: Single Shankarum Smartphone Simranum
1089188.plot: A jobless guy gets a phone, with an artificial intelligence which behaves like a real girl. It improves his life in all aspects. they become close and it falls in love with them. He ignores her feelings and sees it just like a phone with a voice.it gets offened and takes revenge and makes his life a total mess.

1089206.title: CLONE
1089206.plot: Aliens coming to Earth start taking over mankind by making clones of humans

1089219.title: Don’t Overwork VFX Artists
1089219.plot: Four college boys get a surprise visit from a night vigilante; of course, the night doesn’t go as planned.

1089233.title: Chocolate
1089233.plot: After an bar of chocolate falls from the sky, two hungry students battle It out.

1089247.title: Batman Saves Aquaman
1089247.plot: A short stop-motion animated parody of the classic DC superheroes Batman and Aquaman.

1089254.title: Rabia and Olivia
1089254.plot: The story of illegal immigrant Rabia who migrates to canada and A nine year old mentally stressed child Olivia. When both comes solace for each other until Rabia makes mistake to be arrested. The search begins of Olivia for Rabia and the dramatic situations follows with twists and turns. The film is shot in Canada And India.

1089274.title: Monika Liu Eurovizija'22 Backstage
1089274.plot: A short documentary on Monika Liu's Eurovision journey in Turin 2022.

1089279.title: Where the Luck Goes?
1089279.plot: A mother-daughter’s conversation reveals their own struggles respectively in a night. Instance of the marriage crisis, homo-love, and loneliness which are stimulating them to get deeper to each other and their own-self.

1089286.title: Legacy
1089286.plot: When three parties threaten to kill Rob Saviour and steal the family's cash he has to take steps to ensure his family and the legacy they have built are protected. Not to mention a Police Captain who also wants him dead and is willing to take extraordinary measures to make that happen. How far will they go to protect their legacy?

1089312.title: John Ramirez vs. Luis Padilla
1089312.plot: John Ramirez will make the first defence of his North American Boxing Association (NABA) super flyweight crown against Mexican Luis Padilla at the Fantasy Springs Resort Casino in Los Angeles.

1089315.title: Super Volcano
1089315.plot: When a super-volcano threatens the island of Hawaii, a team of rescue and disaster experts who are called in to help must race against the clock to save those in the path of the molten lava and stop the volcano for good.

1089329.title: Carry On: Secrets & Scandals
1089329.plot: Behind-the-scenes stories reveal the truth behind the films' cheeky, cheerful image.

1089345.title: Megaquake
1089345.plot: As a megaquake threatens San Francisco, a series of foreshocks wreaks havoc across the city. Now, an elite team of emergency service and disaster experts converge on the anticipated epicenter, working tirelessly to save as many lives as possible and stop the Big One before it strikes.

1089359.title: The Green Crocatoo
1089359.plot: Neonoir detective modern classic. Drawing on post ironic satirical irony, this award-winning short weaves its way through a delightfully back-to-basics subversion. With an eye for no detail, and every stone left unturned, this short uncovers what it means to be something in this economy. An unmissible short (it's literally 3 minutes x).

1089370.title: American Cherry
1089370.plot: A mysterious, troubled boy meets an impressionable girl in their small town. Together they embark on a romance where his love turns into obsession as he tries to protect her from her dysfunctional family -- he makes her a video diary that confesses an intricate story of love, mental illness and the tragic consequences if left untreated.

1089398.title: Daniel Brühl - Der Reiz des Bösen
1089398.plot: Daniel Brühl is perhaps Germany’s most famous actor, starring in films such as Goodbye Lenin and Quentin Tarantino’s Inglourious Basterds. Often seen as the eternal nice guy, he has also played a darker range of characters in a number of languages. Portrait of a surprising and versatile actor.

1089450.title: Red Herring
1089450.plot: When Kit Vincent, a young filmmaker, first receives a terminal diagnosis, his first instinct is to turn on his camera and document those closest to him. Kit’s divorced parents are naturally having a hard time grappling with the reality of their son’s illness, and his father, Lawrence, begins a transition of his own—a conversion to Judaism. Following along with his father’s process of grieving for his son’s upended future, Red Herring captures the absurdity of the things we do to find solace in times of inexplicable tragedy. In this personal and touching documentary about a life cut short, Vincent walks the line between humor and grief to helm this love letter to the relationships that keep us going through the dark stages of life.

1089453.title: Dimitri -Purple Flowers Scattering at Daybreak- / Jaguar Beat
1089453.plot: "Rusudan of the Twilight Kingdom" is a dramatic historical romance written by Yo Namiki, set in thirteenth-century Georgia (formerly Gruziya). The novel that was broadcast as an audio drama on NHK in 2017 and received outstanding reviews will be adapted into a romantic musical by Takarazuka Revue Company.

1089465.title: Alex
1089465.plot: Alex is around 40 years old, he is nice and friendly and also addicted to pleasure and sex. He lives with his wife and his two children. A tour of 24 hours in his life.

1089476.title: The Time Killer
1089476.plot: two Policemen are required to investigate a new murder attempt  that happened in town, Who tried to kill the one and only - The time lord?

1089477.title: Couple Therapy
1089477.plot: A couple of young parents try out an alternative therapy that consists of arguing violently while playing bumper cars in Parque Rodó.

1089491.title: The New Romantics
1089491.plot: Fermín Solana is the vocalist of the Uruguayan band "Hablan por la espalda". We accompany him on a sleepless night, going through the personal genealogy of his creative impulse, while revealing his unique portrait.

1089528.title: Her Majesty's Prime Ministers: John Major
1089528.plot: As a school dropout, the teenage John Major could simply never have dreamt that he would one day become a powerful political leader and get elected as Britain's Prime Minister. Major became Her Majesty's ninth Prime Minister.

1089544.title: Monument: The Untold Story of Stone Mountain
1089544.plot: Atlanta History Center explores the controversial history of the Stone Mountain carving through a documentary film and online resources.

1089545.title: Michigan Hell House
1089545.plot: In the small town of Merrill, Michigan, the Pomeraning family is plagued by paranormal activity in their home in 1974 in one of the most terrifying stories known to the general public to date.

1089569.title: Cache-sexes - Un jeu d'artiste
1089569.plot: The history of art seen through the fig leaf and its avatars: from Antiquity to the present day, an inventory of Puritanism applied to the fine arts and the ruses to circumvent it.

1089571.title: By Hand
1089571.plot: Oscar and his deaf younger sister Nia are sent down to a remote coastal town to visit their estranged fisherman father Mark. Over the space of an afternoon the trio are ripped apart and brought back together again in this film surrounding deafness in a family dynamic.

1089573.title: La brigade extraordinaire
1089573.plot: A brigade composed essentially of people with Down's syndrome works in a restaurant in the Marais, a chic Parisian neighborhood. Between shots and slackness, there is a lot of love and humor. The young people blossom in an ordinary world that, until then, was unknown to them. Will they achieve their greatest dreams?

1089575.title: Okoshko
1089575.plot: A young boy, sick of his parents' constant fights, starts his day as usual - he goes on the streets to spend some time alone before he has to go back into his so-called prison: home.  Everything around him feels like it's mocking him but suddenly he discovers a powerful tool that illuminates the path by which his suffering might end, even if for just a little while.

1089588.title: STUNT TROUBLE
1089588.plot: When a small naive robot looking to break into the film industry auditions for a stunt role in a upcoming film, he encounters the scary, formidable force of the ‘OCD-27’ stunt coordinator robot. The coordinator puts him through his paces as he struggles to deal with all that’s thrown at him whilst they both learn to have fun along the way.

1089589.title: The Tipping Point
1089589.plot: The Tipping Point is an experimental dance film exploring the cycles of pointless productivity, our reliance on resources and the need to self-realise. These themes are explored through a movement algorithm that depicts a miniature dystopian society. This society consists of four parties each with a single function - the director, their left-hand man, the guard and the hustler. This all changes when an unplanned event creates a ripple in the structure and pushes its inhabitants to question their role within the society and its functionality.

1089591.title: A Visit to The States
1089591.plot: First in the "A Visit to" series, where Sam, Kaden, Jenny and others visit San Francisco, for the first time.

1089592.title: Long Live Somaliland
1089592.plot: Somaliland Ha Nolato (Long Live Somaliland) takes an experimental approach in exploring and reflecting on the complex history of Somaliland from 1960 to 2021.

1089596.title: Eye Two Times Mouth
1089596.plot: Luz works at a gallery but her real passion and purpose in life is as an opera singer. She’s been invited to audition for Madame Butterfly at one of the principal theatres in Mexico City. Luz must practice. Her friends Lycian and Chío instruct her. How to make her voice and hands dance. She’s told “Your mouth is twice the size of your eye,” and this is all part of a divine geometry that governs the world. The 25th commission from Miu Miu Women’s Tales.

1089597.title: My Father's Son
1089597.plot: A traditional gamekeepers expectations for his son are challenged when his son explores his sexuality.

1089605.title: "I Like It Here"
1089605.plot: Nikita, a young Kyivan refugee in London misses his last bus home to his host family. Lost and alone he must navigate his emotions and the dark city streets.

1089619.title: Under the Influence
1089619.plot: A young couple's life is thrown into a dangerous tailspin after the wife has a n affair while in rehab.

1089628.title: (What the F*ck Do You Mean) We Bought a Zoo?
1089628.plot: The head of the family presents a one-in-a-lifetime opportunity that could change their lives forever.

1089629.title: Krieg gegen die Ukraine – Chronik eines Konfliktes

1089639.title: The 65th Annual Grammy Awards
1089639.plot: The 65th Annual Grammy Awards ceremony was a music awards ceremony held at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles on February 5, 2023. It recognized the best recordings, compositions, and artists of the eligibility year – October 1, 2021, to September 30, 2022 – as determined by the members of National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences. The nominations were announced on November 15, 2022. South African comedian Trevor Noah, who hosted the 63rd and 64th ceremonies, returned again.

1089641.title: Tree
1089641.plot: A filmed version of the play recorded at the Old Vic in London in January of 2015.

1089643.title: In Search of Someone or Something
1089643.plot: A person sitting at a table slowly looses their patience waiting for someone...or something?

1089650.title: Kathleen Madigan: Hunting Bigfoot
1089650.plot: Award winning comedian Kathleen Madigan delivers another great hour of stand up focusing on her family, the Road, the Midwest, boxed wine and her plan of action if she were to hit a Bigfoot.

1089659.title: IRIS
1089659.plot: A trans girl discovers her love for movies in a beachside town

1089674.title: Return of the Demojordan
1089674.plot: After a narrow escape from the fearsome beast known as The Demojordan, our protagonists seek a moment of tranquility in a quiet forest before their worst fears come true... it returns.

1089707.title: Due at Midnight
1089707.plot: Jack attempts to finish his homework before it is due, but must overcome procrastination and a group of violent classmates.

1089725.title: Budo Sento Championship 13
1089725.plot: Budo Sento Championship 13 took place Friday, February 17, 2023 with 8 fights at Gimnasio Juan de la Barrera in Mexico City, Mexico.

1089726.title: Leave a Message at the Beep
1089726.plot: After entering college, an ambitious and bright-eyed freshman soon learns that it’s not all it’s advertised to be. He battles internal conflict and fear of disappointing his family while coming to terms with his new reality.

1089754.title: Leba Ena Leba (ሌባ እና ሌባ)
1089754.plot: ሰውነት ክ ዜግነትም በላይ ነው( Being Human is more valuable than being citizen)

1089763.title: Il mondo è troppo per me

1089768.title: Root
1089768.plot: The sequel to Rosa Leigh, Now we see who Darkness is, Lilith and her plan to grab hold of her child, whom is related to Rosa Leigh. But it will not be easy, for she has to fight the strongest foe, The child's Father.

1089778.title: The Lies That Bind Us
1089778.plot: Estranged sisters are reunited as their mother clings to life. The reunion fuels secrets from their past and present that could tear their family apart.

1089785.title: Sommore: Queen Chandelier
1089785.plot: This Queen of Comedy shines as she takes the stage to sound off on her suspicion of free stuff, social media prayer requests, fake lashes and ugly shoes.

1089794.title: Lacee: Rise 2 the Top
1089794.plot: After a run in the girl group LACEE, Karin decides to step out on her own as a solo artist. As she preps for her solo debut, a former lover brings out a new artist that will compete, for the reigning spot as the new R&B diva.

1089803.title: Modern Amends for Personal Grievances
1089803.plot: Looking for the gastronomic experience that awakened him in the womb, a young man finds a reason for vengeance.

1089808.title: Herencia
1089808.plot: An author face the criticizm againts himself and find way to the world again. Fight with criticizer and himself too. Searching for a meaning. Colorizing the world for himself again.

1089812.title: It's gonna be okay
1089812.plot: After the ode to love of "Loving", the b-side, about sadness, breaks-up, loneliness.

1089821.title: Pre-Raphaelite Tango de Roxanne
1089821.plot: The Montage of Pre-Raphaelite paintings with a musical song from Moulin Rouge.

1089875.title: My Beautiful Man 2
1089875.plot: Hira and Kiyoi are both attempting to adapt to a life of cohabitation. Hira, now in his fourth year at college, is about to graduate and is beginning to question his future, while Kiyoi is making new connections while finally expanding on his experience as an actor.

1089888.title: PAINSTAR
1089888.plot: A 3D animation adapting a portion of the song "Famous Prophets (Stars)" by Car Seat Headrest.

1089919.title: I Cannot Open The Door Again Anymore
1089919.plot: the teenager who is stuck in the time loop in the room. He can't go out even if the door isn't locked. Just every time he walks away It turns out that he was walking into a room.

1089923.title: ROH: Jay Briscoe - Celebration Of Life
1089923.plot: The three-hour celebration of life features new & classic matches in addition to sit-down interviews.

1089938.title: Bittersweet
1089938.plot: An oral history documentary of people of color at Miami University during its Public Ivy period—from 1970 to the early 2000s.

1089964.title: Do We Have a Chance?
1089964.plot: A boy is struggling with love, but how many fears really belong to him and how many are the daughters of the homologating and conformist society?

1089968.title: Khawaja Siras: Pakistan's Trans Community in Between Tradition and Modernity
1089968.plot: Khawaja Siras are indigenous to Pakistan and are part of its rich history and culture. Despite having faced external threats throughout history, such as the colonial rule of the British, their existence continues to this day. The documentary examines the recent political developments in Pakistan and presents the perspectives of members of the community and activists.

1089983.title: Unworthy
1089983.plot: In the unyielding society of Pakistan, Saima, a transgender woman, craves a normal life. Cast out at the age of twenty-four when her mother passed away, she joined the transgender community to be a chela (a follower) but soon became a guru (lord) herself. In the bleakest moments when she had to beg, she was harassed and humiliated. In all this turmoil she miraculously finds love. Freedom for her is living and dressing as she pleases which can only be done through migration overseas

1089985.title: Metaphoria
1089985.plot: A monologue of confusion and frustration regarding gender identity.

1089998.title: On Clogger Lane
1089998.plot: Andrew Black’s experimental documentary weaves through the Washburn Valley between Otley and Harrogate, examining the infrastructures of capital on land overshadowed by a monstrous satellite surveillance station, submerged beneath reservoirs, haunted by accusations of witchcraft, and populated by indecipherable prehistoric carvings and the graves of child labourers.

1090002.title: Russie, journal d'une année de guerre
1090002.plot: A young Russian filmmaker opposed to the war in Ukraine is secretly filming its effects from her small hometown in the west of the country.

1090006.title: Everything Starts With Love
1090006.plot: After a tech-addicted guy meets a girl, his addictions start to change.

1090015.title: Move Me No Mountain
1090015.plot: When realtor Jenna can no longer deal with the crushing guilt of her daughters death, she walks out of society to sleep rough on the streets of Vegas!

1090063.title: NOAH Keiji Muto Grand Final Pro Wrestling Last Love Hold Out
1090063.plot: Keiji Muto Grand Final Pro-Wrestling "Last" Love was a professional wrestling event promoted by Pro Wrestling Noah. It took place on February 21, 2023, in Tokyo, Japan, at the Tokyo Dome.  The event was themed around the final matches of Keiji Muto, who was defeated by NJPW's Tetsuya Naito in the semi-main event, and by Masahiro Chono in the main event match. After the main event, Chono announced his own retirement. The event also featured the retirement match of Nosawa Rongai, who teamed with Mazada in a losing effort against Bullet Club (Taiji Ishimori and Gedo).

1090065.title: Life of the Party
1090065.plot: A man gathers all the necessary supplies for a party. Chips, pretzels, and most importantly, lots of drugs. Once people start arriving, the party goes wild. He’s in complete ecstasy, only to discover that the party may not be what it seems.

1090074.title: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye 2
1090074.plot: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye 2 recounts the riveting saga of a business family which finds itself at the crossroads, where one wrong decision could end up costing them everything.

1090105.title: Teneta
1090105.plot: The Lemkin Center for Documenting Russian Crimes in Ukraine try to reach witnesses and victims of crimes committed by Russian soldiers. Despite the enormity of the tragedy, there is still hope that after the end of this war it will be possible to punish the perpetrators.

1090125.title: It's All Worth Living For: The First Ten Years
1090125.plot: In 2020—one month before the world shut down—Chicago-born videographer Alex Zarek flew to Albuquerque, New Mexico, to spend a week with Levi (The Poet) Macallister: documenting his work, interviewing his friends and family, and capturing the places that have made Levi The Poet what it is.

1090141.title: The Creeps
1090141.plot: Five jolting tales of terror are sure to creep you out featuring monsters, madmen, and more!

1090145.title: Les grandes heures de l'automobile allemande

1090150.title: Taranga
1090150.plot: Abhijit is diagnosed with a malignant sore in liver. Sohag finds it difficult to bear with the costs of medical expenditure and household things. With the help of her friend Rajiv, She gets an opportunity to avail a job in Purulia. Sohag makes an effort to better her life by communicating with the innovative artworks of the rural artists. Rajiv allots a huge amount of responsibility of the organization on Sohag. Sohag confronts various layers of corruption in the work field. She realizes the suppressed discomfort of the workers there. Rajiv doesn’t take any initiative to rectify the situation. In the meantime, Abhijit’s physical condition deteriorates and he mumbles about her unsuccessful business of producing perfumes. The simultaneous crises related to the conjugal failure, Abhijit’s illness, Rajiv’s consistent admiration weave the narrative of the story. Sohag resigns from her job.

1090170.title: Muchas gracias por venir, un documental de Ginebras

1090202.title: Where the Sun Sleeps
1090202.plot: Octave and Flora have been in a romantic relationship for a long time on an online game without ever having seen each other. While Flora burns with desire to meet her virtual lover, it is not the case of Octave, deeply complexed by a burn ravaging half his face. Weary of the situation, Flora gives Octave a date so that they can finally meet. Will their love survive this meeting?

1090227.title: Emesis Blue
1090227.plot: On Halloween Night of 1968, an executive of the Builders League United Corporation mysteriously vanishes in Mortem, New Mexico. A private detective and washed-up war veteran team up to find him, yet the man they hunt is more dangerous than they can possibly imagine.

1090230.title: LIMITLESS: Victor Wembanyama's Journey to the NBA
1090230.plot: "LIMITLESS", is an original documentary about 7'5 French basketball star Victor Wembanyama and his journey to becoming the projected #1 overall pick in the 2023 NBA Draft.

1090236.title: The Path to Victory
1090236.plot: A young girl trains to defeat her rival in karate and learns to balance competitiveness with kindness.

1090240.title: The Fury
1090240.plot: In a highly fictionalized and stylized way, Neshat’s new film addresses the sexual exploitation of female political prisoners by the Islamic Republic’s regime in Iran. Subjected to severe torture, sexual assault, including rape, it is commonly known that even after being released, many of the women are unable to recover emotionally from the trauma experienced in prison, and often commit suicide. The video traces the psychological and emotional journey of a young Iranian woman, who, although now lives freely in the United States, remains traumatized by her memories in captivity. [Overview Courtesy of Gladstone Gallery]

1090241.title: Marlon Wayans: God Loves Me
1090241.plot: Filmed at the Center Stage Theater in Atlanta, Wayans delivers a hilarious hour-long performance, unleashing his spot-on impressions and fearless physical comedy to address one of the most infamous recent events in pop culture – “the slap” that took place at the 94th Academy Awards® ceremony.

1090270.title: ARRGH
1090270.plot: An eager pirate pursues the treasures of an idyllic island, but is he biting off more than he can chew?

1090393.title: Platform
1090393.plot: Jess confronts a piece of her past on the platform…

1090453.title: VRTLWRLDS
1090453.plot: Triptych installation trekking the vaguely inhabited virtual worlds built to recreate reality; ones formed through faithfully interpreted large-scale layouts, whose missing details go unnoticed in their efforts to cast a grounded visual background for navigators and simulations - of a microcosmic uncanniness, digital altworlds ; second lives, empty streets.

1090502.plot: A short film by Ruby Que

1090508.title: Missing Memories
1090508.plot: Two criminals who were once friends must reckon with the sins of the past when one of them is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's.

1090540.title: Hun Iqbal
1090540.plot: Iqbal, an artist, pulls up an unbelievable - never seen before the heist and the rest of the movie revolves around the police department trying to catch the most flamboyant thief they have ever witnessed in their career.

1090546.title: Suvarna Sundari
1090546.plot: The Trinethri idol, created and commissioned  during the 15th century to be a beautiful goddess, turned out to be a people destroying evil. Its indestructible nature continues its journey to the present day, affecting numerous lives.

1090556.title: Quetzal
1090556.plot: a short film about a stop over.

1090560.title: Affirmation Generation
1090560.plot: Six young people discuss the "gender affirming" medical care they received for gender dysphoria and how they subsequently realised this was the wrong treatment.

1090585.title: Show Me The Money II
1090585.plot: After the Grand Final siren, the real business of footy begins. Players, agents and clubs let us in for an unprecedented look inside the deal-making and drama of the AFL off-season.

1090592.title: La novela familiar
1090592.plot: Spin-off of "Mudos testigos" (2023). Based on an idea by Luis Ospina, a man asks his uncle for advice on issues of love.

1090610.title: I Get Knocked Down
1090610.plot: I Get Knocked Down is the untold story of Leeds-based anarcho-pop band Chumbawamba. Founding band-member Dunstan Bruce is 59, and he is struggling with the fact that the world seems to be going to hell in a handcart. Twenty years after his fall from grace, Bruce is angry and frustrated, but how does a retired middle-aged radical get back up again?  In this punk version of Charles Dickens’ A Christmas Carol, Dunstan is visited by the antagonistic ghost of his anarchist past, his alter ego, ‘Babyhead’, who forces him to question his own life, sending him on a search for his long-lost anarchist mojo. Following Bruce’s personal voyage of rediscovery, redemption, and reawakening, I Get Knocked Down acts as a call to arms to those who think activism is best undertaken by someone else.

1090616.title: BLU · BLAU · BLEU · AZUL
1090616.plot: Visions of past decades haunt him. His one eye, centered in his head, swivels schizophrenic, not knowing what to focus on. Connected to the past and the future by the same cable, information overflows and metamorphoses into something timeless. Fragments, colors, images, violence, pleasure appear. The system is pushed to its limit, countdown to meltdown. Frequencies intersect, add, subtract. The RGB translation subsystem starts to focus on a single spectrum, a final electronic spasm to prevent self-destruction. 666 THz. The color spectral comparison program is started to determine the signal. Blue.

1090624.title: Mina
1090624.plot: In Mina the artist subtly evokes the death of his grandmother, a tutelary figure who came from Algeria, around whom were woven the ordinary and extraordinary stories and tales that make up the everyday life of the family. Through his practice consisting in collecting anecdotes and testimonies, and by making intimate portraits, Rayane Mcirdi provides a mouthpiece for his family and all those who are little listened to.

1090638.title: Danske læger i kamp mod nazismen

1090684.title: Wet Kiss the Underground Sex Symbols of Berlin performing Live.
1090684.plot: Singer Brenna O and her guitar playing dog (daniel ward) perform a medley of punk songs in an underground music venue in Berlin.

1090686.title: Married At First Fleet
1090686.plot: Married at First Fleet follows a modern day 18th century couple. Individuals are matched together according to their common interests, attractiveness, and lack of diseases.

1090688.title: Match Made
1090688.plot: Zac searches for love via the dating app landscape.

1090691.title: The Fritz
1090691.plot: Arriving at a party after being hit by a meteor, a nervous man (Trevor Jamieson) seeks to confront his brothers about their tumultuous past, but things don't quite go according to plan.

1090692.title: Lean
1090692.plot: After suffering financial ruin, Robert decides to sail a handmade boat to New Zealand. Seemingly to regain the respect of his family. Seeing the lunacy of his ambitions, his son Charlie tries to stop him.

1090694.title: Teacups
1090694.plot: For almost half a century, Don Ritchie would approach people contemplating suicide at the edge of a cliff, 100ft from his home. Teacups explores Don’s (voiced by Hugo Weaving) surreal interactions with hundreds of suicidal individuals and his journey to reconcile the suicide of his best friend.

1090704.title: BRUTAL
1090704.plot: A man starts having dreams of a killer and it starts becoming a reality.

1090848.title: Rebound
1090848.plot: Through a series of homoerotic hallucinations brought on by a book, Gwen finds herself in a troublesome love triangle.

1091013.title: Flavours
1091013.plot: An adolescent's boring life quickly changes when he decides to put a flower petal on his toast.

1091021.title: Después de Ucrania: Relatos de una Cobertura
1091021.plot: Four journalists talk about their experiences and share their testimonies of the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

1090920.title: A Model Murder
1090920.plot: Chris Connelly has an exclusive interview with Diana Peña, a first-hand witness to the crime who provides a shocking turn-by-turn account of the fatal day, the cover-up and days spent on the run.

1090940.title: PHD Pyaar Hai Drama
1090940.plot: Three couples settled in the UK question the definition of love. Once a bed of roses, their relationships have now hit a point where they struggle to keep it together. Will love win?

1090944.plot: The first film in Cullen O'Reilly and Nolan Cunningham's 'the apartment series'

1090957.title: War Zone: Bear Grylls Meets President Zelenskyy

1090958.title: Above the Clouds
1090958.plot: A lost dog, a cassette tape, and a backyard comedy show bring two Asian-American strangers together for a day they'll never forget.

1090959.title: Lemon man vs the Multiverse
1090959.plot: When the hero Lemon man gets sucked into a portal, he has to team up with different versions of himself to save the Multiverse from the deadly villain Broken hyena after he promised his dead friends to get revenge. but Lemon man and his team has a plan to stop him and save the Multiverse.

1090987.title: The Tan-Clad Man
1090987.plot: In life, there are men. Sometimes those men are one man. And sometimes, that man is clad in tan.

161347.title: An Everlasting Duel
161347.plot: An exotic beauty is rescued by a gallant swordsman.
